fields.summary: Very central to the city which can be reached by an easy walk or by bus, with transport at the door, if required, and all amenities within easy reach.
fields.description: Very central to the city which can be reached by an easy walk or by bus, with transport at the door, if required, and all amenities within easy reach. Potts Pt. is a vibrant  and popular inner-city suburb & the area was described as 'Australia's Bohemian Heart' in the article by Raymond Bonner in the New York Times . Ultra-convenient & within walking distance of the central business district  & all tourist sites such as:  the Botanic Gardens,  Opera House,  NSW Art Gallery,  Australian Museum,   Circular Quay, the Sydney Opera House, and BridgeClimb Darling Harbour Museum of Contemporary Art Art Gallery of NSW Sydney Museum Hyde Park Botanic Gardens Chinatown, Paddy's Markets, and the Chinese Gardens Paddington (& the Saturday markets) The historic Rocks area (& the markets on Saturday & Sunday) It is 7 minutes walk to the Kings Cross.train (Metro) station & buses to the beaches .  Bus to/from city leaves from across the road (and it takes about 15-20 minutes to walk to Circular  Quay
fields.notes: 150.00 key security deposit refundable on return of  rhe keys.    The Supermarket 100 metres up the road is open until midnight and has free wifi and the  Library is 10 minutes up the road and has free WiFi as do many cafes etc. On Sunday travel on the Opal travel card (covering buses trains and ferries) costs a maximum of $2.50 a great bargain.
fields.neighbourhood_overview: It is very close to everything and everywhere, has  many trees along the streets and is in a beautiful part of the city
fields.transit: It is 7 minutes walk to the Kings Cross.train (Metro) station & buses to the beaches .  Bus to/from city leaves from across the road (and it takes about 20 minutes to walk to Circular  Quay and the Opera House). The bus  to Chinatown leaves from in front of the building.
fields.title: An Oasis in the City

fields.summary: Come stay with Vinh & Stuart (Awarded as one of Australia's top hosts by Airbnb CEO Brian Chesky & key shareholder Ashton Kutcher. We're Sydney's #1 reviewed hosts too). Find out why we've been positively reviewed 500+ times. Message us and talk first BEFORE you make any reservation request - And please read our listing to the end (hint hint). Everything you need to know is there.
fields.description: Come stay with Vinh & Stuart (Awarded as one of Australia's top hosts by Airbnb CEO Brian Chesky & key shareholder Ashton Kutcher. We're Sydney's #1 reviewed hosts too). Find out why we've been positively reviewed 500+ times. Message us and talk first BEFORE you make any reservation request - And please read our listing to the end (hint hint). Everything you need to know is there. We're pretty relaxed hosts, and we fully appreciate staying with someone else, in their home home, is not for every-one. This is not a business, or a hotel. We're casual Airbnb hosts, not hoteliers. If you're just looking for an alternative to an expensive hotel, then we're not for you. Here you'll be treated in the same way we treat family & friends when they stay. So... no fluffy bathrobes... Please say hello and message us *BEFORE* you make your reservation request... It'll help speed things up, and smooth things out... Please read our listing all the way to the end. It will make getting a confirmed reserv
fields.notes: We've a few reasons for the 6.00pm arrival time / check in / bag drop time... One of them is that we're really flexible with check out times. :) While we do work from home, we don't particularly want to broadcast on the internet if we are away from home. That's why our arrival time is always listed as 6pm. Our "check in" / "arrival time" / "bag drop" is all the same thing. It's not like we're a hotel with a team of porters waiting to take your bags any time of the day or night whether we're at home or not. So, if we haven't agreed some alternate arrangements, then we look forward to welcoming you to our home at 6.00pm. While we may be able to arrange some arrival times / bag drops / check ins earlier, we do need to make those arrangements well in advance. So if the 6.00pm check in time isn't your preference, please talk to us about it *before* you make your reservation. :)
fields.neighbourhood_overview: Pyrmont is an inner-city village of Sydney, only about 2kms from the Sydney CBD (Central Business District) / Core, right next door to Darling Harbour and Chinatown. https://www.airbnb.com.au/locations/sydney/pyrmont Pyrmont has a relaxed community feel with an inner city vibe. Pyrmont is only about 2kms (10 - 15 mins walk) from the centre of Sydney with an extensive range of local restaurants, wine bars, and pubs. There's some seriously good baristas and cafes right close to our home (Go and say hi to Damien & Tim at Bar Zini - it's one of our local faves). There's five star fine dining right through to greasy-spoon takeaways with some of Australia's finest dining restaurants within easy reach. * Darling Harbour and Cockle Bay * Exhibition and Convention Centres * Sydney Fish Markets * Pyrama Point Park * Jones Bay Wharf * The Star (Casino) with Food Halls, Bars, and the Lyric Theatre * Powerhouse Museum * National Maritime Museum Also (back on the food - notice a theme?): * Two groce
fields.transit: Our home is centrally located and an easy walk to everywhere (everywhere you want to go anyways). We also have easy access to trams (light-rail), trains, and ferries which are all conveniently a few minutes walk away. Transport options are great:  There's a bus, the 389, pretty much at our doorstep every 10 minutes. It goes into the City Centre, into Paddington, all the way to Bondi Beach and on to North Bondi - Doesn't get better than that! Trams ("light-rail") every 12 minutes. - Central Station, Fish Markets, The Star, Chinatown, Glebe - Central to Dulwich Hill. Ferries from Pyrmont Bay, Darling Harbour and Circular Quay are a great way to explore. Trains from Town Hall, Central, and Wynyard. A main Sydney City (Town Hall) train station is only 10-15 minutes walk away. Central Station is 15 - 20 minutes walk (5 mins by bus or tram). Airports: The international and Domestic airports are only about 15 - 20 minutes drive away (longer during traffic peaks), again, all easily accessible
fields.title: Sydney City & Harbour at the door

fields.summary: Beautifully renovated, spacious and quiet, our 3 Bedroom, 3 Bathroom home is only a  10 minute walk to beaches in Fairlight or Forty Baskets,  or a 30 minute walk to Manly via the coastal promenade, or an Express bus runs every 20 mins at your door.
fields.description: Beautifully renovated, spacious and quiet, our 3 Bedroom, 3 Bathroom home is only a  10 minute walk to beaches in Fairlight or Forty Baskets,  or a 30 minute walk to Manly via the coastal promenade, or an Express bus runs every 20 mins at your door. Our home is a thirty minute walk along the seashore promenade to Manly, one of Sydney's most beautiful beaches, with its village restaurants, cafes, and shopping.  If you prefer more variety, the Manly ferry will take you to the Sydney CBD in 15 minutes.   The residence is sited in a sought-after family-friendly street only a short stroll to nearby North Harbour reserve and Forty Baskets cafe and beach. It's a short walk further to express CBD buses, ferries, and Manly entertainment. Or there is a bus (#131 or #132) around the corner that drops you in Manly in 8 minutes.  Our home features a stainless steel galley kitchen, including Ilve oven and gas cooktop. We have two separate living areas on the ground floor. The front lounge enjoys P&O
fields.neighbourhood_overview: Balgowlah Heights is one of the most prestigious areas on the Northern Beaches.  Filled with seaside character and a boutique way of living, this suburb offers everything you could need.   Located approximately 11km from the CBD, and only 2 kms from Manly, Balgowlah is surrounded by pristine water frontage including North Harbour, Forty Baskets, and Sydney Harbour.  Filled with a vast array of public parks, pools, marinas, beaches, sporting facilities and Sydney Harbour National Park. Local Amenities •Forty Baskets Beach, Reef Beach, North Harbour Park, 40 Beans Cafe, Clontarf Beach, Castle Rock. •Nearby Spit to Manly walking track that leads left along the promenade to Manly or right through scenic Sydney Harbour National Park around to Clontarf. •Balgowlah Heights shops, offering a supermarket, delicatessen, boutique shops, cafes and more •Nearby Stockland Mall offers a vast range of cafes, supermarkets, eateries, boutique fashion stores, home wares shops and Fitness First Gym •Array
fields.transit: Balgowlah - Manly bus # 131 or #132  (Bus stop is 3 doors down, around the corner) takes you to Manly Ferry in 8 minutes.  Manly ferry gets you to Sydney CBD in 15 minutes.
fields.title: Manly Harbour House

fields.summary: Welcome! This apartment will suit a short term eco-conscious traveller(s) to Sydney. The room is fitted with a double bed, inbuilt wardrobe, writing desk, and shelves. Modern 2 bedroom apartment in Redfern, complete with a gym (5 minute walk to Central Station, Redfern station, close to shopping centre, restaurants).  FYI, the average price for a shared dorm style of 8 in Bounce Hotel next to Central Station is $49 per night.
fields.description: Welcome! This apartment will suit a short term eco-conscious traveller(s) to Sydney. The room is fitted with a double bed, inbuilt wardrobe, writing desk, and shelves. Modern 2 bedroom apartment in Redfern, complete with a gym (5 minute walk to Central Station, Redfern station, close to shopping centre, restaurants).  FYI, the average price for a shared dorm style of 8 in Bounce Hotel next to Central Station is $49 per night. I live upstairs in my own room with my own bathroom. Just a reminder, this is NOT a hotel. You will be sharing the apartment (not the room). I don't want guests with unrealistic expectations - it is not an Ikea showroom! I am deliberately charging a low price, as I consciously avoid guests with high demands and OCD types.  I am interested in travellers/guests who are happy to share, and I would rather NOT have guests who love to complain. If you have any issues, please TELL me upfront, as I can't read minds, and would prefer you to ask than for you to have a bad s
fields.notes: The building can be hard to find, so please ensure you print a map and know where you're going. Checked out the photo as it has photos of the building and the exact location. At times, the couch is also leased out short-term, so bear that in mind. Please email me for more info.
fields.transit: DIRECTIONS VIA TAXI: Get dropped off at Renwick St (off Regent St). You will spot the entrance via the glass doors with "Signature Apartments".  DIRECTIONS VIA TRAIN: The nearest stop is Redfern station. After coming out of the station, turn right until you hit Regent St, then take Wells St, and then left to Renwick St. Entrance is midway on Renwick St. Redfern train station is 5 minute walk. If driving, there is only parking on the street.
fields.title: Eco-conscious Travellers: Private Room

fields.summary: Welcome! This apartment will suit a short term eco-conscious traveller and visitor to Sydney. The sofa futon in the living room, which is ideal for ONE person (no couple). Not recommended for light sleepers! Modern 2 bedroom apartment in Redfern (5 minute walk to Central Station (city centre), Redfern station, close to shopping centre, pubs, restaurants, amenities).  I have had guests who had unrealistic expectations of my apartment - just a reminder to not expect it to be a Ikea showroom.
fields.description: Welcome! This apartment will suit a short term eco-conscious traveller and visitor to Sydney. The sofa futon in the living room, which is ideal for ONE person (no couple). Not recommended for light sleepers! Modern 2 bedroom apartment in Redfern (5 minute walk to Central Station (city centre), Redfern station, close to shopping centre, pubs, restaurants, amenities). It is next to a four-lane road and sometimes can be noisy (although it quietens down at night). FYI, the average price for a shared dorm style of 8 in Bounce Hotel next to Central Station is $49 per night. This is a no-smoking building and apartment.   When booking, please remember: 1. It's a couch and not a room (no privacy) 2. Let me know your sleeping hours as my computer is

DIRECTIONS VIA TRAIN: The nearest stop is Redfern station. After coming out of the station, turn right until you hit Regent St, then take Wells St, and then left to Renwick St. Entrance is midway on Renwick St. Train fare is $16.50.
fields.title: Eco-conscious Traveller: Sofa Couch

fields.summary: Penthouse living in a great central location: You will be staying in a unique apartment on the top floor of a centrally located boutique building.  A spacious apartment spread over 2 levels, the space offers my guests a high level of privacy and security. The room has its own bathroom and  balcony and the whole apartment is furnished to a luxury standard in a contemporary style with all mod cons.  Location is one if the best in the city with easy walking to everything you may need.
fields.description: Penthouse living in a great central location: You will be staying in a unique apartment on the top floor of a centrally located boutique building.  A spacious apartment spread over 2 levels, the space offers my guests a high level of privacy and security. The room has its own bathroom and  balcony and the whole apartment is furnished to a luxury standard in a contemporary style with all mod cons.  Location is one if the best in the city with easy walking to everything you may need. A charming two-level, two-bedroom, two-bathroom duplex apartment on the border of East Sydney, Darlinghurst and Kings Cross with everything that Sydney has to offer within easy walking distance : Sydney CBD 10mins, Hyde Park 5 mins, Oxford St 10 mins, Kings Cross 5mins  The apartment is very spacious, elegantly decorated in a modern contemporary style and very well equipped with all mod cons.  The room is situated on the lower floor, it is a spacious bedroom with large built in robes, a comfortable large que
fields.notes: The apartment is on the top floor with 4 flights of stairs to walk and there is NO lift, it is great for working out your legs but not really suitable for anyone with mobility/fitness challenges, also the apartment is not really suitable for a young child.  If you want to want more information or have a burning question please message me and I will endeavour to come back to you within 24hrs.
fields.neighbourhood_overview: The location is really central and there is number of things to do and see all within a few kilometres; Stanley St (Sydney’s little Italy) is just around the corner which has some great restaurants and a real European feel. Darlinghurst is wall to wall of cafes, bars and restaurants to suite all tastes and budgets. Woolloomooloo marina is at the bottom of the hill with its ritzy restaurants and famous residents (Russell Crow has the penthouse at end of wharf) it is beautiful to hang out on a nice evening. The Australian Museum and The Art Gallery of NSW have both interesting exhibitions and evening events, The Bridge can be seen from my corner and the Opera House is a pleasant stroll through the Botanical Gardens and Domain. Chinatown and Darling Harbour are just at the back of the CBD and Sydney colourful nightlife of both Kings Cross & Oxford St are on your doorstep.  I also have lots of more information on things to do while in Sydney just ask me.  On booking you will receive my hou
fields.transit: If walking is not your thing I am well serviced for public transport with a bus stop almost outside of door that takes you into the CBD and beyond and Bondi Beach in the other direction. The Town Hall train station is a comfortable walk and this station is one of the main connector stations for all lines, plus the airport is a quick 20mins away by cab or the Airport Shuttle bus which picks up outside my door.
fields.title: Stunning Penthouse Apartment In Heart Of The City

fields.summary: Hi! We are a married professional couple with 2 kids.  When making a booking, please tell us a little bit about yourselves (ages & professions of everyone in your group), the purpose of your visit and finally, your check in & out times. Thanks!

When making a booking, please tell us a little bit about yourselves (ages & professions of everyone in your group), the purpose of your visit and finally, your check in & out times. Thanks! fields.notes: During your stay guests may use the landline for all local, national and 1300 calls to landlines or mobiles.  There will be a fee for international calls.
fields.neighbourhood_overview: BALMAIN is an older inner city village / suburb with numerous cafes, restaurants, parks, walks around the harbour, older-style pubs, markets, etc.  Our house situated between Balmain and Rozelle shopping centres, in a quiet street with a small park at the end of it that has gated play equipment for small children.
fields.transit: Balmain is well serviced by buses (from Darling St, Mullins St and Victoria Rd), but you can also catch a ferry from Balmain (Thames Street) and Balmain East into Circular Quay and Darling Harbour, Hunter's Hill, etc..
fields.title: 3 BED HOUSE + 1 BED STUDIO Balmain

fields.description: Double bed in decent sized bedroom, in two bedroom apartment. You'd be sharing the apartment with myself.  The apartment is always neat and tidy and has a comfortable and homely feel about it. The accommodation is basic but it is also one of the cheapest rooms per night in the area. There is a fully equipped kitchen, flat screen TV, DVD, DVD library, and couches in loungeroom, large bathroom. Linen, towels and basics like tea, coffee and sugar provided. Access to building's backyard. The area is awesome! Buses to Bondi Beach and Bondi Junction can be caught 50m from my apartment. It takes about 30 minutes to get into the city by public transport. Just around the corner and across the road are two beautiful parks (Cooper Park and Bellevue Park) and the Bellevue Hill village shops - cafe's, post office, laundromat, ATM's, butcher, deli's. It's a 5 minute walk. 10 minute walk or a very quick bus trip to: Bondi Junction and trains/buses to the city, airport, Bronte and Coogee. 20 minute wa
fields.title: COZY PRIVATE ROOM, GREAT LOCATION!

fields.summary: Sunny warehouse/loft apartment in the heart of one of Sydney's best neighbourhoods. Located on the corner of two iconic Darlinghurst streets famous for laneway bars and eateries, and just footsteps to equally amazing Surry Hills and Potts Point. Walk through beautiful parks to the city in less than 10 mins, the opera house in 20 and access Bondi Beach easily in 25 via the bus stop directly in front of the building.
fields.description: Sunny warehouse/loft apartment in the heart of one of Sydney's best neighbourhoods. Located on the corner of two iconic Darlinghurst streets famous for laneway bars and eateries, and just footsteps to equally amazing Surry Hills and Potts Point. Walk through beautiful parks to the city in less than 10 mins, the opera house in 20 and access Bondi Beach easily in 25 via the bus stop directly in front of the building. My apartment is a beautiful, simple, open plan / one bedroom loft with soaring high ceilings and hardwood floors that hint at it's previous life as a printing factory in the 1940s. It has huge windows that flood the space with glorious sunshine throughout the day and provide a refreshing breeze during summer.  A few key features: * Wireless harman/kardon aura stereo system so you can stream your music wirelessly from any bluetooth device * Internal laundry with washer and dryer * The kitchen is equipped with gas cooking, microwave, a dishwasher and the basics for preparing m
fields.notes: ** I've recently returned to renting my apartment after a break from airbnb for two years while studying medicine. I am the owner of this property, so you can be assured that it is not being sub-let and can expect a high standard of amenity. While Darlinghurst is one of Sydney's more bustling neighbourhoods, the apartment is located at the rear of the building and so enjoys a relatively quiet position. Once in a while my neighbour's might have a weekend party. GUEST REQUIREMENTS I request all guests verify their identity with Airbnb's offline ID verification process. It is really quick and easy to do! See airbnb.com/verify for more details EXTENDED STAYS For extended stays (i.e. anything of 1 month or longer) additional cleaning fees may apply.
fields.neighbourhood_overview: Darlinghurst is home to some of Sydney's best restaurants, coffee and designers. The apartment is located on the corner of two iconic streets (Crown St and Stanley St) - famous for eateries, bars, boutiques and galleries. It's also a very short walk through beautiful Hyde Park to the centre of Sydney city and is an easy stroll to many other awesome neighbourhoods, including the creative precincts of Surry Hills and Potts Point. With galleries, museums,  the Royal Botanic Gardens and other harbour side parks (even the Opera House!) all within walking distance, the apartment really offers the ideal base to explore from. A few location highlights: * There are many fantastic restaurants and cafes located on the same street as the apartment - literally footsteps from the front door * Some of Sydney's coolest wine and cocktail bars are hidden in the laneways surrounding the apartment building, including Love Tilly Devine, Owl House, Pocket, Shady Pines, Pocket Bar and more...you won't need t
fields.transit: With many eateries, bars and attractions all within walking distance, most guests find they don't require a car and rarely resort to taxis.  There are plenty of public transport options that make exploring further afield very easy. The apartment is a short (7 minute) walk from Museum and Kings Cross train stations, offering directly access the airport and wider Sydney (as many different lines pass through these two stations). There is also a bus stop directly in front of the apartment that provides quick and direct access to Circular Quay / the Opera House (this is also a walkable distance) and Bondi Beach. The Central Business District is easily accessed on foot through Hyde Park in 5-10minutes. THERE IS NO ON-SITE PARKING. You have 3 other options: 1/ street parking - most street parking in the area is timed during the day, and free between 10 pm and 8 am the next day.   2/ There is a Wilson Car Park just down the road with a  flat rate on Saturday and Sunday (check out prices on the
fields.title: Sunny Darlinghurst Warehouse Apartment

fields.summary: A stone's throw to Bondi Beach. Right in amongst the action yet on a quiet residential street.
fields.description: A stone's throw to Bondi Beach. Right in amongst the action yet on a quiet residential street. Whether you’re an active morning person, a sleep-in-and-enjoy-the-sun person, or an explore the nightlife kind of person, iconic Bondi has everything, all within walking distance to boot. This great property has easy on-foot access to everything Bondi has to offer- the beach, excellent cafes, shops, boutiques, markets, and public transport (including two bus routes, direct to the CBD). The large, comfortable home is fully furnished and self contained, and boasts 5 bedrooms across two floors, with space to sleep up to 11 people!     Master Bedroom with queen bed and king single sofa bed + en suite.     Three bedrooms with queen size beds     One bedroom with 2 single beds. Not to mention the huge open plan kitchen, dining, and lounge areas, which open onto a sunny backyard, great for entertaining in the evenings, a space for the kids to play while you relax, or just popping home for lunch afte
fields.title: Rubys at Bondi Beach! A stone's throw to the beach

fields.summary: We welcome you to enjoy top floor ocean views from our beautiful two bedroom apartment located next to Bondi and Tamarama beach. Make yourself at home & enjoy the beach breeze from your private balcony. Clean and crisp space with ultra comfortable queen bed & two single beds, great for the whole family. One bath & one shower. Cafes just up the road about 1 minute walk, & bus stop is around the corner. Walk to Bondi Beach or Tamarama Beach in 10-15 minutes. In June - Sept enjoy whale watching!
fields.description: We welcome you to enjoy top floor ocean views from our beautiful two bedroom apartment located next to Bondi and Tamarama beach. Make yourself at home & enjoy the beach breeze from your private balcony. Clean and crisp space with ultra comfortable queen bed & two single beds, great for the whole family. One bath & one shower. Cafes just up the road about 1 minute walk, & bus stop is around the corner. Walk to Bondi Beach or Tamarama Beach in 10-15 minutes. In June - Sept enjoy whale watching! We welcome you to enjoy top floor ocean views from our beautiful two bedroom apartment located next to Bondi and Tamarama beach.  Quiet and tranquil home with ocean views, close to beaches , cafe's, eateries, and all essential amenities. Within a very short strolling distance is bus transportation. Master bedroom equipped with queen bed, built in wardrobes and views of the ocean. Second bedroom has double bed . The 2nd bedroom double bed can be separated into 2 twin beds for single sleepers or chi
fields.notes: Timed Street parking only: 2hrs from 8am - 6pm.  Public Transport 2-5 min walk to bus stops. Taxi rank nearby so calling a cab I easy or use Über app for a luxury car at the cost of a car. 15 mins drive to city downtown. 5-10 mins to Bondi junction and train. Take the 333 express bus on Bondi road to the junction or city from Campbell parade and Knotts avenue stop. This apartment is located on the 3rd floor with stair access only. There is no lift.
fields.neighbourhood_overview: Welcome yourself to Bondi Beach where you can experience a mixture of lifestyles, whether you're drawn to great surf, good food, or the great atmosphere. The main area of the beach is the Bondi Pavilion, where the cafes, theatre, and art gallery draw many of the weekend visitors. Near the pavilion is the most popular area to swim and offers the best choice between surf and safety - you can catch a wave without risking the dangerous conditions further south. North Bondi is a safer area of the beach, and is patrolled and generally has the calmest surf conditions as well as a children's swimming rock pool. Take a dip in the famous Iceburgs pool at a cost of $6. Those views are unbelievable!
fields.transit: 5 minute walk to Campbell parade / Bondi Road to catch busses going up to Bondi Junction where you can transfer to trains taking you further into the city. Any bus can be caught to take you up to the Junction (380, 333). Cross the street and you can catch a bus to North Bondi or even further to Watson's bay by catching the 380.
fields.title: Sun Filled Ocean View Apt with Private Balcony

fields.summary: Amazing location just 3 minutes walk to the beach. Stylish two bedroom apartment with a glimpse of the ocean! Enjoy double balconies which allow you to relax in the sun, BBQ & enjoy the North Bondi village. Our lovely apartment is quiet and located a small block of four. There is free street parking and free wifi . Did we mention the fabulous cafes and restaurants just around the corner too?

There is free street parking and free wifi . Did we mention the fabulous cafes and restaurants just around the corner too? Gorgeous two bedroom apartment with private balconies on Ben Buckler, Bondi Beach. Relax and enjoy the North Bondi village feel in the beautiful apartment full of character . Just a 3 minute walk to the beach. Located on Hastings Pd, Bondi Beach. Bedding configuration • One Queen bed Our home is clean and crisp with open living space which flows onto the sun drenched balcony facing the beach. Only a two minute stroll to the waters edge this is the perfect couples retreat. Newly renovated with white washed wooden floors, all new leather furniture and all comforts to make your stay enoyable. Master b
fields.notes: There is street parking only ( free and no permit is needed) .  No private car space for guests so you'll need to find a space on the street.
fields.transit: Local bus stop is 2 minutes walk from apartment.  Bus runs every 5 minutes to Bondi Junction train station,  City ( CBD) and Circular Quay Street parking with no time restrictions
fields.title: Beach Breeze 2 BDR + Double balcony+ LOCATION !

fields.summary: This large, light-filled and artistically decorated older style one-bedroom apartment is in the best position in Bondi. Directly opposite the beach . Cafes and buses at the door. Its perfect for guests wanting to experience the heart of Bondi with all its cafes, natural beauty (views) and social activities. This apartment is a real gem and has unprecedented views and decor.
fields.description: This large, light-filled and artistically decorated older style one-bedroom apartment is in the best position in Bondi. Directly opposite the beach . Cafes and buses at the door. Its perfect for guests wanting to experience the heart of Bondi with all its cafes, natural beauty (views) and social activities. This apartment is a real gem and has unprecedented views and decor. BONDI BEACHFRONT BOHEMIAN APARTMENT Why stay at Ravesis? Half the price and twice the size. Same position only larger, and more comfortable. Beautiful older-style  Parisian style apartment overlooking Bondi Beach, steps to sand. Staying at this apartment is an experience.  Ideal for couples, executives and creatives. High ceilings, polished floorboards,piano, lots of natural light. Suited to guests who appreciate an artistically decorated space. The main living area is large, light, airy (has ceiling fans) , loads of room and has breathtaking views. The kitchenette is attached to the main living room and is fully eq
fields.notes: Large ceiling fans rather than air conditioning make for an airy, healthy environment. A half bath as well as shower makes for a more comfortable option. High ceilings give the feeling of space and airiness. A piano and collection of good books plus a view to die for. I have had a few guests mention noise levels from temporary occurences. These are all temporary and to be expected from such a thriving, holiday-vibe locality. Nothing is permanent here - its continually changing. Its a cosmopolitan environment.
fields.neighbourhood_overview: The most exciting and entertaining neighborhood in Sydney. Cafes, restaurants, beach, sea-pool, surfing, designer shopping, organic cuisine. Lots of eye-candy! No need to leave this suburb - its all here.
fields.transit: Buses and taxis right at the door, so plentiful there's often no need to book them. Across the road from the famous Icebergs where you can swim by day and dine exclusively by night. Amazing ocean walks to Tamarama and Bronte.
fields.title: BONDI BEACHFRONT CENTRAL LOCATION

fields.summary: An open plan apartment, which opens onto a spacious garden.  Self-contained, bathroom, 1 double bedroom, plus 2 single beds in the open plan area.  Mosman is a smart Sydney suburb, the harbour on 3 sides, 15 - 18 minutes  from city centre by bus route 243.
fields.description: An open plan apartment, which opens onto a spacious garden.  Self-contained, bathroom, 1 double bedroom, plus 2 single beds in the open plan area.  Mosman is a smart Sydney suburb, the harbour on 3 sides, 15 - 18 minutes  from city centre by bus route 243. Studio Yindi is a self-contained open plan studio apartment on Level 1, which opens onto a spacious garden.  It includes bathroom, and a fully equipped basic but practical kitchen for self-catering.    There is 1 Queen size double bed in a separate bedroom.   The 2 single beds are in a screened area, that is part of the large open plan area.   The beds can be moved around in the open plan space to meet the needs of your group, for acoustic or visual privacy that best suits you.   We recently installed a second gas space heater that quickly makes the Studio snug after you come home from a long day touristing or working in the winter. ACCESS CONSIDERATIONS Please be aware that the Studio is at the rear of of our house,  which you acces
fields.notes: STANDARD OF ACCOMMODATION We pride ourselves on providing clean, comfortable accommodation, that represents excellent value for money.   We present Studio Yindi as the type of space we look for when we are travelling nationally or internationally ourselves.  If we can find places to stay that are excellent value for money then it means we can spend longer travelling for the same budget amount! If you are comfortable with comfortable but sometimes recycled furniture and Ikea style kitchen equipment, and do not expect an apartment styled ready to be published in a trendy home magazine, then you will feel very much at home.   But if you are expecting a 5 star hotel standard of accommodation then you will probably be more comfortable staying at a much more expensive Airbnb site,  or a 5 star hotel in the city centre.
fields.neighbourhood_overview: Mosman is a smart, middle to upper class suburb on Sydney's lower north shore, with Sydney Harbour on 3 sides. Mosman shopping centre has a village feel that makes it popular for fashion and food shoppers from all over Sydney.  There is lots of natural bush and wildlife in Mosman - the kookaburras and lorikeets are guaranteed to give you a noisy brilliant early morning dawn chorus in the summer time!  Our location is convenient for a harbour edge walk to Manly, and visiting Sydney's famous Taronga Zoo. Studio Yindi is a great base for seeing Sydney in detail.  The hosts are regular oversees travellers themselves, and we enjoy the variety, surprise and informality of AirBnB accommodation. There are lots of interesting cafes and restaurants within 10 minutes drive, many of which will also home deliver.
fields.transit: GETTING TO STUDIO YINDI Upon confirming your booking we will provide you with the address and detailed instructions for reaching us by, car, taxi or public transport. We are within 5 minutes walk of the junction of Countess Park, Countess St, Mosman NSW 2088 Australia if you want to look up our location online. PUBLIC TRANSPORT TO/FROM STUDIO YINDI  Bus to Sydney city centre: 243, 2 minutes to bus stop & 18 minute trip.  Cost about $3.50 Bus to Mosman, Spit Junction: route 243, 2 minutes to bus stop & 5 minute trip. Bus to Taronga Zoo: 10 min. walk to stop on Military Rd then take route 247. Bus to Balmoral Beach: 10 minute walk to stop on Military Rd. Bus to Manly Beach: 10 minute walk to stop on Military Rd, then route 143 or 144 Buses to northern beaches: 10 minute walk to stop on Military Rd. Taxi to/from Sydney airport: 18 km, 25 minute cab ride costing about A$75 - $80 Distance to city centre: 7 km, 15 minute cab ride costing about A$25 Quite a few guests use Uber to get around S
fields.title: Studio Yindi @ Mosman, Sydney

fields.summary: Our home in Bondi Junction sleeps 8.  It is 3 kms to Bondi Beach, and a 5 min walk to the 100 hectare Centennial Park. 10 min walk to  retail shops, restaraunts and cinema complex. The Sydney city center is 3 kms away by bus or train. The airport is 25 mins away by taxi.
fields.description: Our home in Bondi Junction sleeps 8.  It is 3 kms to Bondi Beach, and a 5 min walk to the 100 hectare Centennial Park. 10 min walk to  retail shops, restaraunts and cinema complex. The Sydney city center is 3 kms away by bus or train. The airport is 25 mins away by taxi. Our lovely home, a period terrace in eastern Sydney, is available for 2016-17 Christmas-New Year.  (Approx. 22 Dec to 5 Jan) Our house is a 3 storey, brick terrace in a quiet, tree-lined, one-way street in Bondi Junction. The house is a fully furnished, family home with 4 double/twin bedrooms (with beds for 8) and 2 bathrooms. It features an open plan kitchen with stone bench tops, dishwasher, polished floorboards downstairs, carpet upstairs and private courtyard with a fire place.  We are just a 5 minute walk from the magnificent 100 hectare Centennial Park and mid way between the city (CBD) and Bondi Beach, each of which is about 3 kms away.  Very close to public transport and quality shopping.  Cost: Because this is
fields.neighbourhood_overview: We are on a quiet, tree lined, one-way street and in an up market, middle-class, family, residential area.
fields.transit: Very close to buses and trains.
fields.title: Christmas New Year - eastern Sydney

Very comfortable 4-bedroom, 3 bathroom home in a quiet leafy street with supermarket, great cafes, restaurants and parks within a few minutes walk. Catch a train direct to City / Circular Quay or the 370 bus to Coogee beach.

fields.summary: Tree Tops Retreat is a bright, airy, self contained studio apartment in the large garden of our family home in Avalon, on Sydney's beautiful Northern Beaches. A wonderful place to relax and unwind - and we offer long term discounts!
fields.description: Tree Tops Retreat is a bright, airy, self contained studio apartment in the large garden of our family home in Avalon, on Sydney's beautiful Northern Beaches. A wonderful place to relax and unwind - and we offer long term discounts! Ideal for individuals or couples who want to discover some of Australia's best beaches, bush walks, cafes and restaurants - it's an easy walk to all.  The perfect, quick getaway for busy city people who want to trade stress and deadlines for tranquility, trees, bird calls and beaches. Just a 50 minutes drive from the bustling centre of cosmopolitan Sydney.  45% discount offered for stays of a month or more.  25% discount for 1-4 weeks All water, electricity and gas is included in the price. The studio is bright and light with polished floors, high ceilings, an overhead fan and bi folding windows which open right up so you can sit back and gaze into the tree tops. The bed is very comfortable, with crisp white sheets and there are large fluffy towels.  Do as
fields.neighbourhood_overview: We love everything about living here and it's a place we know you will love too.
fields.transit: We are a two minute walk to the bus stop & there are a number of local taxi services and a friendly, reliable airport shuttle service.
fields.title: Tree Tops Retreat Avalon Beach

fields.summary: Huge light and airy 2 bdrm flat with dining room and sunroom. Great views from all windows and typical Bondi ornate ceilings. Suit creative folk. Prefer environmentally aware people-( no red meat please: chicken and fish are just fine.)  7 mins to the beach. Great backyard ! This is an old school Bondi block offering comfort not luxury. My personal belongings will remain in the flat with plenty of space provided for guests. On 2 bus routes: -3 blocks (7 mins) from Bondi Beach.

Prefer environmentally aware people-( no red meat please: chicken and fish are just fine.)  7 mins to the beach. Great backyard ! This is an old school Bondi block offering comfort not luxury. My personal belongings will remain in the flat with plenty of space provided for guests. On 2 bus routes: -3 blocks (7 mins) from Bondi Beach. Large sunny apartment in funky 1930's huge Bondi duplex with dining room, 2 bdrms and private enclosed sunroom off the front bedroom. 3 blocks to the beach, 2 mins to bus stop to Bondi Junction.  Pleasant surrounds, enormous backyard, creative household. All bedding and towels, lovely kitchen, wireless internet, phone calls (mobile, local and interstate) and washing facilities. There are 3 living areas so plenty of privacy if it is for 2 couples. Rooms have queen sized beds and ornate ceilings.  Prefer people who
fields.notes: This flat will suit environmentally aware, music and art loving people.  I would prefer guests to not eat or cook red meat in the house- but failing that to be meticulous about cleaning all cooking utensils, crockery and cutlery. There is a BBQ available outside. Please show respect to the planet -if you are not using an electronic appliance, turn it off at the wall. We are a dry continent so please be careful with water.
fields.neighbourhood_overview: Bondi is a great place to holiday in. It has many tourists and back packers so sometimes you may need to speak with party goers. Failing that , Bondi Police are very supportive of noise complaints unless it is a hectic night.  I will leave a list of my favourite coffee shops, eateries, doctors, DVD shops, ice cream shops etc. I have a degree in Contemporary Music and Aboriginal Studies so I have a lot of Aboriginal artifacts around the flat. I will leave a list of interesting venues and places to visit if you share that interest.
fields.transit: 3 Bus routes just around the corner. (PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN). Transport Info line is invaluable 131 500. Tell them where you are (closest cross streets)  and where you want to go and they will describe the best route to you detailing Bus numbers, bus stop numbers and scheduled times.
fields.title: Large funky apartment in Bondi.

This works out well if there is a group of people wishing to stay on a budget We remove the cabinets from the room to allow for the extra beds to be placed on the floor. We are happy for our guest to place there bags in the common area of the home this give you more room in the bedroom but that entiley up to you.

fields.summary: We are offering a private ensuite room in our heritage cottage in trendy Alexandria, close to the city in an a great area with fantastic cafes, bars and restaurants.

Private studio with own bathroom in our rustic heritage house in Sydney.  Very close to the city with loads of public transport in the area.  Walking distance to local cafes, pubs and Newtown.  Huge park across the road.  20 minutes by bus to Sydney Uni/UNSW.  Please note that we can only accommodate singles or couples.  Not suitable for kids due to our large dog. You will have access via private entrance, with access to the shared kitchen if needed, and a simple yet comfortable courtyard space with an outdoor setting. Free WIFI You will have access to the main house with the kitchen shared kitchen as well as the courtyard and laundry.  Entrance is available via the main house or the garden gate, as you prefer. My brother and I are both busy and not always at home so our space is best for independent travellers who are hap
fields.notes: Please note that there is currently some construction nearby and it can be noisy in the mornings, so if you are affected by general construction noise, this is not the place for you.  As we are situation conveniently close to the airport, there is the occasional plan flying over.
fields.neighbourhood_overview: This is a great area just outside of the main city with lots of great cafes and and parks.  Very close to all public transport to the city.  We have a great street with lots of friendly neighbours, lovely big trees and a nice suburban environment, yet minutes to the city.
fields.transit: There is a city bus across the road and train stations are 10 minutes walk from the house.  Uber is also super convenient, and there are plenty of share bikes around,

fields.summary: If you're looking for something comfortable & conveniently close to everything, this is the place for you! The apartment is bright and sunny, and occupies the whole top floor of an art deco block in the heart of Paddington. Seconds from Oxford Street shops and the 5 ways (lots of cafes and bars and a brilliant local supermarket). Easy access to both the City/Surry Hills or Bondi in the other direction. Other highlights are the view to Rushcutters Bay and a large, landscaped private garden.
fields.description: If you're looking for something comfortable & conveniently close to everything, this is the place for you! The apartment is bright and sunny, and occupies the whole top floor of an art deco block in the heart of Paddington. Seconds from Oxford Street shops and the 5 ways (lots of cafes and bars and a brilliant local supermarket). Easy access to both the City/Surry Hills or Bondi in the other direction. Other highlights are the view to Rushcutters Bay and a large, landscaped private garden. Large double bedroom with an adjoining sun room and desk, perfect for working travellers. The room is quiet and cool on hot summer nights, even though it's a short distance to all of Paddington's vibrant night life. Comfortable bedding & towels supplied, and there is plenty of wardrobe space. The sun room is populated with succulents and plants making it feel like your home away from home. If there are extra guests I have a double futon sofa bed in the lounge which is very comfortable. It is possible

fields.description: Quiet area and a close drive to the cbd or out to the country. Modern renovated home near central Sydney and close to Pennant Hills train station.  No additional price for second guest! We have a beautifully appointed rooms available within a 2 story 4 bedroom home. We are situated in historic Hills District in one of the most lovely forested suburbs near many parks and waterways. We are minutes drive away from local pubs, coffees, restaurants. We have two bedrooms with your own full private bathrooms. No extra charge for use of Free WiFi internet access,  printer/scanner use, and HD digital TV. Free parking is available. Perfect for single, couples, family or business executive. All bedrooms have their own LCD TV's for personal enjoyment. Koala Wild life park is only 2K away. The M60 bus runs in front of the house and you can take the Airport train to Pennant Hills station which is near the house. For those that drive we have lots of free street parking.  We are well traveled, interes
fields.notes: We don't charge a cleaning fee and appreciate if you tidy up after as we provide everything that way. Your assistance is appreciated.
fields.transit: A bus service to and from the local railway station runs from near our street. (about 200 metres away) Coming from the airport: Take the train from the airport to Central and change to a train to Pennant Hills (trains stopping at Pennant Hills will normally be marked as Hornsby trains via Macquarie Park and Epping). Exit the station to your right as you face the direction that the train is going. Cross the road on the pedestrian crossing and the bus stop is 20 metres up hill to your right. Catch the M60 direction Parramatta, and alight at CEDARWOOD in Cherrybrook and walk 200 meters to Beahan place. Turn right and we are second house on right. (no 4) Alternatively,Take the train to Town Hall in the CBD. Exit to George St and head west (downhill) via Druitt St to Kent St (passing York and Clarence as you go). fields.description: Light, bright and breezy one-bedroom unit. One minute's walk to Narrabeen Lagoon, three minutes walk to Narrabeen ocean beach, one of the world's top surfing beaches. Very quiet, visitor parking available. Located on the Northern Beaches, between Palm Beach and Manly.  Swimming, surfing, kayaking, fishing, walking...outdoors lifestyle. Buses to Sydney and Manly - ferry from Manly to Circular Quay (Sydney) takes 30 minutes.
fields.title: narrabeen,northern beaches,sydney

fields.summary: This room is quite large with a queen size bed. The flat is very well located between the pacific ocean and Sydney CBD. Enjoy the 15 minutes walk to the best beaches in Sydney Eastern suburbs. The area is quiet, with a friendly neighbourhood.
fields.description: This room is quite large with a queen size bed. The flat is very well located between the pacific ocean and Sydney CBD. Enjoy the 15 minutes walk to the best beaches in Sydney Eastern suburbs. The area is quiet, with a friendly neighbourhood. Welcome to Clovelly and thank you for checking out my listing!  The room is private. It is a large room with a queen size bed, and place for yoga or relaxation, and plenty of room in the wardrobe. It is sunny, facing west, with view to Sydney. There is a view to the pacific ocean from the living room. To be rented for the night or longer term. I am easy going, quiet, like outdoors, work in the city or interstate and usually away for the weekends. The flat to be shared with a French guy who welcomes anyone. LGBT, Gay and nudist friendly flat. Please contact me for more information and if you have any question. I am looking forward to welcoming you in the near future and hope to see you soon!  Guests will have access to all shared areas of the flat
fields.notes: I am easy going, so please make yourself home and do whatever you like. If you like jogging or swimming... When I rent my bedroom, I sleep in the living room, and that's ok for me as I do that almost all the time, but you need to be ok to share the living room when I am there. There are some nude body art pictures as wallpaper, hope you are ok with that.
fields.neighbourhood_overview: Neighbourhood is very quiet and friendly
fields.transit: Perfect Location: This flat is very well located, the bus stop is just across the street and a bus going to Sydney CBD takes about 20 mins, plus its only 10 minutes walk to the beach! There is easy parking on the street if you need to park a car.
fields.title: Large sunny room in a friendly flat

fields.description: The bed is a sofa couch in the lounge of a spacious one bedroom apartment.  We are a couple that works Monday to Friday 9-5 jobs therefore while on the weekends we are very flexible with check in / check out times, during the weekdays check in times will need to be after 7.00pm and check out before 7.30am.  There is a lift in our building and you will need to buzz us to get in. Our apartment is located approx 4km to the city. The city can be reached by bus or train. The bus stop is just in front of our building and the airport train line (Green Square station) is a short 5 minutes walk away. It is a 2 or 3 stop train journey to the domestic and international airport terminals or one stop in the other direction to the city central station. Alternatively, the city is a 40 minute walk away.  The apartment is very new and clean with wireless internet access, washing machine / dryer and kitchen facilities available. Please only use the kitchen for simple meal preparation if required. Non sm

Located in a quite street with great views and close to beaches, parks and cafes. Spacious, fully furnished apartment in Clovelly/Randwick with lots of greenery. It's suitable for couple's or friends' sharing. Located in a quite street, Marcel Avenue, with great views, it is conveniently close to parks, beaches, cafes, shops and large shopping centres. It's embedded in the most attractive area close to Bronte, Clovelly and Coogee beaches. fields.summary: My comfortable apartment, with high ceilings and polished floors, is a quintessential Bondi experience. Featuring a private master bedroom, perfect for one to two guests, it is just minutes from the ocean whilst offering easy access to Sydney's East and the city.
fields.description: My comfortable apartment, with high ceilings and polished floors, is a quintessential Bondi experience. Featuring a private master bedroom, perfect for one to two guests, it is just minutes from the ocean whilst offering easy access to Sydney's East and the city. I'm a millennial creative, situated in a beautiful, thirties era, brick building in relaxed Bondi Beach. You're invited to take advantage of my spacious (45m/sq) home. My apartment is on the top floor of the building, has polished wood floors throughout, high ceilings, and faces north west catching all-day sun. The apartment is furnished with an eclectic collection of art, furnishings and plants, ensuring you feel right at home throughout your stay. You'll have access to the private master bedroom and the shared living areas of the apartment during your stay. The north facing bedroom features a queen-size bed and 100% flax linen bedding. The large living room features a reclaimed timber lounge and complimentary slung leather a
fields.neighbourhood_overview: North Bondi is a super friendly neighbourhood with its mix of young families, creatives, surfers, the fashion set and travellers... and my apartment is centrally located amidst the neighbourhood's dynamic lifestyle. The locale boasts a unique village-feel, complete with green grocer, bakery, butcher, deli and a number of cafés and restaurants. I’m happy to supply you with a list of my pick of the local spots to help you make the most of your stay. Of course, the breath-taking surf beach is also only a few minutes walk away!
fields.transit: Whilst most things you could want are within walking distance here in Bondi, a trip to Sydney isn't complete without seeing some of the sites of our beautiful harbour city. To head into Sydney there are a number of public transport options really easily accessed from our apartment: 386/387 bus route between Vaucluse and Bondi Junction. 379 bus route between North Bondi and Bondi Junction. 380/333 bus route between Dover Heights and Circular Quay, via Bondi Beach waterfront, Bondi Junction, Paddington, Surry Hills, Hyde Park. Eastern Suburbs train line from Bondi Junction to Central, connecting to the entire train network. There is on street parking available, with a 2 hour limit during the day, unlimited overnight.
fields.title: Sunny Room in Art Deco

fields.notes: We've a few reasons for the 6.00pm arrival time / check in / bag drop time... One of them is that we're really flexible with check out times. :) While we do work from home, we don't particularly want to broadcast on the internet if we are away from home. That's why our arrival time is always listed as 6pm. Our "check in" / "arrival time" / "bag drop" is all the same thing. It's not like we're a hotel with a team of porters waiting to take your bags any time of the day or night whether we're at home or not. So, if we haven't agreed some alternate arrangements, then we look forward to welcoming you to our home at 6.00pm. While we may be able to arrange some arrival times / bag drops / check ins earlier, we do need to make those arrangements well in advance. So if the 6.00pm check in time isn't your preference, please talk to us about it *before* you make your reservation. :) :)
fields.neighbourhood_overview: Pyrmont is an inner-city village of Sydney, only about 2kms from the Sydney CBD (Central Business District) / Core, right next door to Darling Harbour and Chinatown. https://www.airbnb.com.au/locations/sydney/pyrmont Pyrmont has a relaxed community feel with an inner city vibe. Pyrmont is only about 2kms (10 - 15 mins walk) from the centre of Sydney with an extensive range of local restaurants, wine bars, and pubs. There's some seriously good baristas and cafes right close to our home (Go and say hi to Damien & Tim at Bar Zini - it's one of our local faves). There's five star fine dining right through to greasy-spoon takeaways with some of Australia's finest dining restaurants within easy reach. * Darling Harbour and Cockle Bay * Exhibition and Convention Centres * Sydney Fish Markets * Pyrama Point Park * Jones Bay Wharf * The Star (Casino) with Food Halls, Bars, and the Lyric Theatre * Powerhouse Museum * National Maritime Museum Also (back on the food - notice a theme?): * Two groce
fields.transit: Our home is centrally located and an easy walk to everywhere (everywhere you want to go anyways). We also have easy access to trams (light-rail), trains, and ferries which are all conveniently a few minutes walk away. Transport options are great:  There's a bus, the 389, pretty much at our doorstep every 10 minutes. It goes into the City Centre, into Paddington, all the way to Bondi Beach and on to North Bondi - Doesn't get better than that! Trams ("light-rail") every 12 minutes. - Central Station, Fish Markets, The Star, Chinatown, Glebe - Central to Dulwich Hill. Ferries from Pyrmont Bay, Darling Harbour and Circular Quay are a great way to explore. Trains from Town Hall, Central, and Wynyard. A main Sydney City (Town Hall) train station is only 10-15 minutes walk away. Central Station is 15 - 20 minutes walk (5 mins by bus or tram). Airports: The international and Domestic airports are only about 15 - 20 minutes drive away (longer during traffic peaks), again, all easily accessible

The stop for the main Bus routes is at the end of the street (380 & 333 to the city or, going the other direction, continue on to Watson's Bay and South Head). All three pass through Bondi Junction Station interchange. This in turn services the greater rail network. If you are coming via the airport rail line it is simplest to alight at Museum station and then take either the 333 or 380 from Liverpool / Oxford st corner of  Hyde Park.

fields.description: I'm happy to welcome nice non-smoking travelers to my lovely Daintrey Gardens haven in Fairlight in magnificent Manly. For those seeking an escape from the busyness of traveling, come relax in my Zen garden and let your burdens and worries dissolve. I am offering peaceful and private share accommodation in my terrific Daintrey Gardens townhouse in the leafy suburb of Fairlight for non-smokers, only 15-20 mins mins scenic walk from the bustle of Manly Village and the ferries. Conveniently located, I am just a short walk to the city buses; One minute to the amazing swim centre and the free community bus which takes you all around the Manly suburbs; a nice stroll to the Pacific Ocean beaches and in the inner harbour foreshores.  It's actually only 15 mins by road to the Harbour Bridge, the gateway to the CBD but taking the 30 min Manly Ferry  is a wonderful relaxing way to feel part of our beautiful harbour foreshores.  Fresh sheets and towels provided.  There's also a comfy travel cot fo
fields.notes: Fortunately in my culture, we don't need to take our shoes off or leave them at the front door for everyone to trip over. So please follow this while you're visiting. There's nothing worse than smelly feet and smelly socks traipsing all around the home leaving odours. Take any shoes and bags to your room so we can all enjoy a clutter free and tidy space.
fields.neighbourhood_overview: The neighbourhood is close to everywhere. It's quiet, it's peaceful, it's hilly in places so very picturesque.

Cute galley style kitchen well equipped with matching crockery, glasses and quality Scanpan cooking pots.  Sunny and breezy, floorboards throughout. Cooking facilities, towels, bedding provided. Free broadband Internet and cable TV with all the movie channels  Large Plasma TV - see lounge room picture.  Bathroom is rendered in modern tones and has a medium sized bath.  Stays of a week or longer can request a weekly clean and linen change for a small fee.  Seconds to cafes and restaurants. Step out of your door step, out onto the street of what was formerly known as the “rag district”, and you are placed in an urbane and gentrified hub of the bohemian Sydney village of Surry Hills, Sydney. The apartment’s long rectangular floor space gives a great sense of flow and openness.  Enter the front door into the middle of a long corridor which separates the apartment’s two main areas: the living area including balcony facing out to Holt Street; and the back-end sleeping quarter. Out the front door it is a 2-minute walk to the North Bondi village, with great cafes, cool little neighbourhood restaurants and local shops.  Meander another 2 minutes and you are on the sand of Bondi beach.  On the way, stop for a glass of wine and a plate of calamari at trendy North Bondi Fish.  Or pop upstairs for a schooner of beer and the best views of Bondi Beach at the laid back RSL Club, where travellers are always welcome.

The train to and from the airport to my house is a 30 minute trip from door to door with a short walk from the train station to the house. It's great and costs approximately $18AUD each way. fields.description: Stylish and eclectically decorated two bedroom Bondi apartment. The apartment is set peacefully at the rear of a boutique refurbished Arts & Crafts period apartment block, the 104 m2 space is very comfortable. It has high ceilings, is well furnished in an eclectic 'boho' style and I keep it very clean and tidy.  The private bedroom has a very comfortable double bed, fresh towels & sheets, wardrobe, dressing table and free internet. Tea, coffee etc and basic home products (laundry/ cleaning products, etc) are

fields.neighbourhood_overview: The area: A brisk 10 minute walk to Bondi beach and the scenic coastal paths to Bronte, Clovelly or to the cliffs of Dover Heights. Wine and dine at the local cafes and restaurants, soak up the music from local venues, go crazy with shopping at Bondi Junction or take the bus/ train/ $25 cab fare to the Sydney nightlife and attractions. Nearby restaurants: Japanese, Thai, Indian, Vegetarian, French, Modern, Pizza, Seafood, many great cafes to hang out. Good take-away food outlets as well as grocery stores, wine shops and delis for all your food needs. I look forward to welcoming you to Bondi!  Activities you may want to do while in Bondi/Sydney: Near my place:  Scuba diving at Camp Cove, horse riding or bike riding in Queens Park, walking along the cliffs from Coogee to The Gap, the Bondi-Bronte cliff walk, walking along the shore of the Harbour from Rose bay to Nielsens Park , renting a small catamaran in Rose Bay, or if you are a pro - get yourselves down to Rushcutters  Bay yacht clu
fields.transit: The 389 bus from the city drops you off directly in front of the building. The train station in Bondi junction to take you to the city is a 4/5 minutes bus ride or a 10 minute walk.

Everything is in on your door step – Woolworths Supermarkets is located 150m from the apartment making it easy for you to stock up on groceries, laundromats and dry cleaners a few doors down, post office across the road and all majors banks and ATMs within 100m.   On the weekend, stroll over to the markets right across the road for all types of great stalls from fresh food, organic produce, vintage clothes, plants, & flowers to name a few. At night there is so much to see and do, restaurants, bars, nightclubs. Potts point really comes alive at night! You won't be sitting around.  I have become well accustomed to all the restaurants and bars in the area and supply a list on arrival  of places I highly recommend if you are lost for ideas during your stay. It's only 5 stops away from Sydney Central Station. The key to a successful Airbnb hosting and stay is that the inter-personal communication and style of the host and the guest should align.  All of the guests I have over the last four years that I have hosted were very mature, respectful and house-trained. Everyone knows that because they are not living in their own homes, they have to follow the host's house rules and can't just bring most especially the bad habits or ways they got used to where they came from. It is brimming with little cafes, great restaurants, bars and bookshops. This apartment
fields.neighbourhood_overview: Potts Point has undergone a huge transformation to become one of the trendiest, most appealing neighbourhoods in Sydney. It's one of the most sought-after areas and best-kept secrets in the city, and around every corner is something incredible to do or see.  The neighbourhood is full of Art Deco apartment blocks, terraces squeezed between multi-level buildings, as well as small, quaint and intriguing cafes, bars and boutique shops. Leafy, tree-lined streets alternate between avenues full of bustling life.  The location of our apartment is convenient to everything. Surrounded by fine dining restaurants, quirky bars and antique and retro shops. The organic fresh farmer market is held every weekend and both Woolworths and Harris Farm are close by. The Kings Cross train station is an easy 10 minute walk and the Sydney CBD, Opera House, Botanical Gardens and Rushcutters Bay are all within walking distance.
fields.transit: One of the best things about Potts Point is how close it is to everything.  The nearest train station (Kings Cross) is a 10 minute walk away, where you can get to Bondi, the CBD, or any of the suburban train lines. To get to the CBD, it's a leisurely 15 minute stroll, or a four minute train ride from Kings Cross Train Station. Rushcutters Bay Park is also less than a 10 minute walk away; one of the best-kept secrets in Sydney for an afternoon walk, picnic, or bottle of wine at the bay. You can also easily walk to the Circular Quay/Opera House Precinct, Australian Museum, Royal Botanical Gardens, Historical Woolloomooloo and the Rocks Area. In fact, most of Sydney's best tourist sites are incredibly close to the apartment! GETTING TO/FROM AIRPORT  – Taxi/Uber is probably the easiest/quickest option, approx. 20 minute in light traffic, costing around $35.  – Otherwise, there are various shuttle bus services that leave from the Main International and Domestic Terminals (to get to the apar
fields.title: Great Location, Paris End,  Potts Point Sydney
