Uber is highly recommended around Sydney as it's close to 40% of normal taxi fares. Getting here from the airport via taxi around $35-40 or by train which is around $16 (not recommended if you have luggage as it's hilly from the station around 15-20mins walk).

fields.description: Stay in the heart of Surry Hills, the best neighbourhood in Sydney. This comfortable, secure and clean one bedroom apartment on the 4th floor has fantastic city views and is only a short stroll to Central Station, Crown street cafes, bars and restaurants, Oxford street, Chinatown, Darling Harbour and the City. It's the perfect base to explore Sydney from, with everything you'll need for a great stay. And facing north, it gets great light throughout the year. Features: - Large private sunny balcony with fantastic city views - Unlimited Wifi - Apple iMac with unlimited internet - Bluetooth sound system - Solid timber polished floor boards - Air conditioning - Tastefully & comfortably furnished  - Security Intercom - North facing (sunny) - Smart TV with Netflix, youtube etc.  - Xbox & a selection of games  - Dvd player (in the Xbox)  - Dishwasher  - Fridge  - Microwave  - Oven/grill  - Cutlery, utensils, pots, pans etc.  - Iron/board - Hotel quality Queen size bed with fresh sheets - Show
fields.title: Central + Surry Hills + Views + YAY

fields.summary: If you are looking for something nice, spacious, convenient and close to everything, this is the place for you!
fields.description: If you are looking for something nice, spacious, convenient and close to everything, this is the place for you! We have a 2 bedroom apartment, in a very easy and handy location, minutes walk to the city, shops, restaurants and transport.  We are in Chippendale, there is plenty of good cafes, funky restaurants, wine bars and art galleries around,including the world famous White Rabbit Gallery. We are also 10 minutes walk to Redfern or Central train Stations, 20 min walk to the city, close to Broadway Shopping Centre and the new Central Park where you can do your shopping and 20 min walk to the buzzing Newtown, Surry Hills and Darling Harbour with all of their restaurants and pubs . It is very very easy to get to all Sydney's major attractions from here - you are one easy 15 min bus ride or train ride away from the Opera House and the Harbour Bridge. We are also minutes drive to Bondi Beach and walking distance to Royal Prince Alfred Hospital (RPA), Sydney University (USYD), University o
fields.notes: To get to our apartment from the Airport the 2 easiest options are: Train - about AU$18 per person. It comes every 5 to 10 minutes and it takes about 10-15 minutes into Redfern or Central, then you have to walk for about 10 minutes to the apartment. Taxi - the easiest option and most cost effective if there is more than 1 of you. It cost between $25-$45 and it takes about 20 minutes (allow a little more time to get into and from the International Airport).
fields.neighbourhood_overview: Chippendale is a small suburb in Sydney,  and it is quickly becoming one of the coolest, most underground, creative and funky suburbs in Sydney with all it's cafes, art galleries, restaurants, bars, parks and it's big sustainable community, which keeps verge gardens full of fruit, vegetables and herbs for all to share!
fields.transit: My favourite way to get around is by bike, or simply by foot (note it is a 20-55 minute walk into the city depending on where you are going). We have 2 train stations walking distance from the apartment, Central Station (+or- 12 min walk) or Redfern Station (+or- 8 min walk), we also have buses all around us.
fields.title: Beautiful 2 Bedroom Apt Min Walk to the City

fields.summary: Coogee is an extraordinary place to enjoy a beach holiday while being close to the City, Opera House and of course Bondi.  You are welcome to stay at the Coogee Studio Apartment with the beach just 500 metres away and with some of Sydney's best restaurants even closer.
fields.description: Coogee is an extraordinary place to enjoy a beach holiday while being close to the City, Opera House and of course Bondi.  You are welcome to stay at the Coogee Studio Apartment with the beach just 500 metres away and with some of Sydney's best restaurants even closer. Coogee has one of Sydney's finest beaches (some would say its the best) and yet its so close to the CBD. The Coogee Studio Apartment is just 5 minutes walk from the beach.  Its been designed to be light, bright with glass windows that open to allow the sea breeze to flow right throughout the apartment. The internal space is around 25 square metres or 270 square feet. With a small kitchenette and an ensuite this apartment is just perfect for parents visiting their children, for holiday makers and anyone who loves the beach. Being in the city the Studio is no monastery, we do get some noise from the street, also we do have mosquitoes in Summer but we have various products to help.  At the moment we seem to have a number of
fields.notes: Terms and conditions: The accommodation cost includes all linen and towels.   The Premises are cleaned before and after your stay, with cleaning during a long stay at times to be agreed.   Free wifi is available (downloading videos is not permitted). Any booking of the Premises is subject to the following cancellation policy: 1.You can cancellation your booking up to two weeks before the first date of your booking to stay in the Premises. I will refund the deposit less a $50 administration fee. Alternatively, you can agree to treat the payment as the deposit for a future booking; 2.Sorry, but no refunds for cancellations two weeks or less before the first date of your booking. Talk to me if you feel you have extenuating circumstances; 3.I can terminate the booking for any reason prior to the first date of your booking and you will be refunded your deposit in full;  4.No refund will be made after a stay has commenced; and 5.I can terminate the booking for any breaches of the terms and c
fields.neighbourhood_overview: Perfectly located the apartment is within minutes walk from a supermarket and 5 minutes walk from the beach. There are regular buses to the CBD, Bondi Junction and catch a bus from almost right outside the door to Newtown, UNSW, Prince of Wales Hospital or Sydney University.
fields.transit: Public Transport is readily available, with regular buses going from Coogee to the city, central station, and circular quay, Bondi Junction and Maroubra Junction.    All buses leave down from the beach.
fields.title: Coogee Studio Apartment

fields.summary: Large room in a high-ceilinged, light-filled apartment.  Charming, well-maintained 1917 apartment building with garden.  Experienced, friendly and helpful host.  Great location with supermarkets, dozens of restaurants nearby.  Bus stop at front.
fields.description: Large room in a high-ceilinged, light-filled apartment.  Charming, well-maintained 1917 apartment building with garden.  Experienced, friendly and helpful host.  Great location with supermarkets, dozens of restaurants nearby.  Bus stop at front. A charming Art Deco building, but with all the modern conveniences, including good WiFi.  Very well located, just across the Harbour Bridge from the city, but also easy to get to beaches and coastal walks. Your room is well equipped with a comfortable king single bed, cupboard space, sofa, desk, WiFi, ceiling fan, fan/heater, clock/radio, hair dryer.  Shared use of the bathroom and kitchen, where you can keep and cook your own food.  Coffee and tea provided.  Arrival time is flexible (I can leave a key for you). I try to strike a balance between being friendly and helpful while also giving guests privacy.  I'm happy to discuss your day's adventures, or help you plan tomorrow's, but also happy to give you as much privacy as you need.  My lifesty
fields.notes: Great location for weddings in Mosman, watching New Year's Eve fireworks from Cremorne Point, or working in North Sydney or the City. The flat is on the top floor of a three-storey building, with no lift/elevator.
fields.neighbourhood_overview: Lively neighbourhoods in both directions, with supermarkets, shops and dozens of restaurants, as well as one of Sydney's oldest and best cinemas, all within 5 minutes' walk.  Beautiful North Sydney Pool is a pleasnt 45-minute walk away.  It's also easy to walk down to the north shore of Sydney Harbour for some gorgeous coastal walks.
fields.transit: There is a bus stop out front, with frequent direct buses to the city (just 10 minutes), as well as Manly Beach, Balmoral Beach, Taronga Zoo, Chinatown and Newtown.  Also buses to North Sydney and Chatswood if you have business meetings.     Easy to get here by train and bus from the airport.
fields.title: 10 minutes to the city centre

fields.summary: Welcome to The United Nations of Redfern, right beside Sydney's Downtown! Guests from across the world have made this huge, comfortable, centrally-located home their own - for vacations, reunions, work, romantic getaways - and honeymoons! The Opera House and Harbour Bridge are an easy 40 minute walk, or just ten minutes on the City Circle train from Redfern.
fields.description: Welcome to The United Nations of Redfern, right beside Sydney's Downtown! Guests from across the world have made this huge, comfortable, centrally-located home their own - for vacations, reunions, work, romantic getaways - and honeymoons! The Opera House and Harbour Bridge are an easy 40 minute walk, or just ten minutes on the City Circle train from Redfern. The space In the past four years, we have welcomed people from every continent (except Antarctica!) We have hosted Muslims, Jews, Hindus, Christians, Buddhists, atheists and probably other faiths. All have been welcomed, and everyone always will be here. Very GLBTI-friendly. Very straight friendly too! During these times when the world is on edge, travel is a wonderful way for people to connect. •	Secure undercover parking is available - shared between our other apartments. If you want to park, please inquire about availability before booking. •	This is a huge, stylish apartment on a quiet street, just four blocks to Downtown! This
fields.neighbourhood_overview: Proximity to the city! You cannot beat the neighbourhoods which abut the CBD for convenience, and Redfern Station is one of the best for getting EVERYWHERE in Sydney. I love the history, the architecture, the mix of people from every imaginable culture who live side by side on this very modern Sydney village. Redfern is one of the oldest areas in Sydney, and yet this place is so quiet considering how close it is to the middle of Sydney. It's a mix of 19th century terrace houses, conversions and new apartment developments. The area was down-at-heels for years, but its proximity to the city and intact history has seen it blossom into a new, funky area (wall to wall retro furniture shops and new small bars) in the last 10 years. The city centre is on your doorstep, and two major railways stations within a five minute walk means that the whole of Sydney is easily accessible. The Eastern Suburbs line goes through Redfern, so Bondi Station and the Eastern Suburbs are about 16 minutes away. B
fields.transit: Central Station is 800 meters away (845 yards) so all train lines - including the Airport Line  are walking distance. The train trip is about 11 minutes, and the walk across Prince Alfred Park is another 10. Redfern Station is 400 meters (430 yards) away. About 1km (.6 of a mile) to Sydney University or the University of Technology, Sydney.
fields.title: Huge Sydney Apartment + Parking

fields.summary: Our top floor penthouse space - available in our 5 bedroom family home in the magnificent beach side suburb of Manly in Sydney. We are a 3 min walk to the sand of Manly Beach without crossing a road and a 7 min walk to the ferry to go into the city. Ideal if you are working in the city. You will be joining our family, so references required, however this is ideal for professionals who travel to Sydney periodically or someone with a child who wishes to stay a few days.
fields.description: Our top floor penthouse space - available in our 5 bedroom family home in the magnificent beach side suburb of Manly in Sydney. We are a 3 min walk to the sand of Manly Beach without crossing a road and a 7 min walk to the ferry to go into the city. Ideal if you are working in the city. You will be joining our family, so references required, however this is ideal for professionals who travel to Sydney periodically or someone with a child who wishes to stay a few days. The penthouse is a double bedroom with over head fan, lounge and relaxation space, private bathroom with views into the harbour. Loads of cafes and restaurants within 5 mins of our house. Whole house, including top floor penthouse bedroom with balcony with views of beach and harbour Happy to direct you to interesting places, transport, etc... Walk to
fields.notes: You will be residing inside our family home with us, therefore you must be prepared for family engagement, however you will have your own space on the top floor and we leave you alone. Own double bedroom, own bathroom, own lounge area. Share kitchen. Price listed is for ONE person. Additional rate for extra person applies.  This space is far superior to any other space or basic room in Manly. It is a stylish, entire exclusive area with lounge, private bathroom and relaxation space in a premium property situated on Eastern Hill in Manly. The balcony is occasionally used by family.
fields.neighbourhood_overview: Walk to beach, shops, ferry, numerous bars, restaurants, cafes, library, yoga studio, gym, ocean world. We are close to everything.
fields.transit: Ferry into the city is 7 minutes away, buses also available at ferry terminal. Everything yu need is within walking distance, no more than 10 minutes.
fields.title: Top floor penthouse. Views of NYE fireworks!!

fields.description: Hi, my kids are now grown and living on their own so I am keen to share my Sydney apartment. It is located parkside in Petersham with a great view of the surrounding area and City Skyline. It is a modern, bright large split level space, with living areas upstairs and 2 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms and 2  veranda's downstairs. The complex has a lift and is security coded. There are 2 train stations and a bus stop within 5 minutes walk. all of which are 10 minutes from the centre of the City. It is an easy walk to the restaurants and cafes of eclectic  Newtown or the sensational tastes of little Portugal in Petersham and little Italy in Leichhardt. Bookshops, curios and arthouse theatres are all in walking distance. Your accommodation is a large well appointed air-conditioned bedroom, complete with a new Queen size bed, beautiful linens, wardrobe space with generous mirrors.Your room opens onto a private balcony where you can enjoy your morning coffee. You will have your own newly renovated ele
fields.title: Sydney City Apartment  Petersham

fields.summary: Modern Terrace House. Minutes walk Hyde Park, Town Hall, CBD. Door to door for airport. Mod cons. Quiet, leafy street. Local cafes, pub, wine bars. Great neighbours. Great public transport. Respectful guests who enjoy getting out and about.
fields.description: Modern Terrace House. Minutes walk Hyde Park, Town Hall, CBD. Door to door for airport. Mod cons. Quiet, leafy street. Local cafes, pub, wine bars. Great neighbours. Great public transport. Respectful guests who enjoy getting out and about. SHARED SPACE for Host and Guest • Fully furnished traditional Terrace House • 2 levels (stairs), snug but comfortable  • White tiles on the bottom level keep the place cool in summer and contains the heat in winter surprisingly. Beautiful wooden floors in bedrooms upstairs  • Eclectic mix of fresh white, vintage and retro furniture  • Front room features Apple TV and Wifi  • Back door leads into a delightfully old fashioned outdoor bathroom, patio & lush garden, all well covered; plus small clothes line for fresh clothes hanging  • Shoes off and left at front door please GUEST ROOM • Comfortable single bedroom that includes vintage wooden bed frame, mattress + protector, Sheridan bed linen, side table and pouf, table lamp, clothes rack, hanging draw
fields.notes: LOCAL ATTRACTIONS • Art Gallery of NSW, Taronga Zoo, Manly, Bondi Beach, the Botanical Gardens and the Domain, Circular Quay, The Rocks, Darling Harbour, Watson's Bay EXERCISE • Swimming or Gym: Cook & Phillip Pool, City Gym and Boy Charlton Pool  • Plenty of yoga places around the corner RESTAURANTS & CAFES • Philosophy on Stanley Street (great coffee and breakfast / lunch) • Bar Reggio for pizza, Reggio Lounge on Stanley Street (well priced Italian / pasta for lunch and dinner) • Big Boy Thai on Stanley Street (lunch and dinner) • Samurai for Japanese on Stanley Street (lunch and dinner) • Quattro Passi on Liverpool street (great Italian food and coffee for breakfast, lunch and some dinners) BARS & PUBS • Love Tilly Devine (wine bar) • The Commons (wine bar) • East Village, East Sydney Hotel and Lord Roberts (local pubs) SUPERMARKETS • Woolworth's supermarket is the closest on Crown street Woolloomooloo. IGA on Oxford street (pricey). For fresher produce, try Paddy's Markets in China
fields.neighbourhood_overview: Amazingly friendly, safe and good natured neighbours!   My place is surprisingly quiet given its close proximity to Stanley Street. The location of the guest room is at the back so guests don't get impacted by walkers by in the evening.
fields.transit: TRAINS   Closest Train Station: Museum Train Station, Elizabeth Street, Sydney 4 stops from Domestic terminal and 5 stops from International terminal. Buy an Opal card for train, bus and Ferry. 5-10 min walk to house. Walking from Museum Station 1. Exit at Museum Train Station 2. Head East through Hyde Park until you reach College Street 3. Cross the road at College Street and walk down Francis Street 4. Walk down Francis Street until you reach Yurong Street 5. At Yurong Street turn left and head north along Yurong Street and you have arrived at the destination (confirmed one week before arrival) on the left side of the street. • St James and Town Hall are other close options BUSES:  • Plenty of buses on William Street or Oxford Street - buy an Opal Card at the local convenience store   UBER / TAXI's • Uber to the city $8-10 depending on time • Taxis from Oxford Street or William Street highly frequent WALKING • 2 mins to Hyde Park, 5 mins to Botanical Gardens and 15 to Circular Quay
fields.title: PRIME LOCATION, HYDE PARK & CBD, transport close

fields.description: This is a lovely sunny flat in the very centre of Newtown. I don't use instant book but I reply very quickly so if you like this place.  Be a tiny bit patient please.  ie..... Don't book somewhere else! This is a very fun area with lots of great restaurants, bars, theatres and cinemas all walking distance.  Coffee is available on every corner and in between.    There is a lot of street life yet this is still a peaceful flat.  The bedroom window is double glazed to make sure.    There is still noise in the evenings from 9-12pm on Friday and Saturday nights.   This is because of the amazing location. The apartment has high ceilings and lots of light. The lounge is very large and easy to fall asleep on.   Yes we have fast WIFI.  3 minutes walk to the train station and bus into the city.   20 mins by bus to the Opera House and Harbour Bridge.   Train is 3 stops to the City. If you stay here, can you please please bring me a fridge magnet from your home town or country.   My fridge has had
fields.neighbourhood_overview: This area is unique.  People are free to be themselves here and it brings all types because of it.  The streets are like a moving gallery.   I love it.
fields.transit: We are in the centre of the universe.... we think!   And transport out of here is easy.
fields.title: 1 bedroom Flat in Newtown Sydney

fields.summary: A stunning 2 bedroom apartment with relaxing balcony overlooking lush landscaped gardens and glorious outdoor 20m pool. Close to Paddington shops, cafes, and famous pubs! Directly opposite the SCG and SFS, perfect for sport and concerts alike!

fields.neighbourhood_overview: Stanmore is a great base for Sydney exploration. You're 3 minutes walk to Stanmore station. Town Hall is 20 minutes from the front door. Two of Sydney's culinary centres, Newtown and Leichardt, are 15 minutes walk away. The suburb itself showcases some of Sydney's late 19th and early 20th century architecture. Sydney University is 15 minutes walk away.
fields.transit: Trains run regularly to the city - 3 minutes walk to the station. Buses are also easily accessed. Sydney University, Newtown and Leichardt can be accessed on foot (15 mins).

fields.neighbourhood_overview: Allambie Heights is a suburb of northern Sydney, in the state of New South Wales, Australia. Located only 15 kilometres north-east of the Sydney CBD! The popular suburb of Manly is a short 10 minute drive away. We are also only a 10 minute drive from many of the beautiful local beaches including the popular Dee Why beach. Allambie Heights shops has an IGA supermarket, bakery, butcher, bottle shop, newsagency etc and is a leisurely 15 minute walk, where you can kick back at one of the local coffee shops or indulge at one of the three restaurants or fish & chip shop.
fields.transit: Public transport to Manly and the City is only a 5 minute walk to the bus stop on Allambie Road. Uber or Taxis are great also for short distances if you do not have a car. There is also a local car hire company who would be happy to drop off a car for your arrival. **If you would like to be picked up or dropped off to and from the airport, I am happy to offer this service at a fee.** Please contact me directly for details once you have made your booking.

Close to shops, park and transport (15 minute bus to City, 5 minute bus to Bondi Junction, 20 mins to Bondi Beach). Stylish one bedroom furnished apartment in Paddington/ Centennial Park with access to gorgeous tropical garden available  over June / July. Apartment is fully private in what was originally a large house. High ceilings, quiet and light filled. Fully furnished with wifi, stereo and TV. Sofa bed, inflatable sofa Great place to base yourself while visiting Sydney. Perfectly 2 minutes walk to fashionable Oxford Street Paddington shops  and Centennial Park and between city and Bondi Beach. Lots of public transport options.  Feel free to ask any questions. There are many amenities including supermarket, restaurants, pubs, night clubs within walking di
fields.neighbourhood_overview: Great neighbourhood. Close to the action but very quiet and peaceful. Paddington/ Centennial Park/ Woollahra are some of Sydney's loveliest suburbs.
fields.transit: 2 minutes walk to Centennial Park. Oxford St and Queen Street shops and restaurants.  Buses every few minutes along Oxford st to City, Bondi Junction, Newtown and beaches.
fields.title: Stylish/ Central Sydney Apartment

fields.summary: The perfect base for seeing the sights in Sydney
fields.description: The perfect base for seeing the sights in Sydney Welcome to Sydney! Large 1 bedroom apartment, centrally located only 50m from the sparkling waters of Sydney Harbour. Please check out my other listing in the same building. This apartment has lovely views and is perfect for 2-3 guests. https://www.airbnb.com.au/rooms/9615999?guests=3&s=yjfCHYlw Your new base in Sydney's Woolloomooloo, home to actors and celebrities, is the backdrop to this well located apartment and moments from the stunning landscaped Botanical Gardens - 30 hectares/75 Acres of gorgeous gardens nestled behind the iconic Opera House. This apartment suite is the perfect base for the busy traveller. You will sleep well in a king size bed and the kitchen is fully equipped for self catering. If you are coming with friend or bringing the family, then there is a king single bed plus king single trundle bed sharing the living space. This is an open plan apartment but you will be in a seperate room unlike most hotel suites. Ind
fields.notes: Free Wi-fi
fields.neighbourhood_overview: Woolloomooloo is a s close to the CBD as you can get without being right in the midst of high rises.  You will be within walking distance to some of the best attractions Sydney has to offer. The walk through The Botanical Gardens, Domain or Hyde Park is a great way to start your day. Mrs Macquarie's Chair is a 15 minute walk away and offers one of the best vantage points of Sydney Harbour. This is the iconic Sydney view!
fields.transit: The bus stop is a 2 minute walk from the apartment. Here you can catch the 311 into the city or in the opposite direction to Central. The red Hop on/Hop off bus also stops here. This is a great way to cover a lot of the attractions in Sydney.
fields.title: Sydney Opera House-20min walk

fields.summary: A private studio-style room with its own bathroom in our backyard. You have a separate entrance and there is plenty of parking. Public transport is close-by. We leave you to your own devices but are very happy to give you all the advice you need.
fields.description: A private studio-style room with its own bathroom in our backyard. You have a separate entrance and there is plenty of parking. Public transport is close-by. We leave you to your own devices but are very happy to give you all the advice you need. We've built a new guest room with its own bathroom in our backyard. It's private, quiet and has leafy views across to the Japanese maple. Our house is home for our family of four, but you have your own separate space.  We live in a suburban area near the bush but are close to both the city, Chatswood and the business centre of North Ryde. Depending which direction you are heading we are 5 - 15 minute walk from buses to the city, Chatswood and North Ryde. We travel by either train or bus to the city, depending on exactly where we are going. The bus is a 15-20 minute ride into the city. When travelling by train we usually go from Chatswood station.There is plenty of parking in our street and we do have wi-fi. We're happy to give all the advice y
fields.neighbourhood_overview: I love the feeling of space, the trees and access to the bush; all within short distance from the city. The bus from half a block away takes just 16 minutes to get to the city, so you are very connected to a lot of the best things Sydney has to offer - including the harbour! Our place is also quiet, something I really appreciate.
fields.transit: You will find it easy to park in our street but if you are you are travelling to the city, we recommend using public transport. The city bus stop is 2 minutes walk away, and the bus takes 16 minutes to get to the city.
fields.title: Private garden studio with bathroom

fields.summary: Summer ! January deals : From $250/night ask for a quote. (Min 2 night stay) Holiday Cottage on the water Yep.. on the water. Not across the road  or 2 blocks away. True. Not suitable for young children.  (Minimum 2 night booking)
fields.description: Summer ! January deals : From $250/night ask for a quote. (Min 2 night stay) Holiday Cottage on the water Yep.. on the water. Not across the road  or 2 blocks away. True. Not suitable for young children.  (Minimum 2 night booking) Please ask for a quote: Prices seasonal.  Fancy a fabulous waterfront,'50's built, cottage for a holiday with absolute privacy and access by boat only? Or maybe a private weekend with your work mates brainstorming? Then Turtle Run is the retreat for you. This is a sanctuary that truly embraces the layback lifestyle of the northern beaches of Sydney. This waterfront 3 bedroom, 2 level cottage is nestled in the hillside forest at the edge of the Ku-ring-gai Chase National Park overlooking Pittwater Harbour at Church Point, McCarr’s Creek in northern Sydney. Yet incredibly, it is situated only 40 minutes from Sydney’s CBD and 15 minutes from the best beaches in the world. The area has survived the onslaught of development with many surrounding home owners retain
fields.neighbourhood_overview: We have a fairly unique neighbourhood for Sydney. Pittwater at the front of the house, national park behind.  All of our neighbours appreciate the serenity of this beautiful location. We hope you will too.
fields.transit: Public transport is available from Church  Point to the Mona Vale, with connections through to the Northern Beach and the city.
fields.title: Turtle Run: Waterfront Retreat.

fields.summary: Large one-bedroom apartment with all mod-cons in central, trendy Redfern - five minutes walk to the train station and a short hop into the heart of the city.
fields.description: Large one-bedroom apartment with all mod-cons in central, trendy Redfern - five minutes walk to the train station and a short hop into the heart of the city. I love my apartment and hope you will too. It's spacious and comfortably furnished including a super comfy bed in the bedroom, a TV with Apple TV (and Netflix) in the living room, and high-speed wireless internet access. It has air-con for those days Sydney is sweltering, as well as a washing machine and dryer. The well-equipped gourmet kitchen has a high-end Miele induction cooktop, Asko dishwasher and microwave. On arrival you'll find the apartment clean and tidy with fresh sheets, towels and plenty of space for your belongings.  Although on a main road, the custom-made double glazing means it's still peaceful (or at least as peaceful as you can reasonably expect in the inner city!). The apartment building features a free gym with brand-new updated equipment (May 2018) as well as a fantastic pool and BBQ area on the roof.  If yo
fields.neighbourhood_overview: Redfern is a fantastic inner-west suburb with numerous cool cafes, restaurants, pubs, independant art galleries, antique shops, small bars and interesting ethic eateries. Within a couple of blocks of the apartment are two incredible bakeries, great cafes, a supermarket two doors down, greengrocer's, pizza, Thai takeout, Vietnamese, Chinese, organic and old-school butchers, a newsagent, masseuse, vintage clothing store, several antique shops, and more.
fields.transit: A bus stop just outside the door or one block up goes directly into the city and back and it is only a five minute walk to Redfern station, which goes absolutely everywhere in Sydney (it's a major transport hub). Within a 20-30 minute walk lies not only the city but also popular neighbourhoods such as Surry Hills, Newtown, Erskinville and Alexandria. Not to mention, a number of leafy green parks and sporting fields.
fields.title: Central one-bedroom with pool & gym

fields.summary: Fully furnished modern 3 bedroom plus landing/study townhouse on 3 levels in a quiet surrounding, offers a great privacy for house mates.
fields.description: Fully furnished modern 3 bedroom plus landing/study townhouse on 3 levels in a quiet surrounding, offers a great privacy for house mates. The house is well equipped with Built-in and mirrored robes to all bedrooms, open plan gas kitchen, internal laundry with 3rd toilets and 2 bathrooms, tiled lounge/dining area, entertaining courtyard, alarm system and close to all amenities sharing with two friendly and fun professionals. In terms of mobility we are also lucky with our location. Being close to James Ruse Drive and Great Western High way (M4) makes the transport easy to all directions. (We are literally in the center of Sydney with quick access to highways that links east and west as well as North and south bounds. The famous Rose Hill Race Course is the largest entertainment center around the area. They have various shows throughout the year in which the trendy and classic horse racing can be named as the featured ones. We are preferably looking for travelers who care about their sta
fields.neighbourhood_overview: We have an absolutely nice and quiet neighborhood and we are grateful for that.  There is a primary school in Virginia St across the road not far from our house and so parents are expected to hang around during the drop off and pick up times (8:00AM and 2:00PM). Also we are blessed to have Rosehill racecourse right near us. During the events you will get to see a good mix of colour, style and fashion around the area which it tempts you to think, you may as well dress to impress and join the event!
fields.transit: 1. Rosehill train station is right across the road  2. but for more regular trains and express links Parramatta train station is the best option which is25 minutes walk from our place.  3. To get to Parramatta station, Carlingford and Lower North Suburbs, buses are good option. They run quite regular and there are two major stops nearby (Good Street and James Ruse Drive)   4. Rydges Hotel is only 3 minutes walk and there are always taxi's available
fields.title: *FULLY FURNISHED ROOM*

fields.summary: Our sunny, completely private unit within our home offers a bedroom, spacious living room with second double bed, bathroom, laundry and kitchette.Enjoy the sea breezes as you sit on your own private balcony. The outdoor BBQ is for your exclusive use.
fields.description: Our sunny, completely private unit within our home offers a bedroom, spacious living room with second double bed, bathroom, laundry and kitchette.Enjoy the sea breezes as you sit on your own private balcony. The outdoor BBQ is for your exclusive use. Close to Manly beach, 5 minutes drive, self contained unit  contained within our home.  Shops/restaurants close by. Quiet street, plenty of free on street parking. Own private balcony with sea breezes. Kitchenette, washing machine and own private bathroom available. Wireless internet also available. The accommodation offers a large sunny bedroom with built in wardrobe. A spacious living room, with a sofa bed and a well equipped kitchenette. There's plenty of room for lounging, basking in the light that floods through  all the north facing rooms. In the living area a flat screen TV is available for your use.The bathroom is clean and contemporary with a shower. The large balcony has its own BBQ for your convenience, as well as an outdoor fur
fields.notes: Local shops about 700 metres up the hill, where you find a supermarket, news agency, several local restaurants and great coffee.
fields.neighbourhood_overview: Quiet, tree lined street, in lovely neighbourhood, where the birds are plentiful and the sea breeze is wonderful. On street parking is available and the neighbour hood is very safe. Aboriginal carvings can be seen in the park at the end of the street, a 5 minute walk away. Several local restaurants are within easy walking distance, as is a supermarket, baker, butcher and news agency.
fields.transit: 20 metres to the nearest bus stop, which will transport you to the local Warringah shopping mall, or Manly and directly to the city.
fields.title: Sunny Private Unit near Manly Beach

fields.description: Please note that this is a private apartment stay so you will not share with host - apartment is all yours.     Ocean views to die for from this top floor 2 bedroom apartment in Bondi & Tamarama. This spacious apartment boasts magnificent views from the balcony and huge pool side area. The apartment has two double bedrooms (one with queen size bed & the other with twin beds) and one large bathroom with separate bath and walk in shower.  Living room is elegantly furnished plus TV/DVD and looks out over the water. Smaller size but fully equipped kitchen with microwave, gas stove and modern conveniences.  Shared laundry with washer and dryer.   Practically on the beach, located in a tranquil beachside setting overlooking Tamarama’s Mackenzie Bay. The Tama Beach residence is divided into 4 separate apartments which offer a private self contained holiday experience Cool off with a swim in our private pool overlooking the pacific ocean and then venture along Sydney’s iconic Bondi to Bronte o
fields.transit: public transport on your doorstep with buses stopping outside property
fields.title: Ocean Views Bondi Tamarama beaches

fields.summary: You will enjoy 50 square metres of internal space in our modern light-filled and funky art space.  Situated in Sydney's cultural heartland we are 300 metres from a bustop that provides a 15 minute ride to the CBD every 5 minutes.
fields.description: You will enjoy 50 square metres of internal space in our modern light-filled and funky art space.  Situated in Sydney's cultural heartland we are 300 metres from a bustop that provides a 15 minute ride to the CBD every 5 minutes. Our town house, re-built in 2011, is a completely re-worked 1890 end terrace and is fully self contained and affords you complete independence. The architect has made the most of abundant natural light and ventilation. Our soaring atrium rises 30 feet and showcases some great contemporary Australian art. You will enjoy 50 square metres of internal space.  A giant picture window in the kitchen frames your view of our roof garden.  Our kitchen has a cooktop, rangehood and microwave.  There you will also find a washer/dryer.  Next door in the lounge are book cases and our WI-FI TV.  The masterbedroom has a Queen size bed with ensuite bathroom with twin showers. Setting the scene for your exploration of Newtown's galleries, shops, music venues, theatres, & restaur
fields.notes: We get your visit off to a flying start with the supply of a range of breakfast foods, sufficient to  enable you to enjoy a morning meal whenever it suits for the first 3 or 4 days of your stay.  Thereafter we ask that you take advantage of our awesome King Street shopping precint and the nearby Saturday Eveleigh Farmers' markets to top up your supplies by choosing food items to your taste for the balance of your stay. We supply some fresh fruit, milk, juice, yoghurt, bacon, cereals, plunger coffee, tea bags, quick oats, Kelloggs variety, Wheatbix cereals and a loaf of bread and spreads and margarine.
fields.neighbourhood_overview: Newtown has a buzz like no other suburb in Sydney.  Our street may bring you the music of young children at play in the primary school opposite, or the singing of worshippers in the Church just over the road, who coexist with rock bands that hire their church hall for rehearsals, as well as the classical musicians practising in their home just a couple of doors away. In Newtown it is no so much about the glitz or the glamour, it's more about our need to self-express. We're one big alternative vibe with our apartment, the venues, the food, the shops, the pubs and parks managing to keep life weirdly wonderful.
fields.transit: The bus stop at the corner of King Street and Carillon Avenue is about a 5 minute walk. Macdonaldtown train station is about 10/12 minute walk.
fields.title: Newtown Darlington Suites-1st. Flr.

fields.description: Welcome to Sydney's Northern Beaches! ABOUT THE STUDIO: At the front of our residence we have a self-contained Studio [includes bathroom, full kitchen - with all cooking essentials, deck, private separate entrance] which can sleep 2 adults in either a king size bed or twin king single beds. There is secured wifi, subject to service provision, throughout the studio and there is plenty of safe carparking immediately in front of our house.  For the benefit of both ourselves and our neighbours we have a No Smoking policy throughout our property.  The Studio is accessed from a lovely garden; the studio terrace has views out to the distant hills of Ku-ring-gai National Park, with the Pittwater estuary in the foreground. The Studio has a floor area of approximately 33m2; the terrace is approximately 16m2.   ABOUT THE AREA WE LIVE IN: Our house and Studio are situated in a  quiet and attractive street in Bilgola Plateau, a small bushland residential area located on an elevated plateau above th
fields.notes: CANCELLATION POLICY Please note that we have a Strict Cancellation Policy.  50% of the tariff will be refunded [but not the Airbnb guest service fee]  if you cancel anytime upto 7  days prior to 2pm on the arrival date.  After that, no refund is available.  Please ensure you carry International/Domestic travel insurance to cover you in the event of cancellation.
fields.neighbourhood_overview: Our neighbourhood is in a quiet residential street.  The quietness of our street, together with the bushland, wildlife, views and a favourable summer and winter North-East aspect make make this a desirable neighbourhood and is popular with residents - and our guests - who enjoy a peaceful location.  A few minutes by car will have you in the village of Avalon, where the pace is still pretty laid back, but plenty of cafes, restaurants and a few new bars will lift your heart rate just a bit.
fields.transit: Sydney/City to Avalon and Bilgola Plateau: The main bus service [bus number L90]  to the city departs every 30 minutes from Avalon; it can also be joined at a bus stop which is a 7-minute walk downhill from the Studio. Tickets can be bought on the bus provided it is not peak hour [6am - 9am; 3.30pm - 6.30pm].  During these peak hours you will need to purchase a pre-pay bus ticket from any local shop, newsagent or service station.  During the week there is an express bus service from Bilgola Plateau [bus number E89]  in the morning and afternoon to and from the city. The bus stop for this service is a 2 minute walk from the Studio.    Driving time in a car to Sydney CBD is about 1 hour. Depending on the time of day, the bus trip is about 1 1/2 hours. Bilgola Plateau to Avalon Village: if you don't feel like walking up or down the hill to Avalon Village there is also a local bus service [bus number L191] which you can join at the bus stop 2 minutes from the Studio. Local trips to conside
fields.title: The Circle Studio Bilgola Avalon

fields.summary: Designer house in chic neighbourhood close to neighbourhood restaurants and cafes and walk to the city. Our room is a double room on the first floor of a large family terrace house. Cooked breakfast available on request for an extra fee.
fields.description: Designer house in chic neighbourhood close to neighbourhood restaurants and cafes and walk to the city. Our room is a double room on the first floor of a large family terrace house. Cooked breakfast available on request for an extra fee. 2  rooms available (1 double and 1 single) in architect designed house less than 1 kilometer from the city center. Close to transport, or walk to city , great cafes, resatuarants and inner city lifestyle. Ammenities incldue steam room, plunge pool and quiet designer backyard One room is a single bed room on the first floor of a 3 level terrace. The other room is a large double bed room on the first floor. Each room is stylishly furnished and comfortable. The house is architectually designed and recently reburbished, 2 formal dining and lounge rooms , separate family/tv room adjoining our backyard with bi fold doors , 50' plasma tv, 3 marble bathrooms, plunge pool and bbq. Live in family owners with a wealth of knowledge of great restaurants, cafes, art
fields.neighbourhood_overview: Our neighbourhood is a vibrant and exciting part of the city. We have 2 large beautiful parks near us , plenty of restaurants and cafes and we are close to art galleries and close to Danks  street a famous art street with great cafes. The neighbourhood is an eclectic mix of older migrant families, young professionals , hipsters and interesting people. Our street is tree lined and one of the most beautiful in Redfern.
fields.transit: 5 minutes walk to train. 2 minutes walk to buses. Easy access to public transport or walk to the city 15 minutes.
fields.title: Designer double room terrace house

fields.summary: Socialise with the host in the al fresco brick-paved courtyard attached to this quiet, comfortable and well-appointed wooden cottage. Dark hardwood floors add class to the private bedroom, which comes with a private guest bathroom.
fields.description: Socialise with the host in the al fresco brick-paved courtyard attached to this quiet, comfortable and well-appointed wooden cottage. Dark hardwood floors add class to the private bedroom, which comes with a private guest bathroom.
fields.neighbourhood_overview: The cottage lies in East Balmain, close to the CBD. It's a beautiful suburb with loads of parks, and the house is just a couple of minutes from Sydney harbour. There are plenty of pubs, restaurants, shops and cafes nearby.
fields.title: Relax in a Tastefully Decorated East Balmain House

fields.summary: Charming & sunny art deco one bedroom apartment with balcony in beautiful leafy Bellevue Hill just ten minutes walk to Bondi Beach, 20 minutes walk to Bondi Junction shopping centre and 15 minutes to ferry for Sydney Harbour.
fields.description: Charming & sunny art deco one bedroom apartment with balcony in beautiful leafy Bellevue Hill just ten minutes walk to Bondi Beach, 20 minutes walk to Bondi Junction shopping centre and 15 minutes to ferry for Sydney Harbour. Lovely, sunny top floor furnished art deco two bed flat with cream plantation shutters, balcony and dark wooden floors in secure building - great comfortable haven feel. Master bedroom with queen bed. Exclusive Eastern Suburbs location in beautiful leafy residential Bellevue Hill, just 10 minute walk from the world’s most famous beach - Bondi Beach (surfing, swimming, ultra-hip restaurants and bars and cafes) and a range of others beaches in the vicinity where you can snorkel, kayak, paddleboard, surf, dive and swim. -15 minute walk to a 10 minute ferry into the CBD and Opera House. Beaches ten min walk north, harbour ten minutes walk south -Compact art deco balcony with setting for four to eat al fresco -20m walk/5 min bus to large luxury shopping centre, superma
fields.notes: There's free, unlimited, unmetered parking in the neighbourhood if you plan to rent a car.
fields.neighbourhood_overview: On the Bondi side of Bellevue Hill, the apartment is a lovely sunny airy safe flat in a beautiful leafy exclusive suburb that's perfect for dipping in and out of the beach and its amazing nightlife, but still gives you proximity to the City, Bondi Junction and Double Bay. It's just a little less hectic than Bondi. Bondi and Rose Bay have so many great places to eat and drink, favourite chilli margarita is at Bondi Hardware, great rosé and beach views at The Bucket List, wonderful cocktails and modern Asian at China Diner, gelato at Gelato Messina, breakfast (lunch or dinner) at Porch & Parlour, Lock Stock, Brown Sugar or Harry's, a really local place for a beer is Beach Road Hotel or the North Bondi RSL, sushi at Raw Bar in Bondi, people watching at Le Paris Go, pizza My favourite noodle place is Mappen or Ichi Ban Boshi in Bondi Junction, pizza from MAD Pizza....gosh it's endless in Bondi!
fields.transit: It's very easy to walk up and down to Bondi (ten minutes). There are buses to Bondi Junction to connect all over the city just a two minute walk away and it's a ten minute trip up to the Junction (or you can walk easily).  You can walk for 15 minutes to Rose Bay Ferry terminal to take a 10 minute ferry into the heart of the Harbour, Circular Quay and the Opera House.  Plenty of Ubers and taxis around
fields.title: Sunny airy flat near beach and city

fields.summary: This modern 4 bedroom fully furnished home is situated in a quiet street with ocean glimpses - and is less than 5 minutes walk to Clovelly beach (fantastic for snorkelling). It is also a short walk to Bronte Beach, Coogee Beach and Gordons Bay. You can easily walk to Bondi Beach as well along the ocean cliff walkway.
fields.description: This modern 4 bedroom fully furnished home is situated in a quiet street with ocean glimpses - and is less than 5 minutes walk to Clovelly beach (fantastic for snorkelling). It is also a short walk to Bronte Beach, Coogee Beach and Gordons Bay. You can easily walk to Bondi Beach as well along the ocean cliff walkway. This modern 4 bedroom fully furnished home is situated in a quiet street with ocean glimpses - and is less than 5 minutes walk to Clovelly beach (fantastic for snorkelling). It is also a short walk to Coogee Beach, Bronte Beach and Gordens Bay. Or you can easily walk to Bondi Beach along the ocean cliff walkway. The light filled home is brand new and has 4 large bedrooms and 3 bathrooms. Bedroom 1: The main bedroom is upstairs and is a large room with a king size bed and own bathroom. It has a balcony overlooking trees/park. Bedroom 2: It is also large and upstairs and has a double bed. This bedroom shares a bathroom with bedroom No.3. Bedroom 3: It is upstairs and has 4 k
fields.neighbourhood_overview: Clovelly is alike a small village - where everyone knows each other and looks out for each other. Very family oriented. Walking distance to beach. Very quiet with nice neighbours. Very relaxed
fields.transit: Buses (included express busess) go directly into city and central station.  You can also get buses to Bondi Junction - where you can access the train network

fields.summary: We travelling during December, leaving 2 beautiful rooms empty and available. If you a small family or 2 couples visiting Sydney this is the ideal location. What makes Ben Buckler so great is you can relax by yourself or join the fun.
fields.description: We travelling during December, leaving 2 beautiful rooms empty and available. If you a small family or 2 couples visiting Sydney this is the ideal location. What makes Ben Buckler so great is you can relax by yourself or join the fun. Welcome to paradise and thanks for checking out our listing! This amazing location is only a 2 minutes walk from the world famous Bondi Beach. Get a surf, soak up the sun and experience the healthy lifestyle. The area called Ben Buckler is considered to host the true locals. There is this special vibe going on which you will have to experience yourself. The house has a great balcony where you can enjoy a BBQ while watching the sunset. In addition you can enjoy:  - full access to unlimited internet  - Fully equipped Kitchen  - Dryer  - TV At the end of the street you will find a convenience store for the small groceries and a couple of very cosy coffee shops. The bus hub is just a 600 meter walk and the buses will take you to Bondi Jnct in 15 min where you
fields.neighbourhood_overview: This is truly the best place to live and visit. We are very lucky. There is always something happening, a great restaurants and bar range. Its also the best place in Bondi to swim, but don't tell any one.
fields.transit: We are right near the bus Depo. The 333 will take you from Bondi Beach to Circular Key via Bondi Junction. You also get first seats as its where the bus departs, which is great because next stop usually is crowded from beach goes. There's always a taxi nearby.
fields.title: Bondi Beach - Ben Buckler - 2 Rooms

fields.summary: A tastefully decorated, recently renovated 2 bedroom apartment close to the beach, shops, restaurants and transport with second bedroom available on a short to mid-term basis.
fields.description: A tastefully decorated, recently renovated 2 bedroom apartment close to the beach, shops, restaurants and transport with second bedroom available on a short to mid-term basis. Welcome! The Apartment -  Beautiful, uncluttered entire apartment with ocean views.  Neutrally decorated and recently renovated with new kitchen and bathrooms. Main bathroom has bath, shower and toilet plus there is also a separate guest WC.  Heaps of natural light with lounge and main bedroom opening out onto large balcony. Balcony has a BBQ and dining table and chairs. Quiet, private double bedroom at rear of apartment has built-in wardrobes with full-length mirrors. The apartment has all mod cons, including: * Washing Machine  * Large Flatscreen TV * Apple TV * Heated towel rack in bathroom  * Dishwasher  * White fine bone china crockery, chefs knives and fine glassware * Large gas BBQ  * Wireless Internet  * Double oven, cooktop and microwave  * Blender * Cool bags / esky and picnic blankets  * Large communal
fields.title: Bondi Beach 2 Bed with Ocean Views!

fields.summary: Our cool one bedroom unit is in a 1901 building, just meters from bustling Oxford st, its cafes and shopping and central to public transport taking you to 4 of Sydney's best beaches - Bondi, Bronte, Clovelly & Coogee just meters from your front door.
fields.description: Our cool one bedroom unit is in a 1901 building, just meters from bustling Oxford st, its cafes and shopping and central to public transport taking you to 4 of Sydney's best beaches - Bondi, Bronte, Clovelly & Coogee just meters from your front door. This is a bright, clean and comfortable unit. It has everything you'd expect in a home:  washer, all kitchen equipment, towels and linen, right in the heart of Sydney, Paddington. I got new blockout blinds put in about two months ago so you'll be able to sleep in after a big night. There's so many great restaurants and bars all around my apartment to enjoy! Paddington and Surry hills are known for its: shopping, deli's, art studios, bars and restaurants. The iconic Opera House and harbour bridge is a half an hour walk away through the famous botanical gardens. Surry Hills is a 10 minute walk to the north for your underground bars and daytime coffee and cafes and if you walk for 10 mins to the east you are in Kings Cross and Potts Point. Sy
fields.notes: Just a small thing to note: the apartment is located on the 4th floor and there is no lift in the building.
fields.neighbourhood_overview: Parks / cycle track Being central Cafe's restaurant, bars Shopping
fields.transit: Close to most major bus lines taking you to the inner west, eastern suburbs and its beaches. A 15 - 20 minute taxi trip from the airport, about $50 in normal traffic. Or you can get a train to central station and then a cab, might save you $10+ depending on traffic. I dont have any onsite parking. There is a GoGet car share directly across the road which is very convenient.
fields.title: Light and Airy Paddington Perfection

fields.summary: Welcome to Cherrybrook in Sydney. Our very comfortable house has all the amenities you are used to. We are located in the suburbs of Sydney, and very close to bushland (forest). Public transport to the CBD is 1 minute from our door.
fields.description: Welcome to Cherrybrook in Sydney. Our very comfortable house has all the amenities you are used to. We are located in the suburbs of Sydney, and very close to bushland (forest). Public transport to the CBD is 1 minute from our door. Welcome to Cherrybrook in Sydney and thank you for checking our listing!  There are 2 bedrooms. One has a queen bed. The other has two king singles. A third bedroom can be made available on request.  The house:  Come and stay in our very comfortable house. You will enjoy the feel of the house with polished floor boards, restored timber furniture and bold coloured walls. The bathroom is newly renovated and very clean. There is a kitchenette in the laundry where you can prepare light meals. There is a refrigerator, kettle, toaster and microwave oven for your use. In addition the house boasts:  - Wireless Internet  - Air Conditioning / Heating - Pool - Deck with a BBQ The area:  We are located in the suburbs of Sydney, and very close to bushland (forest). In w
fields.transit: A regular bus service to and from the CBD and the local railway station runs from the corner of our street (about 50 metres away.) Coming from the airport: Take the train to Town Hall in the CBD. Exit to George St and head west (downhill) via Druitt St to Kent St (passing York and Clarence as you go). Turn right into Kent St and the bus stop is on your left on the corner of Druitt Place (NOT Druitt Lane which is close by). Catch the 621 or 620X bus and ask the driver to advise you when the bus reaches YANDERRA GROVE in Cherrybrook. Alight at this stop. The trip takes about 50 minutes. Cross Francis Greenway Drive and almost in front of you is Tudor Ave. We are the 4th house on the left. Our house (no 7) is on the corner of Tudor and Pogson Drive. Alternatively, but a little more expensive perhaps, take the train from the airport to Central and change to a train to Pennant Hills (trains stopping at Pennant Hills will normally be marked as Hornsby trains via Macquarie Park and Epping). E
fields.title: Cherrybrook, Sydney

fields.summary: A light, spacious and very attractive 1920's house in a great location close to everything that Manly offers.
fields.description: A light, spacious and very attractive 1920's house in a great location close to everything that Manly offers. The house has a prime location in Fairlight, just minutes from the harbour foreshore and all the attraction and amenities of Manly. It is a 2-storey brick 1920's house with lots of light and character. We have recently renovated the kitchen/dining room and the garden. There is a separate living room, a sunroom full of toys and 3 bedrooms. One has a queen bed, one a double and the third has two single beds (which could be joined to make a big queen).  There is also a cot.  There is a sunny deck with daybed and a leafy courtyard garden, perfect for alfresco meals and bbqs.  Free wi-fi.    We are happy to discuss the rental of our car, but most local points of interest are best reached on foot, bike or the freebie bus network. The whole house. We will not be at home during your stay - we rent the house out when we are on holiday. The house is a five-minute walk from the lovely loc
fields.neighbourhood_overview: The house is a five-minute walk from the lovely local harbour beach and rock pool at Fairlight. Here you can join the Manly Scenic Walkway. Manly is a 15 minute stroll in one direction. The bars, restaurants, beaches, aquarium, ferry, shops and atmosphere of Manly need no further promotion. Turn west at Fairlight Beach and the Scenic Walkway meanders for 2-3 hours along the harbour edge - it is one of the finest walks in Australia. Manly Dam and a 50m pool provide more watery pleasures nearby. There is a new modern shopping centre with Coles, butchers, grocers, Bakers Delight etc a 5-minute walk away in Balgowlah. Heading north, a glorious string of beaches ends at Palm Beach and beautiful Pittwater.  Finally, of course, you can catch a ferry to the city to explore a huge array of world-famous attractions. We are happy to discuss car rental, but most local points of interest are best reached on foot, bike or the freebie bus network.
fields.transit: We are happy to discuss the rental of our car, but most local points of interest are best reached on foot, bike or the freebie bus network.
fields.title: Lovely Family Home Close to Manly!

fields.summary: The splendid new International Conference Centre (ICC) is now open after a four year wait. A  $7 Uber Ride will take you to the Southern entrance, and the Light Rail drops you right at the front door! Or you can walk through Chinatown and stop on the way to shop or eat -  with a huge choice of restaurants and Cafes. This is just one of the big advantages of staying here.  Save time, save money and enjoy the very best of Sydney! N.B. There is a MINIMUM 4 night stay over New Year's Eve.

A  $7 Uber Ride will take you to the Southern entrance, and the Light Rail drops you right at the front door! A large comfy queen size bed awaits you within this bright and airy room with large windows. The house is more reminiscent of being in a traditional french style home than the centre of this beautiful city we call Sydney!  There is no other accommodation so close to everything in the centre of Sydney with the same advantages. We offer FREE WiFi, FREE cleaning service and air conditioning in the bedrooms.  A traditional terrace on three and a half levels situated just south of Hyde Park
fields.notes: Please ask if there is anything which you are not comfortable with. I am always happy to listen and make sure that your needs are met if possible. Remember questions ARE the answers!
fields.neighbourhood_overview: I feel that the reason why I have many repeat bookings is simply because it is so easy to get around from this location.  When I travel overseas I always choose the place closest to the Central Railway Station as this is usually an indicator of easy access to all amenities. It also means that I don't have to spend money and time finding my way on public transport for everyday things. It is just so convenient when you can walk to places you need to be - and also more efficient.  And that is what this place offers. A six or 7 minute walk from Central.
fields.transit: This neighbourhood is so very convenient to get around everywhere. And the quantity and quality of the places to eat is exceptional. There is a restaurant or cafe to suit everyone's choice. I am and have been totally organic for over 6 years now so if anyone wants advice on where to get the best organic choice, please ask me.
fields.title: 'Live Like a Local in Sydney'

fields.summary: My place is close to Govindas Restaurant, Eau de Vie, Infinity Sour Dough Bakery, Bar Reggio and the rest of Darlinghurst and Kings Cross. You’ll love my place because of Has a great outdoor courtyard and is close to all the bars, restaurants, a bottle shop & cafe (literally upstairs) and transport to the rest of Sydney. It's also close to beautiful harbour parks and beaches! My place is good for couples (x2), families (with kids), big groups, and furry friends (pets).

The house has everything you need including internet, xbox, vinyl player. There's also a laneway behind the house where you can park all day. You'll be sharing with Ben, Jack & Caro - All in their mid20's. Located in Surry Hills and right around the corner from the famous Bourke St bakery as well as many pubs, cafe's and all that Surry Hills h

Beautiful parks and walks and close enough to catch an uber to one of Sydney's harbour beaches.  There's also a bunch of shopping close by in Paddington on Oxford St!
fields.transit: There's heaps of public transport (train and bus) but you can walk or cycle too. Parking is a bit hard but ubers and taxis are plentiful.

fields.description: Welcome to Northern Beaches, Sydney and thank you for checking my listing! Come stay and enjoy our spacious home and beautiful property. The house can sleep up to 6 people in 3 double bedrooms. It boasts all the amenities you are used to at home. Feel free to make use of the fully equipped kitchen or enjoy some downtime in the living area or on the deck which looks out over the tree tops on to a large, leafy, sun drenched backyard with swimming pool. Our property backs on to a birdlife reserve for the bird lovers amongst us. In addition the house comes with swimming pool, wifi internet, washer / dryer, BBQ You will enjoy a beautiful location and many of the famous beaches are just 3 km away. There is a large shopping mall within walking distance. You will be close to public transport and many parks, playgrounds, bush walks and spectacular beaches which are just 20 minutes walk away. Waterfall and wetlands reserve creek walk accessed from backyard. There is an onsite caretaker for any p

A temporary parking permit can be obtained for $43/month from Waverley Council Office (8.30am - 5pm Mon-Fri) at 55 Spring St, Bondi Junction, NSW 2022. Requires a photo or copy of the registration to be shown to prove vehicle identity. Submit a Temporary Parking Permit Application with vehicle make, model and registration number. A vacation rental lease document proving that you are staying at the address, and an ID. For rental cars getting a permit can only be done after the car is collected. More information and application form can be found at : (URL HIDDEN)

Very close to iconic Redleaf Pool Cafe, Catalina Restaurant, Bondi Beach, Woolworths, Sensational cafes, Kings Cross, Double Bay, Ferry or bus into the city. You’ll love my place because of the neighbourhood, the light, the comfy bed, the view, easy transportation, all the extra bits and bobs I will provide to make your stay amazing. fields.description: Welcome to Clovelly! Quiet, peaceful flat in a block of 8 situated on the Bondi to Maroubra coastal walk.  1 bedroom with views of Clovelly and the ocean.  The "other" pets are just fish who need daily feeding.  There is plenty of safe and on street free parking. There are views of the ocean with a quick run across the road to Clovelly beach and Gordon's Bay Aquatic reserve for swimming and snorkelling.  A wide range of convenience shops, cafes and restaurants are nearby as well the Clovelly Hotel and Clovelly Bowling Club with breathtaking ocean views. Quick bus transport into Sydney centre, either via Surry Hills or Bondi Junction train station as well as Sydney Airport, Cricket Ground, Centennial Park, Paddington Markets, University of NSW, Prince of Wales hospitals, Football Stadium and Randwick Races.  All mod cons including wifi and tv, large bathroom, fully stocked kitchen if you want to stay in and cook, water filter, laundry downstairs. Linen and towels provided.  Perfect for
fields.title: Cosy Flat by the Sea!

fields.summary: Peaceful one bedroom very close to public transport and city centre, 20 minutes from the airport. It has everything you need to make your time in Sydney comfortable.
fields.description: Peaceful one bedroom very close to public transport and city centre, 20 minutes from the airport. It has everything you need to make your time in Sydney comfortable. Inner city oasis for Sydney visitors. 3 minutes walk from Redfern station (a hub of Sydney rail lines), 10 minutes walk to central and 15 minutes walk to Sydney University.  The unit is on the top floor of a security block of only 25 units. It consists of one double bedroom, a living room with attached balcony,  a bathroom with a full bath and shower, along with a fully equipped kitchen. There is also an internal laundry in which the clothes dry overnight or there is also a dryer.  Redfern is a great area with a few parks, a good selection of restaurants and some nice pubs.  The street is well lit so security is not an issue.  Smoking is permitted on the balcony.  Despite its proximity to transport options the unit is relatively quiet and peaceful. The place isn't huge but has everything required for a relaxing stay in Syd
fields.title: Mini manor near the heart of Sydney

fields.summary: We've just spent a tad under $1 million transforming our whole-floor, house-sized apartment into a magnificent, luxurious and sumptuous home and the benefits are now all yours to enjoy.  It's so spectacular, Brian Chesky - the co-founder, co-owner and CEO of Airbnb - brought his family from San Francisco to stay here for two weeks (and he has over two million properties around the world to choose from!).
fields.description: We've just spent a tad under $1 million transforming our whole-floor, house-sized apartment into a magnificent, luxurious and sumptuous home and the benefits are now all yours to enjoy.  It's so spectacular, Brian Chesky - the co-founder, co-owner and CEO of Airbnb - brought his family from San Francisco to stay here for two weeks (and he has over two million properties around the world to choose from!). "Harbourview" is in the heart of Darling Point - two minutes walk to the harbour side parks, yacht clubs, buses, trains and ferries and just ten minutes to the heart of the city.  The apartment takes up the entire top floor of a 1920s mansion, yet (because the rest of the house is lower than the road), the entrance to the apartment is level with the street: just 5 metres from the off-street car parking and you're straight into the apartment's own front door. You'll enter (using your electronic swipe card) into an art-gallery of a hallway which draws you straight through to the open pla
fields.neighbourhood_overview: Darling Point is one of Sydney's most exclusive suburbs - just the minutes from the city in one direction and ten minutes to Bondi Beach in the other - and yet it's beautifully quiet, overlooks a wonderful park and is just a few minutes walk to the harbour shore and yacht clubs. There are ample shops, supermarket etc within easy walking distance just up the road, and cafes, bars and restaurants just round the corner.
fields.transit: There are buses a couple of hundred metres away, a ferry wharf down the end of the road and a train station 500 metres away.  (Or else it's a 45 minute walk to the Opera House and the centre of town).
fields.title: Spectacular Harbourview Home

fields.description: Beautiful art deco apartment in Coogee, one of Sydney's eastern beaches.   The apartment has a very high vibration from consistent meditation and healing work over the last 5 years.  It is physically and energetically very clean and you will feel good as soon as you step inside.   There is a bath, and the queen size bed has 1200 count cotton sheets.  The furniture is a mix of antiques and contemporary designer pieces, and there are hundreds of books and DVDs.   I will be storing all my personal and precious stuff in the second bedroom, but the rest of the house will be ready for you to experience as I live in it.  Happy to have a conversation about using the built-in garage as well as the car for an extra fee.   The main restaurant strip and the beach are, literally, just around the corner and I can recommend many great places to eat.  There is a charming art deco cinema at the top of the hill.   Coogee is 20 mins by bus to the city and 20 mins by cab to the airport.   The University o
fields.notes: Only 20 minutes by taxi from Kingsford Smith airport.
fields.title: HIGHLY ENERGISED BEACH RETREAT

fields.summary: A fantastic house  canopied by a Chinese Tree of Heaven and filled with light. A wonderful location around the corner from great restaurants , galleries and unique shopping.  5 minutes from the city and 10 minutes to Circular Quay / Opera House.
fields.description: A fantastic house  canopied by a Chinese Tree of Heaven and filled with light. A wonderful location around the corner from great restaurants , galleries and unique shopping.  5 minutes from the city and 10 minutes to Circular Quay / Opera House. Surry Hills is the most vibrant and exciting place, in which, to live. It is the home of artists and creative people and is replete with restaurants, theatres and galleries. There are numerous original clothing shops and interesting gift shops.  The house is within walking distance of the city and is an exceptional location for those interested in unique cuisine. This is my home and I rent it out while I am working overseas or interstate. It is a beautiful house to stay in because of the unique light and the quality of peace created by the Chinese Tree of Heaven. Around the corner is the dynamic and hip Crown Street filled with life, people and great shopping. You are only five minutes from the city and fifteen minutes away from access to all t
fields.notes: This is an intimate neighbourhood guests are required to have consideration for their neighbours.  No parties.  Please respect your/our neighbours-no loud music or tv after 11pm please. A rental agreement must be signed before check-in.  The house must be left in the same setup and condition as it was found.
fields.neighbourhood_overview: Situated around the corner from Crown Street and Oxford Street you have easy access to Sydney's best restaurants, galleries and fashion boutiques. In the centre of it all but so secluded!
fields.transit: You are within walking distance of the City and Central Station and have excellent public transport outside the front door.   Ten minutes by bus to Circular Quay, Darling Harbour, the Opera House and the Harbour Bridge. Twenty minutes by bus to Bondi, Bronte and Clovelly beaches.
fields.title: Surry Hills Oasis in the Inner City

fields.summary: Sunny, spacious and sea breeze-y, with 3 large balconies over the beach, pool, cabana, new Samsung curve tvs, the works. Fully renovated and furnished, and a short walk to the beach- and everything!

Fully renovated and furnished, and a short walk to the beach- and everything! Beach living at its best- welcome to your very own Beach House on Famous North Curl Curl!  THE HOUSE:  Located over looking Nth Curl Curl Beach, Sydney, this extremely modern 3 story beach house is just 200m walk from famous Nth Curl Curl Beach, with sweeping ocean views.  And if the beach is too far, you have the large pool, deck, cabana and backyard to enjoy. The whole house has recently been refurbished by a famous Sydney interior designer- fully renovated, designed and furnished, with all the luxury mod cons & comforts. This massive beach house has a large north facing SWIMMING POOL,  huge new Pool Cabana that has its own cable TV, fridge, and external laundry! There are three balconies with expansive views, and a number of large dining areas- perfect for entertaining. 4 bedrooms and 2.
fields.neighbourhood_overview: Right in the heart of one of Sydney's best beach neighbourhoods, North Curl Curl! It's all here- beaches, walks, restaurants, and all 10 minutes from Manly Beach, ferries to the city, the works!
fields.transit: So close to the beach, restaurants and shopping, walk to anything. There's a bus right on our road, and ferries to central Sydney are 10 minutes away in Manly.
fields.title: Huge Modern Beach House with Pool!

Uber services this area too :-) We generally get around on foot most of the time.

If it’s young, smart, rich people you’re looking for, this is the place. Erskineville has an abundance of cafes, bars and pubs on offer including: Fleetwood Macchiato: A cute ‘hole in the wall’ cafe boasting an amazing breakfast and lunch menu in addition to a delicious assortment of sweets including quince, strawberry and rose cake and blackberry and banana bread. Cafe Shenkin: This Israeli cafe will have you lining up for more While you have to get in early to get a seat for a weekend breakfast; it’s worth the wait. Our house was renovated by a famous Sydney architect called Luigi Rozelli-there are three levels and this studio apartment is on the ground level overlooking the shared pool and garden. It is a modern, studio apartment with a queen size bed, a sofa that folds down into a double bed and a separate kitchen and bathroom. It is one street back from the beach with stunning views from the patio and pool. The pool is fully enclosed so completely safe for children. The house is back from the street so it is very quiet. We are 20 minutes from the centre of the city and very close to public transport (the bus nearby goes straight into t

The local shops supply everything you could need-our local cafe has just been written up in the newspaper as having the best coffee in Sydney! The famous Bondi to Coogee walking path that winds its way around the shoreline is two minutes away from the house. If you walk one direction along the path you will be at Bondi Beach in 5 minutes-walking past the most glorious sea views, and also the famous Bondi Icerbergs with a public sea swimming pool and one of Sydney's most famous restaurants. If you walk in the other direction, you come to Bronte Beach with cafes, a large park and playgrounds for children. It is like being at a wonderful beach casual holiday but only a short trip from the centre of the city w

fields.neighbourhood_overview: Alexandria's once-largest industrial district looks different than it did just five years ago. Not every formerly industrial location transforms into urban lofts! Warehouses, factories, and rubbish yards still comprise Alexandria's metal and mortar landscape, but this inner-Sydney suburb is becoming increasingly domesticated. Its creative population forges on as their utilitarian leanings slant toward a laissez-faire cafe culture that reviews filmstrips through magnifying glasses. A few miles south of Sydney’s central business district, Alexandria keeps its pulse on the city while fostering its own DIY future.
fields.transit: There are two Opal cards for Sydney's tap on and tap off public transport payment system. You're free to use them and top up as you go! There are fantastic public transport options including trains and buses on your doorstep! If you catch the train from the airport to Green Square station. Exit by the Botany Rd West exit up the escalator and turn right (away from the traffic lights). Walk along Botany Rd to 432 Botany Rd (about 5 minutes) & it s a lime green gate. Put your hand over the door and find and undo the latch on the top right hand side. Then you are here!

fields.neighbourhood_overview: Kensington is a lovely little suburb. It is very safe area. There are many food options within walking distance on Anzac Parade such as Thai, Mexican, Indonesian and Italian.  Plus a lovely cafe called Cafe Jacks that has good coffee and good options for breakfast and lunch. Two blocks walk away is the foodie haven of Danks Street Waterloo where you can have your pick of many restaurants and do your grocery shopping.  The cool area of Surry Hills is also 5 minutes away by bus, Surry Hills also has great restaurants and bars our favourite is Vascos bar and the Clock Hotel- for good pub grub. This area also has a number of designer clothes and jewellery shops.  On Crown st is Messinas the best ice cream shop in Australia!  5 minutes by bus or car and a 15-20 minute walk is Randwick Spot, where  you will be spoilt for choice of restaurants. There is also a  movie cinema- Randwick Ritz and a and a few cool small bars, our top pic is Bat Country right opposite the cinemas.
fields.transit: The flat is on a major bus transport line and busses come very 2-5 minutes. There are bus stops on both Anzac and the corner of Alison and Doncaster Roads. It is a 7-10 minute bus ride to Central station and 15 mins to Coogee Beach via Randwick. It takes between 20-25 (depending on traffic) minutes to get to Circular Quay- where you can see the Harbour Bridge and Opera House!

The private apartment has three big bedrooms: One with a queen bed and built-in wardrobe; One with a queen bed; and One with 2 hotel king singles (which zip together to form one king bed) and built-in wardrobe. There is air conditioning in the kitchen/lounge and the front bedroom, and all bedrooms have ceiling fans. For winter there are heaters in each bedroom and a gas heater in the lounge. There's free wireless internet, 3 TVs with Netflix and
fields.neighbourhood_overview: Coogee is an awesome suburb, close to the Sydney CBD but with a great village feel. There are heaps of cafes, restaurants and bars near the house, and the beach is beautiful.
fields.transit: Street parking is available, but most guests find that taking a bus is easier to get into the city, and most other things are in walking distance. There are bus stops very close to the house, including an express service to the CBD. Coogee is really well serviced by uber (we never have to wait more than a minute or 2) so I strongly recommend that over renting a car. If you're going to take the kids to the zoo or Luna Park, take the ferry! It's worth it for the views of Sydney Harbour. If you have a car please ensure you park in the unrestricted spots on the street. There are also a few goget carshare cars near the house - one is only a block away in a dedicated spot.
