fields.title: Queen bed large room in Hornsby Sydney--(Room 1)

fields.summary: This is a private room in a share apartment with the owner. Located high on the hill in Vaucluse There are views to the Ocean. Surrounded by trees Girilang offers a quieter alternative to nearby Bondi Beach.
fields.description: This is a private room in a share apartment with the owner. Located high on the hill in Vaucluse There are views to the Ocean. Surrounded by trees Girilang offers a quieter alternative to nearby Bondi Beach. Located in Vaucluse between Bondi Beach and Watson's Bay this bright, open plan, furnished 2 bedroom apartment has beautiful ocean views. There is fast WiFi Internet access. All rooms of this 118 square metre space are filled with natural light.  The coastal outlook is both green and peaceful.  Public transport, local shops and cafes are about a 3 minute walk away. Ferries are also available from either Watson's Bay or Rose Bay. The available bedroom has a queen size bed, a chest of drawers, and a large built in wardrobe.  The open plan lounge, dining, kitchen area has a 1.4 metre LCD screen with a Digital Television Tuner and DVD player.   The kitchen includes most essential appliances electric kettle, toaster etc.  There is a laundry with washing machine and drying balcony.  The
fields.title: OCEAN VIEWS AT  VAUCLUSE / BONDI

fields.summary: We are in love with this place full of light, great views, and a large shared rooftop with bbq&pool. Only 15min walk from CBD/operahouse through the spectacular botanical gardens, close to charming restaurants, cafes, bus and train. Ideal for 2 couples or a family. We have 1 free zoo pass you can use as often as you like! For babies/ toddlers we have a cot, high chair and many toys. And you are very welcome to use our kitchen for a cosy home made meal.. Welcome and enjoy your stay!
fields.description: We are in love with this place full of light, great views, and a large shared rooftop with bbq&pool. Only 15min walk from CBD/operahouse through the spectacular botanical gardens, close to charming restaurants, cafes, bus and train. Ideal for 2 couples or a family. We have 1 free zoo pass you can use as often as you like! For babies/ toddlers we have a cot, high chair and many toys. And you are very welcome to use our kitchen for a cosy home made meal.. Welcome and enjoy your stay! Spacious and light 80+ sqm 2 bedroom / 2 bathroom Potts Point apartment. Large living room with open kitchen. Apartment balcony and bbq rooftop area with pool, with a view on the Sydney harbour, the wharf and city Key apartment characteristics:  2 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms (both incl toilet and , 1 with bathtub), ideal for sharing with 2 couples or a family Spacious living room, incl couches and dining table that can sit up to 6 6 sqm balcony in front of living room and second bedroom Large bbq rooftop area w
fields.notes: We have 1 free zoo pass you can use as often as you like.. and a pile of sydney guidebooks and tips to make sure you can make the best of your stay in Sydney!
fields.neighbourhood_overview: 5min walk to charming Potts Point and Woolloomooloo bay restaurants. Close to supermarkets and the spectacular botanical gardens. We also love to walk to Darlinghurst, Surry Hills and Paddington.
fields.transit: 5min walk to subway/train. Bus stop in front of the building. 20min walk to Circular Quay (ferry hub in the city) which provides ferry access to Sydney's best beaches and coastal locations
fields.title: Great Location, Gorgeous View

fields.summary: Cute little cottage with garden in the heart of Enmore. Located in a quiet one-way street,  just 2 mins walk to cafes, shops, buses taking you to the city, Circular Quay, North Shore and more. Fascinating Newtown just 10 mins walk. Love it here!
fields.description: Cute little cottage with garden in the heart of Enmore. Located in a quiet one-way street,  just 2 mins walk to cafes, shops, buses taking you to the city, Circular Quay, North Shore and more. Fascinating Newtown just 10 mins walk. Love it here! Front flat in a renovated house, with lawn out front. Light, sunny, cheerful living area and bedroom, clean kitchen, modern bathroom with shower. House fully furnished, with queen-sized bed in good-sized bedroom.  Price includes electricity and wireless internet.  There is a double mattress available for extra guests or children. Located in quiet street 2 minutes from bus stop, with extremely convenient bus services directly to city centre, Circular Quay, Bondi and Coogee. Just 10 mins' walk to Newtown Station. So close to everything that the inner west offers. My lovely cat, Miaow Miaow, may be at home and I may ask you to feed her, but if you don't like cat's, no problem! I'll make other arrangements.
fields.notes: My lovely cat, Miaow Miaow, may be at home and I may ask you to feed her, but if you don't like cat's, no problem! I'll make other arrangements.
fields.title: Cute Cottage in Enmore, Sydney

fields.description: Fantastic, spacious 3 bedroom, 3 storey Victorian terrace located just moments away from great pubs, cafes and everything there is to do in Sydney.  Located between the city and Bondi Beach the house is metres away from the spectacular Centenniel Park and a 2 minute walk to the nearest bus stop. It is close to Woolhara and the boutique shops of Paddington.  The house is recently renovated and has all you need to entertain yourselves and others. There's a fabulous private back yard to boot with bi-fold doors from the kitchen. It is truly a home away from home.  The bedrooms are spacious and all have a queen bed with a king size single which coverts to a queen size bed (its a trundle bed).  The kitchen is well equipped and is a chef's delight... you wont want to go out.  A lovely quiet street .... reminiscent of England....  Please contact me if you have any questions.  Amenities  TV  Wireless Internet   Heating  Kitchen  Washer  Dryer
fields.title: Great Paddington/Woolhara Terrace

fields.description: Come and stay in my apartment which has sea breezes, the sounds and smell of the ocean and a great way to spend a Sydney summer or autumn.  I live very close to both Coogee Beach and Clovelly Beach and am situated on top of a beautiful spot known as Gordon's Bay which is great for snorkelling.   There are many cliff top walks close to my apartment - ie you can walk all the way to Bondi Beach passing many other beaches and bays en route.  My apartment is in a boutique block of 4 with a balcony with a small shared garden and your room is large and has a double bed plus wardrobe.  You will be sharing the bathroom and kitchen with me.  I have wifi throughout the apartment and have a comfortable living and dining area which you are welcome to use of course.  There are buses from Coogee Beach to the centre of Sydney which take approx 25 minutes  (my apartment is a 8 minute walk to the beach and buses). There are many restaurants and cafes in both Coogee and Clovelly and grocery stores, etc.
fields.neighbourhood_overview: Coogee and Clovelly are safe neighbourhoods with wonderful ocean views and beautiful cliff walks.  It's possible to see whales during their seasonal migration.    Sometimes dolphins can be spotted from time to time.    There are good restaurants and grocery stores in Coogee.
fields.transit: Coogee is a $40 taxi ride from the airport. There is a shuttle bus which can be booked in advance which is $15 per person.  I can book it for you.  Otherwise you can take the train and then a bus from the city train station.  I can give you details.
fields.title: Coogee Coastal retreat

fields.description: Modern light-filled, loft apartment in the heart of Newtown & Camperdown. Just 5 minutes to the buzz of King Street and right behind Sydney University and Royal Prince Alfred hospital. Cafes, beautiful parks and Victoria Park swimming pool are only moments away.  The Apartment The apartment is located on the 5th floor of a modern security building on beautiful, tree lined Carillon Avenue. Facing due North, it enjoys lots of natural light and views of the sandstone spires of Sydney Uni, the ANZAC bridge and beyond to North Sydney! Fully furnished including super comfortable modular leather lounge, bookshelves with plenty of reading material, flatscreen TV, DVD player with a good selection of DVDs to choose from.  The generous, terracotta terrace offers plenty of sunlight and has a Weber gas BBQ and table for alfresco dining with 180 deg views.  Kitchen includes gas cooktop, oven, super-quiet bosch dishwasher, and everything you'll need to prepare delicious home cooked meals including po
fields.title: Light, Bright, Newtown Apartment

fields.description: This is a lovely 3 bedroom house quietly nestled in a prized cul-de-sac, located in the ultra convenient heart of Bondi Junction and minutes away from Bondi Beach. Our home is a newly renovated modern two storey house that has a warm and welcoming feel where you can relax in style. It also features top quality finishes and a charming open plan indoor/outdoor living.  We offer: • Bedrooms:   o Master bedroom: King bed, large built in wardrobe and full length mirror  o Bedroom 2: Queen bed, built in wardrobe and full length mirror  o Bedroom 3:Single bed • Library/study: desk to write or browse the internet, printer, bookshelves with books to read and DVDs to watch at your own leisure; selection of board games available. • Bathrooms: 1 main bathroom with 2 showers & bath, and a second/separate guest toilet. • Kitchen: fully equipped modern kitchen with fridge, microwave, Miele appliances: gas stove, oven & dishwasher, Nespresso Coffee machine and all cooking appliances. • Dining/living a
fields.title: Bondi Luxury House

fields.summary: The room is spacious with good light, has a comfortable king single bed, plenty of wardrobe and draw storage, so you can stop living out of your suitcase and feel at home.  This private sunny single room is located in a very convenient location.  Close to shops, Maroubra beach and bus stops that take you direct to the city. Cheaper than a hostel !
fields.description: The room is spacious with good light, has a comfortable king single bed, plenty of wardrobe and draw storage, so you can stop living out of your suitcase and feel at home.  This private sunny single room is located in a very convenient location.  Close to shops, Maroubra beach and bus stops that take you direct to the city. Cheaper than a hostel ! Very convenient location.  3 minutes to walk to the bus stop that travels direct to the city, CBD. 5 min walk to Maroubra Junction's Pacific Square which has a supermarket, and restaurants and coffee shops. 15-20 minute walk to Maroubra beach. The place has carpet in the bedroom and lounge room. Unit has internal laundry.  The washing machine is free to use. Unit is on the 3rd floor (No elevator, so you'll have to walk up 3 flights of stairs).  Facing East. From the bedroom you get a distant view of Maroubra beach. You can see the sunrise!  The room gets a lovely beach breeze so is quite cool.  If it's not cool enough, there is also a fan. Th
fields.neighbourhood_overview: I love that every thing is so convenient.  Bus stop to the city is 3 minutes away. Shops are a 5 minute walk away.   Close to Maroubra beach.
fields.transit: Getting around is quite convenient. The bus stop is 3 minutes away that goes direct to the City CBD, or Central Station. If you want to go to Bondi Junction, the bus stop is a 7 minute walk. The bus that goes to and from the airport (international and domestic) is a 7 minute walk as well.
fields.title: Sunny Single Room near beach &Shops

fields.summary: 400m flat stroll to fabulous Manly surf beach. Cafes, restaurants, wine shop and deli at one end of the street, swimming pools, golf and tennis courts at the other end. 5 bedrooms, pool and spa, everything you need for a fabulous holiday in Manly!
fields.description: 400m flat stroll to fabulous Manly surf beach. Cafes, restaurants, wine shop and deli at one end of the street, swimming pools, golf and tennis courts at the other end. 5 bedrooms, pool and spa, everything you need for a fabulous holiday in Manly! Only a 400m flat stroll to fabulous Manly surf beach. Cafes, restaurants, wine shop and deli at one end of the street, public swimming pools, golf and tennis courts at the other end. Walk along the beachfront into Manly for shopping, more cafes and to catch the ferry into the city.  Come back to the house after a day at the beach, take a dip in the pool, warm up in the heated spa pool with a glass of wine and finish off by enjoying the balmy summer evening relaxing on the deck over a BBQ dinner.  The house was totally renovated in 2010 and is full of character and charm with high ceilings, polished timber floors and leadlight windows. It has all the latest modern conveniences, ceiling fans in every room and is fully air conditioned. There is
fields.title: Manly Beach Holiday House with Pool

fields.summary: Clean, Comfortable, Convenient, Modern, Value  I take pride in how I treat my guests so please read the reviews and that will let you know some of what to expect. :) (URL HIDDEN) ------------Minimum 5 nights for NYE---------------
fields.description: Clean, Comfortable, Convenient, Modern, Value  I take pride in how I treat my guests so please read the reviews and that will let you know some of what to expect. :) (URL HIDDEN) ------------Minimum 5 nights for NYE--------------- Welcome to Sydney!(URL HIDDEN) This modern apartment is one of the best in the area and offers a high standard of amenities, location and quality. The apartment is on the 4th floor and is a split level design so you get your own room and private bathroom down stairs facing to the courtyard. Your Double Room has its own balcony, air conditioning, private bathroom with bathtub, and large wardrobes. My bedroom is located upstairs to the front of the building so you really get a private space. Please feel free to make use of the fully equipped kitchen though there are so many food options nearby, you also have access to a washing machine , clothes rack and dryer if needed. The suburb of Zetland is so close to everything yet far enough away that you don't feel ove
fields.notes: Come and enjoy!
fields.neighbourhood_overview: Its so convenient  to all of Sydney yet you come home to a quiet place away from the crowds. So many cafes and local attractions! I loved it so much I bought the apartment !   Also have a brand new shopping center EAST VILLAGE 400 m walk away. Even the local are excited. We also have a local food and craft market every Saturday morning so come and enjoy
fields.transit: Really easy to use public transport. With apps for planning and maps you can go anywhere and all from the front door.  Never had a guest not get to any place.
fields.title: City and Cafe Central

fields.description: Main Features;_ * Enjoy panoramic views of the beach and ocean from the balcony ,ocean only 25 metres away. Hear the waves, * 1 mins walk to frequent bus services to the city and to Bondi Junction * Many supermarkets, cafes and restaurants only a few min walk away * 2 bedrooms (usually in this advert However, currently1 bedroom as 1 will be used for storage whilst away for this stint.) * Queen size bed,  * High speed wireless  * DVD player in the lounge room and 50” plasma tv *stereo in the master bedroom and the lounge room * Instantaneous gas hot water system so you never run out of hot water * All modern appliances and loads of crockery * All Linen supplied is 100% Egyptian cotton, fluffy towels * Unmetered 2 hour street parking outside the building and shared use of off-street parking with other 4 apartments on fist come basis.  If it you are looking to stay in an apartment with spectacular views of the beach from every room then this is the apartment for you. The apartment is righ
fields.title: Relax on Balcony & watch the waves

fields.summary: A spacious and tranquil townhouse, moments to both Bronte and Tamarama beaches, and the famous coastal walk to Bondi Beach.  The downstairs living area is spacious and open plan, with a fully equipped eat in kitchen seating up to 10.  The house is surrounded by large courtyard/decks for relaxing and eating, themed in a lush Balinese style.
fields.description: A spacious and tranquil townhouse, moments to both Bronte and Tamarama beaches, and the famous coastal walk to Bondi Beach.  The downstairs living area is spacious and open plan, with a fully equipped eat in kitchen seating up to 10.  The house is surrounded by large courtyard/decks for relaxing and eating, themed in a lush Balinese style. The house has 3 Queen/Double bedrooms, and can accommodate 6 people in beds, as well as two extra mattresses if needed.   The Master bedroom also has an ensuite bathroom.  The downstairs courtyards at both front and back are perfect for lounging, reading, eating and entertaining. (Add a doona to the beautiful Teak Balinese daybed and you could sleep there too!) Guests have access to the whole property. We are on call anytime by email, phone or text and will endeavour to address any issues/repairs asap! We love Bronte for its proximity to both the city and harbour, while being literally minutes from both Bronte and Tamarama beaches,  and one of the mo
fields.notes: Note : We have a cat who usually goes to a local boarding facility.  Some guests enjoy having her around as she is very friendly and self contained. The choice is completely up to you.
fields.neighbourhood_overview: We love Bronte for its proximity to both the city and harbour, while being literally minutes from both Bronte and Tamarama beaches,  and one of the most beautiful coastal walks in the world. Take the famous Bondi to Bronte coastal walk, and you will arrive at Bondi Beach in only 20 minutes.  In and around our suburb there are so many amazing restaurants and cafes, from organic to tapas to fine dining. And the best coffee! There's shopping at Bondi Junction, bike riding at Centennial park, outdoor cinemas in the summer (and indoor at Bondi Junction). There's even an ice rink on Bondi Beach in the Winter Festival! Bronte is hard to beat.
fields.transit: A few metres from our property are regular buses to Bondi and Clovelly beaches (5-10 minutes), and the famous shopping mecca of Bondi Junction (10 minutes). At Bondi Junction you will find trains that will take you to the centre of Sydney (15 minutes)
fields.title: Bronte Tamarama Beach Retreat

fields.summary: Welcome to our family home in St Clair.  We hope you enjoy your stay with us.  The room is light and cheery with access to bathroom and main lounge/ dining and kitchen.
fields.description: Welcome to our family home in St Clair.  We hope you enjoy your stay with us.  The room is light and cheery with access to bathroom and main lounge/ dining and kitchen. Our home is half way between the Sydney CBD and the Blue Mountains with access to public transport.  We enjoy meeting new people and opening our home to others. We have 1 cat which likes to spend her time out and inside the home. We hope you enjoy your stay. The house is a 5 bedroom home with garage and a pool.  Guests are welcome to use the pool and there is on street parking if needed. We love to interact with our guests and  offer hospitality with breakfast provided and other meals if requested. Our home is located in a cul de sac with friendly neighbours Their is on street parking available, buses to closest railway station (St Mary’s) are close by.
fields.neighbourhood_overview: Our home is located in a cul de sac with friendly neighbours
fields.transit: Their is on street parking available, buses to closest railway station (St Mary’s) are close by.
fields.title: Family Home

fields.summary: Cozy and private room literally a stone's throw to Bronte Beach.
fields.description: Cozy and private room literally a stone's throw to Bronte Beach. Superbly situated, this renovated 2 bedroom flat is just 100m to the golden sands of Bronte Beach and its vibrant surfside cafes. Footsteps to city buses and eastern beaches coastal walk between Bondi Beach and Coogee Beach. 20 minutes bus ride to the centre of Sydney city. With a 30 minute scenic stroll along the cliffs to Bondi beach and all its bars, restaurants and shops. And 2 minutes walk to Bronte beach, cafes and the 378 bus terminal which goes straight to central station and the city, going through Bondi junction train station and the convenient Westfield Mall in Bondi Junction. Your room has a double futon bed, wardrobe and a desk.  The flat has wireless Internet, air conditioning, heater and laundry facilities (washer/drier) SHOPS, CAFES & AMMENITES in walking distance 2 MIN walk: Bronte beach - The most good looking beach in town. Restaurants and excellent cafes for delicious brekkies. Bronte Pool - excellent
fields.title: Bronte stunning beachside flat

fields.summary: This immaculate two bedroom, two bathroom apartment is situated in an enviable location just moments from shops, cafes, specialty food stores, beaches and minutes drive to Manly’s wharf.
fields.description: This immaculate two bedroom, two bathroom apartment is situated in an enviable location just moments from shops, cafes, specialty food stores, beaches and minutes drive to Manly’s wharf. Located in the heart of Balgowlah's shopping precinct, this two bedroom, two bathroom apartment has everything your family needs to be your home away from home. The main bedroom has a queen bed, with an ensuite. The second bedroom is a great kids room with a cot, single bed and a change table. The living room has two comfy couches, a big dinning table and lots of books and toys to keep the entire family occupied. There is a lovely private courtyard with a bbq. It’s a perfect spot to enjoy a drink after a day at the beach or pool. The apartment is fully air-conditioned, and within the complex is a 25 meter pool. Guests have access to the entire apartment, and the pool in the complex. We will be away during this time, however we will organise a local contact for any questions you may have. Our neighbours
fields.notes: We want you feel at home and enjoy your stay, however it is important that you realise this is our home so our things will be in the house. If you're looking for a serviced apartment or a holiday home this is probably not for you. We can guarantee that the place will be clean and tidy and you will be close to the world famous Manly beach.
fields.neighbourhood_overview: Our neighbours are quiet and respectful. Many of them will be away during the Christmas period so you will really feel like you have entire block to yourself!
fields.transit: You will not be short of public transport to get around and explore this beautiful area of Sydney - express buses to the city, buses to Manly and Palm Beach all leave just outside the complex. We are also a very short walk away to the beautiful Spit to Manly foreshore walk, and if you don't feel like walking there is a free bus to get you down to Manly.
fields.title: Family resort style living close to Manly

fields.description: Maroubra Beach is just a 15-minute walk away from this elegant room overlooking a pretty front yard garden and a large park. It includes free Wi-Fi and an en suite bathroom. The ground-floor bedroom is fully furnished with a double bed, a walk-in wardrobe, and a bathroom with a shower and WC. There is a microwave, a kettle, a toaster, a fridge in the room and a BBQ outside. Guests benefit from complete privacy as the hosts living area and kitchen are located upstairs.  Laundry facilities are available. Guests also have access to the front yard garden to take in the summer sun or dine under the stars.  Guests and hosts share the same entry to the house via front yard garden. Enjoy the stunning ocean views at one of the local cafes, or take a relaxed swim at the North Maroubra Rock Pool. A bus stop is within a 5-minute walk for direct connections to the city centre. Neighbouring Coogee and Randwick are just 10 minutes' journey by bus and offer numerous trendy bars and coffee shops.
fields.title: Private Maroubra RM w/ Ensuite

fields.description: A unique location sets this place apart from the rest! This large, very private house with rainforest and bush surrounds could be anywhere and yet is only 5 minutes walk from the beach and the vibrant village life of Avalon. A Private Retreat in Avalon This retreat offers a large new architect designed home with ample opportunities for recreation and rest. It has a large pool, several outdoor entertainment areas and sweeping lawns backing on to a quiet reserve that are perfect in Summer. The house offers a unique living experience with a generous open living, dining and modern kitchen. The house has 4 bedrooms and sleeps 8 people. The main bedroom has a queen size bed; second bedroom has a double bed; the other two bedrooms have 2 single beds each. You can be entertained by Foxtel TV, music stereo or DVD. The house also has an upright piano. The Area Avalon is located on Sydney's Northern Beaches about 35km north of the CBD.  It has one of the most beautiful beaches in Sydney with soft
fields.title: Tranquil Rainforest Avalon Retreat

fields.summary: Ground floor comfortable Art Deco flat 5 kms from the CBD. Home away from home close to great cafés, golf course and famous Bondi Beach.  A train from Sydney airport takes you to Circular Quay where a ferry ride and short walk has you here. Also an Airport Shuttle bus is available.
fields.description: Ground floor comfortable Art Deco flat 5 kms from the CBD. Home away from home close to great cafés, golf course and famous Bondi Beach.  A train from Sydney airport takes you to Circular Quay where a ferry ride and short walk has you here. Also an Airport Shuttle bus is available. Rose bay is a picturesque, historic suburb of Sydney and is located a convenient  5 km from the CBD. It features a number of parks including 2 golf courses. There are also great shops close by, a number of terrific restaurants, and several lovely harbour side beaches where you can hire a kayak.  Transport  The Rose Bay ferry wharf provides access to the Eastern Suburbs Ferry service. There are also frequent buses to and from the centre of Sydney via Kings Cross. There is a train station at Edgecliff which provides easy access to all parts of the city. The famous Bondi beach is also a short bus trip away. Come and stay in one of Sydney's best locations! The main bedroom and amenities of the apartment ie. kitc
fields.notes: Due to narrow hallway the flat does not have wheel chair access.

It's close to beaches, including Bondi, and very convenient to the city - near rail and buses. We're in a pretty and quiet street with a small park 50 metres away that kids love. Centennial park is 5 minutes walk away.  The house has two large bedrooms. One has a king size double bed, the other has a bunk bed suitable for up to two children. We also have a portacot for very young children. It has a modern and well equipped kitchen and a TV with HDD/DVD player/recorder, as well as wifi. The bathroom is best described as 'efficient' - it's small but new and clean. There's no bath though, only a shower. Makes us sa
fields.title: 2BD house close to beaches & city

fields.summary: Unique experience to live with an Australian family for short stay, enjoying the friendliness and the hospitality of the host while relaxing from the busy days of short business trip. This is the perfect fit.
fields.description: Unique experience to live with an Australian family for short stay, enjoying the friendliness and the hospitality of the host while relaxing from the busy days of short business trip. This is the perfect fit. Quiet sun-lit room in unit sharing with host's family. The bedroom is supplied with stylish linen and doona. Excellent study and rest environment for university student for semester stay. Guest will share bathroom. Guest may use open kitchen with full range of gas stove, grill and microwave oven. Guest will be met with friendly family of 3. The air-conditioned room is supplied with linen and doona, household consumables, extra cutlery and cooking utensils can be supplied. WiFi available at no extra cost. Optional Continental Breakfast can be ordered. The unit is on top floor of an apartment strata complex of friendly neighbours.  Local post office and railway station are no more than 5 miinutes walk away ! Shops, supermarkets and banks are one train station away at Hornsby.  Easil
fields.notes: Confirmed guest is welcomed to discuss possibility of using Landlord's shuttle van to/from airport at additional cost.
fields.neighbourhood_overview: Normanhurst is a quiet suburb next to Hornsby, the last northern suburb before one exits urban Sydney to the central coast. Normanhurst is the suburb with excellent schools and outstanding retirement villages, with excellent infrastructure support.
fields.transit: Sydney CitiRail has two lnes accessing the Normanhurst Station. Public transport by bus, taxi and private cars are alternatives.
fields.title: Quiet and sunny room in Normanhurst

fields.description: I have a private room available in a lovely apartment with Bronte beach views from the garden! Your Space & Shared Facilities The room can be arranged as two separate single beds or the beds can be put together as a double bed! You will be sharing the bathroom and kitchen with a friendly, easy going family.  WiFi and Cable TV are available and there are laundry facilities for you to use. Location, Shops & Transport The apartment is 5 minutes walk to the beach,  and just a moment to transport to the city, trendy local restaurants and cafes. All the basics can be found in Bronte itself, and there are some lovely breakfast cafes such as the Bogey Hole Cafe along the beach front. Catch the bus from the beach directly into central Sydney in about 20 minutes, or up to the train station in 10 or less.  The Westfield shopping centre at Bondi Junction hosts every shop you could possibly need! Highlights in the Area The coastal track along the cliffs to Bondi Beach in one direction and towards C
fields.title: Private room with Bronte beach view

fields.summary: Quiet street with village feel. Ideal for family or two couples.  Clean and neat with  modern kitchen and bathroom High quality linen.   This is well suited to a family as there are two bedrooms and really good cooking facilities. Most people who stay love the fact it is so close to the city (3 stops) and a short walk to Erskineville and Newtown.
fields.description: Quiet street with village feel. Ideal for family or two couples.  Clean and neat with  modern kitchen and bathroom High quality linen.   This is well suited to a family as there are two bedrooms and really good cooking facilities. Most people who stay love the fact it is so close to the city (3 stops) and a short walk to Erskineville and Newtown. Whole, older style, single storey terrace house in inner city suburb.  The house is cosy, friendly, and has all that you would need, including luxury towels and linen and things to cook with.  We leave organic milk, butter, and oil as well as all the essential herbs and condiments and breakfast cereals and fruit.  Variety of teas and coffee.  It is really close to shops in a quiet tree-lined street.  Non restricted parking on weekends but restricted during the week. 5 min. walk to Erskineville shops and train station, 10 minutes by train to the city.  10 minutes walk to Newtown.  Erskineville has a "village" atmosphere with friendly cafes and
fields.notes: We only use environmentally friendly and organic cleaning products and don't use insecticides or dangerous chemicals in the house or yard.  Please respect this.
fields.neighbourhood_overview: We have wonderful neighbours with kids who play outside because the street is quiet and safe. There are numerous eateries in Erskineville and nearby Newtown although our kitchen is well set up with condiments and milk, butter, oil.  It's a short walk to the local supermarket, fruiterer and  delicatessen.  More information on this when you arrive.
fields.transit: A taxi from the airport will take 20 minutes.  A short walk to Erskineville station gets you to the city. Newtown is just 10 minutes walk Parking in the street is available all day on weekends.  Weekdays a bit more of a challenge as there is only 2 hour parking from 9-6.
fields.title: Erskineville House near Newtown Family-friendly.

fields.summary: The apartment has one bedroom where there is a queen size bed and a single bed. There is also an en-suite bathroom. In the lounge/dining room there is a double sofa bed. There is a TV in both the bedroom and the dining room. There is free, unlimited parking in front of house and also on nearest side street 50m away. There is always someone on hand if you require anything. There are new pillows, new sheets, new covers.
fields.description: The apartment has one bedroom where there is a queen size bed and a single bed. There is also an en-suite bathroom. In the lounge/dining room there is a double sofa bed. There is a TV in both the bedroom and the dining room. There is free, unlimited parking in front of house and also on nearest side street 50m away. There is always someone on hand if you require anything. There are new pillows, new sheets, new covers. Close to the city and to the airport. Newly built, stylish, spacious with private outdoor area, TV, free wi-fi, fitted with all modern facilities. Linen and towels, kitchen utensils provided. Ideal location - walk everywhere. Eat ethnic food across the road! The Apartment With Marrickville train station at your doorstep, the City is only 15 minutes away. The apartment is newly built, so be one of the first to move in! Your very own apartment with on-suite bathroom, flat screen TV, free wi-fi, microwave, toaster, cooktop, fridge, intermal laundry, own private outdoor area.
fields.notes: If you do arrive earlier, there is a Greek bakery/cafe only 150m away where you can sit down and can grab a bite to eat and drink. Hellenic Bakery Corner of Schwebel St and Illawarra Road (just head to the train station).
fields.title: Apartment 15 minutes to City with free parking.

fields.summary: If you want to explore Bondi Beach and Sydney, this place is a great spot. Very close to the beach,  public transport, cafes and shops, but very quiet and relaxing at the same time. Listing is for one person only.
fields.description: If you want to explore Bondi Beach and Sydney, this place is a great spot. Very close to the beach,  public transport, cafes and shops, but very quiet and relaxing at the same time. Listing is for one person only. Fully renovated, nice European style 2 bedroom apartment with wooden floor boards, high ceilings and a huge shared roof top terrace with ocean view. It is in a nice quiet street and only 3 min walk to the beach, the shops, restaurants.  Available only: June 23- July 17th 2017 Minimum stay 7 nights. The apartment is in a very nice and well looked after building. My neighbours are lovely and most of them are owners and therefore I am looking for responsible people only. The place is on the ground floor and has 2 bedrooms,  one bath, living room and kitchen. You will find a fully equipped kitchen, a washer and wireless internet for your convenience. You can access all rooms accept my sons bedroom at the end of  the building. You will share the space with one other person. Everyt
fields.notes: My kitchen has a water filter system for drinking water, tea and coffee.
fields.neighbourhood_overview: Everything!! Best place in Bondi, everything is super close!
fields.transit: There are several buses just around the corner going up to Bondi Junction every few minutes . Trains from Bondi Junction take you where ever you need to go. You can also take a bus straight to the City, Cirqular Quai etc.
fields.title: Cozy beach flat in Bondi

fields.summary: Relaxed  family retreat close to everything  - live like a Sydneysider minutes from Manly
fields.description: Relaxed  family retreat close to everything  - live like a Sydneysider minutes from Manly Our house is perfect for families having an extended holiday in Manly, visting family and friends on the northern beaches or as a comfortable place to start your new life in Sydney whilst looking for a permanent rental. Why rent a clinical sparsely furnished serviced apartment when you can have a fully equiped family home?  We have recently moved from the UK after 15 years away from home so we are keen to share our home with families relocating or visting family and friends.  We have been there, done that, and know how hard it can be before your container arrives and you have a place to rent, particularly at Christmas New Year time. Fairlight is 12 minutes walk to Manly Beach and the Manly Ferry into the City. It is also served by buses to Manly, the city and elsewhere. We have a lovely park at the end of the street and 'village shops' 5 just minutes walk, where you can get milk, bread, meat and a
fields.neighbourhood_overview: We are walking distance from Manly beach but not in a touristy part of town. No problems with parking.  You have local cafes, shops etc on the doorstep but have access to all the opportunities and activities offered by Manly and the rest of Sydney Great coffee, butcher, Harris Farm, Seafood Market walking distance
fields.transit: Buses to the city 5 mins walk Free bus to the Manly pool, beach, Manly and wharf on the doorstep Ferries 15 minutes walk  Travel like a local on the Free 'Hop skip and jump' buses to and from the shops, ferry and beaches on the door step which arte great for little egs.  No need for a car
fields.title: Family house - walk to Manly beach

fields.description: Come and stay in my bright and sunny top floor 2 bed apartment located on Sydney's Northern Beaches, just a short stroll to the beautiful Dee Why Beach. Buses to the city and Manly are at the door. There is a ferry from Manly to the City. Close to the shops and beachside restaurants and cafes. Dee Why beach is a hub of cafes and restaurants right next to a 2km long surf beach. There is an Ocean pool at the beach as well as a grassed BBQ area if you dont want to get sandy. You will have exclusive use of 1 large furnished bedroom with a queen sized bed and mirrored built in wardrobes. You will have access to a bathroom, toilet, kitchen and laundry shared with the host. I will be available in evenings and weekends to answer questions about the locality and transport if needed.
fields.title: Dee Why 2 bed unit- stroll to beach

fields.summary: Amazing 2-bedroom apartment straight on the popular Bondi beach, perfect for families with 2 kids.  Literally across the road from Bondi Beach. Spectacular views of beach and ocean from lounge room, with amazing sunrises. Comfortable balcony with stunning view on the beach and dining table. 2nd floor apartment with elevator. Very modern flat with well-equiped kitchen, bath and shower. 1 adult bedroom and 1 kids bedroom.
fields.description: We are renting our amazing 2-bedroom apartment straight on the popular Bondi beach during our holidays. Literally across the road from Bondi Beach. Spectacular views of beach and ocean from lounge room, with amazing sunrises.  2nd floor apartment. Very modern.  Comfortable balcony with stunning view on the beach, table and BBQ. So relax and enjoy the magnificent beach views while relaxing or eating on the balcony! Huge living room with large couch, TV and fully equipped kitchen with dishwasher, oven, microwave. Floorboards throughout. The whole flat is quiet thanks to very good double glazing windows.  First bedroom has a brand new queen bed. Second bedroom has a double sofa bed, a cot as well as another balcony. The 2 bedrooms are facing the courtyard so are very quiet. Bathroom is rendered in modern tones and figures both a shower and a bath. Free Wi-fi Internet access. Washing machine and dryer. BBQ. Linen provided. 2 surfboards to be used for free. Seconds to cafes and restaurants.
fields.neighbourhood_overview: Seconds to the sand, cafes, restaurants, transport, supermarkets, bottle shops and everything Bondi has to offer.
fields.transit: Buses: Apartment is 50m to main Bondi Beach bus stop to and from Sydney CBD.  Train: Bondi Junction bus/rail interchange is a 7 minute bus ride away. Buses run every 5-10 minutes or so until midnight.  The train ride to the City takes 10 minutes with trains running every 5-15 minutes or so until midnight.
fields.title: 2-Beds apt with 180° view on beach

fields.summary: Medium sized double in a comfy two bedroom apartment in the heart of Newtown. Share bathroom and kitchen in this cool, leafy, retro style pad, situated in the creative hub of Sydney. Close by train to CBD, Sydney Opera House and Harbour Bridge.
fields.description: Medium sized double in a comfy two bedroom apartment in the heart of Newtown. Share bathroom and kitchen in this cool, leafy, retro style pad, situated in the creative hub of Sydney. Close by train to CBD, Sydney Opera House and Harbour Bridge. I have a medium sized comfy room with double bed in a two bedroom apartment in the heart of Newtown, the cosmopolitan hub of Sydney. Share bathroom and kitchen with myself or other guest when I am away, in this  cool, leafy, 60’s style pad, situated in between Enmore and King, the thriving main streets of our buzzy village. The living space is a boheme cushion room with a low table for relaxed eating, and armchairs for those who don’t like knee bending. I don't have a big social life, no bohemian wild parties going on. From time to time my family members may drop by and hopefully you will get to meet the latest addition, my one year old grandaughter.  We have two balcony areas as well as complimentary wifi. Come at the right time of the year and
fields.notes: If you love fossicking in second hand stores, vintage clothing, seeking out interesting designer shops, craft, kidsware, hanging out in funky cafes and bars... it's all here in Newtown!
fields.neighbourhood_overview: Newtown is alive with interesting people, cute shops and fabulous bars and restaurants.  It is the creative hub of Sydney, only ten mins by train from the Sydney Opera House, Harbour Bridge, Museum of Contemporary Art. You can take a bus to Coogee Beach and do the spectacular cliff walk to Bondi. Hop on a train to the Blue Mts or take ferry trips around the harbour to explore Manly or the charms of Balmains historic houses.
fields.transit: Train and bus to all parts of the city (10 mins) and city beaches. Newtown Station is 4 mins walk away. Bus 2 mins walk. Buy a weekly ticket for $44 for use on bus, train and ferry even if you only stay 3- 4 days it is worth it. Off street parking available. Taxi from the airport is $30 for 2 people is cheaper than the train ($15 +$4 each).
fields.title: Inner City Bohemian Living

fields.description: Free standing house in a quiet, tree-lined street, 6kms from the city centre.  Fully furnished open plan living & dining, 3 bedrooms (2 x double, 1 x twin) 2 bathrooms, courtyard with BBQ and outdoor furniture.  Reverse cycle air conditioning, & gas log fire in living room.   5 mins walk from Erskineville village and 10mins from King Street Newtown.  Parks, cafes & restaurants within walking distance.  5 mins to trains and buses.   Flat screen TV's with Foxtel Sport. Wireless internet available.  Minimum booking of 7 nights
fields.notes: Minimum booking of 7 nights
fields.title: 3 bedroom house 6kms from SydneyCBD

fields.summary: BEST LOCATION, BEST RATE! Great Coffee Everywhere!
fields.description: BEST LOCATION, BEST RATE! Great Coffee Everywhere! Welcome Home! This amazing studio offers a real home feel in an Art Deco building of 16 apartments with a common rooftop offering district views. The apartment offers a great use of space, with sleeping alcove and has been beautifully renovated in a chic, contemporary manner optimising all available space. The studio is fully furnished with all linen and towels provided.  Set in an urban oasis, in the middle of Sydney's best bars, restaurants and night life, small and tidy but everything you need and want, plus a few extras - security building, built in surround sound with docking system, American Oak floor boards, lux double bed, 40 inch flat screen, blue ray and plenty of dvds, Internal laundry, fully renovated kitchen with oven, dishwasher, range-hood, 40mm stone bench-tops and hexagonal splash back tile.  Fully renovated bathroom in white with curved vanity and clever space saving solutions. Built in wardrobe High, ornate ceilings,
fields.neighbourhood_overview: The location is arguably the best and boarders all the hip suburbs like Potts Point, Paddington and Darlinghurst, literally seconds away from great Darlo restaurants, Potts Point bars and the night life of Kings Cross. The apartment is centrally located to everything, including supermarkets (a 3min walk on the same street) and wifi cafes, which are literally next door at Jeremy & Sons Cafe. Walk 17min west and you'll be in the heart of the city, 10min walk south and you'll end up on Oxford street, 10 min east and you'll be exposed to incredible harbour views and parks, the Botanic Gardens and Opera House are also walking distance with the night life of Kings Cross only steps away. Feeling lazy? Kings Cross train station is less than a 5min walk and will get you in the city within 7min and only 2 stops away from Bondi.
fields.transit: It's super easy getting to places from the apartment, you're footsteps from bus and trains, or roughly a 20 min walk to the heart of the city.
fields.title: AMAZING STUDIO, In URBAN OASIS!

fields.summary: This beautiful private loft space takes out the 3rd level of this modern terrace. Lots of space, windows facing east and west (sunrise and sunset - yay). Fully furnished - with modern and hand built furniture. No joke: Location location location.
fields.description: This beautiful private loft space takes out the 3rd level of this modern terrace. Lots of space, windows facing east and west (sunrise and sunset - yay). Fully furnished - with modern and hand built furniture. No joke: Location location location. I'm renting my really big (i'm not exaggerating, it's huge), really bright and airy, fully furnished, relaxing bedroom-loft in inner Sydney. My room occupies the entire 3rd floor of a beautiful and modern 5 bedroom terrace. It's a loft (no door) and it's stunning. You'll be sharing the house with 5 friends, young (25-30) professional and from varying backgrounds. Girls and boys, all very friendly and social who will make you feel welcome.  The house has new bathrooms and kitchen, which is all yours to share in. Some of us like to cook, so we have a plethora of kitchen utensils for cooking. The house is really bright and sunny with a beautiful main room for sharing meals. And a sunny courtyard with a BBQ and my own personal but fabulous herb ga
fields.notes: We're 60 seconds (yes! seconds!) walk to a woolworths supermarket. You have no idea (or you might) how amazing this is. Wait for it, 15 seconds walk (okay, so it's across the road!) to a sports oval and a stunning victorian style park. Great for a picnic or bbq. All utilities are included, nothing more to pay, we have fast internet wifi too.
fields.neighbourhood_overview: If you are looking to explore Sydney, my place is virtually perfect: away from the hustle and bustle but so close it's ridiculous. The area has some really good cafe's that are just 2 minutes walk from my door (e.g. Tapeo). And over 50 local restaurants deliver if you are having a lazy moment.  If you're more into bars, then Redfern is really cool right now. There are loads of brand new bars in the area and they are a great hang-out just a few minutes stroll from my door. The Bearded Tit is my favourite, you have to go there!
fields.transit: My place is 10 minutes walk to Central station - the station you want to be near. You can get a bus to central 100m from my place if you're feeling lazy, this bus will go right into the heart of the City too. Also, the bus stop that will take you to Bondi is 100m walk from the front door.
fields.title: Huge bright loft in sunny Sydney

fields.description: Available from Wednesday 24th December until Wednesday 31st  December 2014 - 1 week. This is a great place for visiting friends or relatives over the holiday period! Two bedroom terrace house available in Paddington for your  holiday. The house is located two minutes walk from Oxford St with it's cafes, markets and great shopping, and five minutes walk from Sydney's Centennial Park. There is easy access to public transport for quick trips to the city and to Sydney's best beaches. The house has a dining room, lounge room, two balconies, two bedrooms, a small courtyard and is comfortably furnished. It is perfect for a couple or those with a baby as there is a cot in the second bedroom. Equipped with: - TV - Stereo - Washing Machine and Dryer - Courtyard -Herb garden - Fully equipped Kitchen - Linen Provided - Large dining table - Fully furnished - Cot in second room - Quiet street - Off the street easy parking -  Paddington, Centennial Park, Darlinghurst, Surry Hills, Bondi Junction and
fields.title: Paddington Terrace

fields.summary: Stunning apartment with ocean views of Bondi Beach.
fields.description: Stunning apartment with ocean views of Bondi Beach. EXCLUSIVE AND IDEAL LOCATION FOR ENJOYING BEACH, SURF, BONDI AND SYDNEY. IMMACULATE VIEW OVER BONDI BEACH - YOU CAN WATCH THE WAVES FROM EVERY WINDOW AND YOU CAN'T GET ANY CLOSER TO THE BEACH Penthouse style apartment with the best views you can imagine to get in Bondi Beach (photos demonstrate the actual view). Cosy, airy and sun filled atmosphere. Ideal for couples, executives and creatives. Upper level, polished floorboards, lots of natural light. Situated on Bondi's main shopping strip amongst sweet cafes, trendy bars and notable access to public transport (next bus stop is 1 minute away), you could not be more central. This is a paradise, directly across the road from the beach! The kitchenette in main living room and there is one bedroom + one bathroom with bath and shower (you can even watch the waves while you having a shower) for your leisure. If your not the outdoors type, relax in a serene location and use our provided wire
fields.transit: There is a bus stop just across the street from the place. You can catch the bus 333, 380 and 381 which goes all the way into the city (Opera House & Circular Key). The buses also stop at Bondi Junction where you can catch other buses and trains.
fields.title: STUNNING BONDI BEACH OCEAN VIEWS

fields.summary: Gorgeous artist apartment perfect for relaxing after a day of sightseeing. Lot's lots sunshine and nature from every window. Enjoy all the wild birds that come visit on the balcony each morning and evening.
fields.description: Gorgeous artist apartment perfect for relaxing after a day of sightseeing. Lot's lots sunshine and nature from every window. Enjoy all the wild birds that come visit on the balcony each morning and evening. Welcome to my quiet, sunny ocean view apartment. It feels like an urban retreat away from the city as the place looks out onto the Fred Hollow’s reserve so there's nature from every window and is sun drenched all day with many of our wild birds that come to visit me on the balcony daily.  I also have lots of interesting art on the walls and many pieces of unique furniture to give the place an artistic feel. ( photo's are a little old and don't show the art) Your bedroom has ocean views over Coogee beach, with premium quality bed linen and a super comfy bed so you can rest after a full day’s sightseeing.  The kitchen is compact but well equipped with a good blender and juicer for a healthy kick-start to the day. Alternatively, there is always fresh coffee and many types of herbal tea
fields.notes: I have many plants in the house and ask guests to water them as this is my much-loved home and plants make the place feel so welcoming. Also, I have many wild birds come to visit which I ask guests to keep their water bowl full of water as well as leave a little seed for them occasionally if they like to interact with them. They are ever so cute!! There is an amazing yoga school that looks out on the beach and plenty of cafe's pubs and restaurants. It’s also the start of a beautiful ocean walk from Coogee to Bondi that takes around 1 hour. Clovelly beach is 20 mins walk or Bondi 15mins on the bus. You can also be in the CBD within 20mins with many buses from Alison Road. The beautiful Centennial Park is only 10 mins walk where you can bike ride, run or picnic near the ponds.
fields.neighbourhood_overview: So close to the beach and Centennial park. Best of both worlds. Great coffee shops and bakery at the end of the street on Frenchmans road.
fields.transit: I'm smack in the middle of 3 different bus stops going to Bondi Junction and the city, transport is super easy and quick.
fields.title: Sunny & peaceful urban oasis close to the beach

fields.summary: A tranquil beach side lagoon setting.
fields.description: A tranquil beach side lagoon setting. The House This Curl Curl beach house has been transformed into a modern open plan home ideal for entertaining. It features a modern kitchen, 2 bathrooms, living room and fully furnished outdoor bbq patio.  The Area Curl Curl is a suburb of northern Sydney in the state of New South Wales, Australia 18 kilometers north-east of the Sydney central business district. The house is located located on a cul-de-sac just a 5 minute walk to the the beach. Curl Curl is known for some of the best surfing on the Northern Beaches. Walk across the reserve and you're off the beaten path making for a tranquil setting along the Curl Curl Lagoon. You'll find pubs and restaurants within easy walking distance. There are also numerous pubs, restaurants and cafes along the famous Manly Corso, which is a short bus trip away. Transport Curl Curl is serviced by 4 bus routes 136: Manly to Chatswood; 139: Manly to Warringah Mall; E65: South Curl Curl to Sydney CBD. Also the 15
fields.neighbourhood_overview: Located just a 5 minute walk to the the beach across the reserve you're just off the beaten path making for a tranquil setting along the Curl Curl Lagoon on a cul-de-sac.
fields.title: Curl Curl Beach Living

fields.summary: Great location near Sydney's Bondi, Bronte beaches, Tamarama, CBD, Centennial park and more.  Perfect for Families 1 Queen Master Bedroom, 2nd bedroom with Single and Cot and 3rd Bedroom is a sunroom only with Brand new single Sofa Bed Walk to beach, bus at door to City, train 10 min walk + famous cafe's across road. Shopping malls, Sydney's best parks  Sound treated windows ensure whisper quiet bedrooms  Bondi Junction Train station 10 mins easy walk

Perfect for Families 1 Queen Master Bedroom, 2nd bedroom with Single and Cot and 3rd Bedroom is a sunroom only with Brand new single Sofa Bed Walk to beach, bus at door to City, train 10 min walk + famous cafe's across road. Shopping malls, Sydney's best parks  Sound treated windows ensure whisper quiet bedrooms  Bondi Junction Train station 10 mins easy walk Spacious 2.5 bedroom available The apartment is newly renovated, is a gorgeous art-deco 2.5 bedroom apartment . It includes a brand new kitchen and bathroom, Foxtel cable tv,wi fi, dishwasher and gas cooking. Perfect for young familie. Please note the configuration is one huge master bedroom with queen bed. 2nd bedroom has a cot and a single bed, 3rd bedroom is a smaller room with a single sofa bed.  Cafes and supermarkets easy walking distance  It is close to nearby beaches, Centennial park, and you'll be able to jump on a bus to either
fields.neighbourhood_overview: Beaches Parks less than 2 kilometres.  3 top shelf cafes across road. Close to City Centre only 4 kilometres and major train station 10 mins walk  Great location in the Eastern suburbs close to Bondi and Bronte beaches close to major shopping and city Just message me for more details
fields.transit: Very good transport Bus at door Trains station Bondi Junction 10 minutes walk and access to all Sydney has to offer beaches, city, cafe's and parks
fields.title: Eastern Beaches, CBD and Parks- Family Friendly

fields.summary: This stunning Studio Apartment offers everything you could want in a guest experience. It is close to the city centre with many public transport options to take you to all the tourist attractions. The reviews say it all!
fields.description: This stunning Studio Apartment offers everything you could want in a guest experience. It is close to the city centre with many public transport options to take you to all the tourist attractions. The reviews say it all! Come and stay in this immaculate modern studio in leafy Lilyfield This home away from home is perfect for a Sydney visitor. Fully equipped with polished floorboards, queen bed, lounge, modern bathroom and kitchen, this large Studio is the size of a one bedroom apartment. It opens out to a large sunny courtyard, making it perfect for indoor or outdoor living. A rollaway bed can be provided upon request for an additional $25 per night and an arrival breakfast pack for 2 can be prepared for $25. We are also happy to put in 2 additional beds for a family of 4, allowing for 2 adults and 2 children to stay.  If staying with children you will be pleased to know there is a large park and play area 5 minutes walk away and a large aquatic centre for fun or exercise 3 minutes dri
fields.notes: There is a large IGA grocery store with everything you could possibly need 3 minutes walk from The Studio, opposite the Light Rail.  If staying with children you will be pleased to know there is a large park and play area 5 minutes walk away and a large aquatic centre for fun or exercise 3 minutes drive from the Studio.
fields.neighbourhood_overview: Located in a leafy inner Sydney suburb it is hard to believe the City is so close. Part of the charm is that you can come home after a long day and feel a sense of calm, yet be so conveniently located to everything that you need to explore and visit. Shops, restaurants and bars are all walking distance, and if you have a car there is plenty of unrestricted parking right outside the premises.
fields.transit: Only 2 minutes walk from the Light Rail taking you to Darling Harbour, Star City, the Sydney Fish Markets, International Convention Centre Sydney and the centre of the City it provides an excellent accommodation opportunity for Sydney visitors. It is also close to bus stops for direct access to Balmain and Leichhardt, offering plentiful dining opportunities and shopping. We are also located close to Le Montage Function Centre which can be accessed in 15 minutes on foot or via light rail from Lilyfield to North Leichhardt Light Rail stations. very convenient if attending a Wedding Reception or Function at this venue. Walking distance to restaurants, boutiques and markets every Saturday in Rozelle and at Orange Grove, this leafy suburb is a hidden gem only 7 minutes into central Sydney by car and has plenty of on street parking.
fields.title: Sydney Inner West City Immaculate

fields.summary: Directly opposite North Curl Curl Beach and the reserve. Large unleashed dog walking area across the lagoon where dogs may swim. Short walk to bottle shop, cafe, hairdresser and post office. Walk to the many restaurants along the Dee Why beachfront. Enjoy the spectacular coastal walk. Direct bus to Manly/Chatswood/city ferry.
fields.description: Directly opposite North Curl Curl Beach and the reserve. Large unleashed dog walking area across the lagoon where dogs may swim. Short walk to bottle shop, cafe, hairdresser and post office. Walk to the many restaurants along the Dee Why beachfront. Enjoy the spectacular coastal walk. Direct bus to Manly/Chatswood/city ferry. One bedroom detached studio apartment plus kitchenette with adjoining bathroom/laundry facilities (washing machine).Large refrigerator  , bench top dishwasher and cooking facilities include hot plates, small convection oven, microwave and barbecue grill. Plus reverse cycle air conditioning. Suitable for one person or a couple. Separate entrance and secure yard at rear of main house.  Quiet cul-de-sac street, right on North Curl Curl beach and close to bus routes to Manly, Chatswood and the city.  Equipment/Facilities available: - Swimming Pool - Baby equipment (portable cot) - Double bed - Kettle and - All linen and cooking utensils provided - Free street parking

fields.neighbourhood_overview: Open spaces, lots of greenery with great ocean views/access. Small shopping area within 200 metres includes a coffee shop, vegetarian restaurant, bottle shop, convenience store, post office, hairdresser plus other small businesses. Walk to the many restaurants and bars along the Dee Why beachfront. Be sure to do the Curl Curl to Dee Why coastal walk which is spectacular.
fields.transit: Yes excellent bus service connects with ferry at Manly. Also bus service to Dee Why and Chatswood. Direct bus to city during peak hours weekdays only.
fields.title: Studio/Cabin. Quiet beachside location!!!

There is also a study work area with desk off of the living room, high speed Wi-Fi internet, Digital hi-fi sound system for your iPod, flat screen digital TV, fully functioning kitchen with SMEG oven, dishwasher, microwave, refrigerator, all utensils glassware and crockery is included. The  main laundry facilities on the Mezzanine level. Ironing facilities are within the apartment.  24 hour concierge, rooftop heated pool, gym and sauna with excellent harbor & city views, and a fully licensed restaurant on the ground floor.  Excellent views from the apartment of the Sydney Gay & Lesbian Mardi Gras parade starting point.   Security, Views, Built-In Wardrobes, Furnished, Close to Publ

Close to all conveniences, shops restaurants Sydney’s Oxford Street, Darlinghurst night life, and the best city landmarks, Museum, Art Gallery, Sydney Harbor, Sydney Opera House, China Town, Darling Harbor & Sydney Convention Center etc. This location is also the Parade starting point for the Sydney Gay & Lesbian Mardi Gras.
fields.transit: Underground City-Rail train, Mauseum, St James or Town Hall Stations all close by.  Buses, plenty of taxis, or walk almost anywhere.  Taxi from the airport will take about 20 minutes and cost about AU$47.   You can also catch the train from the airport and alight at the Liverpool Station on Hyde Park.  After you exit the station walk for 3 minutes up Liverpool Street towards the east, and you will reach the building.   There are also many tourist bus services from the airport to the building door.

Positioned right next to the train station the apartment is in easy access of all parts of Sydney.

Fabulous connection to CBD, including bus and train transportation (Bus 380 to Bondi Junction, following train into the City, or alternatively take the 333 to Circular Key, both 3 min walking distance). This apartment has the charme of Art Deco, with spectacular beachview, a beautiful sunrise and a sunny afternoon sun for relaxing in leisure. The apartment is fully furnished: one big master bedroom with double bed, pillows and big wardrobe, and another slightly smaller one, with single bed, pillows and small wardrobe. You will love the sun drenched living room and a full size bathroom and kitchen with oven, kettle and toaster, and all other utensils provided. The bathroom has both a bath and shower facilities. Floorboards thro

A security bond is required with the reservation which will be returned after check out. Payment can be made via direct bank deposit.

fields.summary: Fabulous room in the heart of boho Newtown. Grape vine balcony, close to cool restaurants, cafes, bars and the heart of the city.
fields.description: Fabulous room in the heart of boho Newtown. Grape vine balcony, close to cool restaurants, cafes, bars and the heart of the city. I have a comfy single room with balcony in my apartment in the heart of Newtown, the cosmopolitan hub of Sydney. Share bathroom and kitchen with other guests in this cool, leafy, 60’s style pad, situated in between Enmore and King, the thriving main streets of our buzzy village.  The living space is a boheme cushion room with a low table for relaxed eating, and armchairs for those who don’t like knee bending.We have two balcony areas. Come at the right time of the year and you can eat grapes straight from the vine on our north facing balcony while on the other take tea  and watch all of Newtown parade on by. We are just four minutes south of Newtown Train Station, down the interesting end of KIng, close to all the vintage, second hand, designer shops. There’s cute wine bars, yoga studios, theatres, cinemas, music venues and restaurants close by.    Would you
fields.neighbourhood_overview: Newtown is by far the liveliest suburb in Sydney, with great restaurants, funky shops and bars and a vibrant whiff of creativity in the air. You must definitely experience the great pasta at the Pastizzi Cafe! And of course their famous pastizzi. Open all day til 11pm/
fields.transit: Off street parking is included, trains and buses are close by: 10 mins to the Opera House, 5 mins to Central Station. Best way from the airport for a single is airport train to Central ($17) then change trains for Newtown Taxi from airport to Newtown is around $30 so it is cheaper for 2 people.
fields.title: Single boheme in Newtown Central

fields.summary: Enjoy Sydney skyline and harbour views from our stunning Penthouse apartment It offers 3 large bedrooms, 3 bathrooms, large living and dining with Harbour and City views from all room all rooms

Linen and towels are also provided for your convenience.   Additional cleaning during your stay can be arranged - our standard cleaning fee is $295.
fields.neighbourhood_overview: Pyrmont is in the City of Sydney. Walking distance to Sydney CBD, Darling Harbour and major attractions. Conveniently located our neighbourhood is surrounded by waterfront parks, BBQ, playgrounds, shops, restaurant and cafes.  Thai Restaurant on the ground floor.
fields.transit: Getting around Sydney and the local area is easy and most of Sydney's attractions are within easy walking distance. * 200 m / 5 minutes walk to Bus stop, Train station and Harbour Ferry wharf  * 200 m / 5 minutes walk to Restaurants & Cafes, Museums and Zoo * 150 m / 4 minutes walk to Darling Harbour Restaurants and Fish Markets * 150 m / 4 minutes walk to Supermarket, Liquor shop and The Star Casino * 500 m / 10 minutes walk to Sydney city centre  If you wish to travel further afield, Taxis are all around and the free Red Sydney Explorer Bus stop is located in nearby Harris Street Pyrmont.  Also "Discover Sydney" website is helpful for public transport details, maps and brochures that you can download.
fields.title: The Penthouse Darling Harbour

You can BBQ or just relax on your own balcony and take in the view. Fully equipped, enjoy the ease of a new kitchen to cook up a storm. The flat has all the comforts of home. fields.summary: This is a budget accommodation option, better than a private room in a backpackers and cheaper than a private room in a hotel. It is one of the best value studios for low cost that you will find in Sydney, but it can be a bit noisy on Friday and Saturday nights from 10pm until midnight or 1am while people line up outside to enter the bar across the street.
fields.description: This is a budget accommodation option, better than a private room in a backpackers and cheaper than a private room in a hotel. It is one of the best value studios for low cost that you will find in Sydney, but it can be a bit noisy on Friday and Saturday nights from 10pm until midnight or 1am while people line up outside to enter the bar across the street. The studio itself is small at 15m2 (161 sq.ft), but the nicely decorated furnishings make a practical use out of the compact space. This is suitable for a couple or singles, and is located in an older art deco style building with slightly deteriorated hallway and entrance to the building.  It is conveniently close to local hotspots in the heart of Sydney's gay community, surrounded by awesome cafe's, bars and nightclubs, and a short walk to the CBD.   BEDROOM: Includes a small dining table with 2 chairs, side table, clean linen, heater and a comfortable bed which can be folded into a couch if required. KITCHENETTE: Includes kettle, s
fields.notes: Sydney is a very safe city and there are no security or safety concerns. This building does have security doors downstairs and is in a great location to enjoy some nightlife, which is safe even for a woman by herself at night.
fields.neighbourhood_overview: Located near the popular Crown Street, surrounded by loads of cafe's, bars and stores in the inner city village-like suburb of Surry Hills. This is very centrally located to most tourist activities and local hotspots, only a short walk to downtown. 3-5 minutes walk to Hyde Park. 5-10 minutes walk to Chinatown, Darling Harbour. 20-25 minutes walk to Circular Quay, Opera House, etc.   Located 1 block off the famous gay strip known as Oxford Street. It's fairly quiet inside the studio considering how close it is to nightlife options.
fields.transit: Very centrally located within walking distance to most tourist attractions. Lots of public transport options nearby including buses, trains, taxi, and trams: - Train = Closest station is Museum on the same line as the main city circle and airport lines. - Bus = Many bus routes nearby on Oxford Street.

Ocean views from bedrooms as well as quiet tree lined pool to swim and relax by.  Everything you need for a city, beach, poolside holiday.   Juicer and blender for making super smoothies and fresh juicer, plus a fully stocked kitchen.

The apartment has plenty of charm with a very peaceful atmosphere as the apartment looks out onto the Fred Hollow’s reserve so there is lots of green from every window and many interesting birds. Both bedrooms have ocean views over Coogee beach, which is 10 mins walk away. You will wake up each morning to sunshine filling your room, birds in the background singing and unless you prefer darkness for a sleep in use the blinds and the room remains dark. SECURITY DEPOSIT: Please ensure that the apartment is left how you found it - (except towels placed in the bathroom and dishes put on in the dishwasher, rubbish placed in the bins etc. Any damages to the property, excess cleaning charges (steam cleaning carpets etc.) unauthorised parties etc will be deducted if these occur. If Police are called to the property due to a noise complaint or large party is held a $1,500 penalty will apply.  It is a quiet neighbourhood and the Council can and will impose fines if required.
fields.neighbourhood_overview: Stroll down the lane to gorgeous Rushcutters Bay Park for a gourmet coffee or a meal with marina views. Or take a dip in the nearby Redleaf ocean pool just up the hill from Double Bay village. Shopping, markets and iconic beaches are all close-by.
fields.transit: The Darling Point Penthouse is just a 5 minute drive to the city and it's also only one block to the Edgecliff train station. Bus stops are also very close (New South Head Rd) and the service is frequent. Taxis can also be flagged from the main road nearby and bookings are not always necessary.
fields.title: Deluxe Penthouse Apartment with City and Harbour Views

fields.summary: Northwood is a leafy waterside suburb near the charming Lane Cove village  It's a bushwalking paradise only 15 mins easy access to the city.  Our upstairs private retreat is comfortable with a private roof deck overlooking the bay.  There a
fields.description: Northwood is a leafy waterside suburb near the charming Lane Cove village  It's a bushwalking paradise only 15 mins easy access to the city.  Our upstairs private retreat is comfortable with a private roof deck overlooking the bay.  There a We have a renovated upstairs private area which has 2 bedrooms with King Singles, a private guest bathroom and a deck with tranquil views over a peaceful bay full of sailing boats.  The space is perfect for a couple travelling together, two singles or a single.   There is a 12 metre swimming pool available for guest use. A substantial continental breakfast is provided, evening meal on request. The nearest train station is St Leonards, about 5 minutes drive away with plenty of taxis around.  The airport train connects to the St Leonards "north shore" line, or there is a door to door airport shuttle service called Airport Shuttle North. The local shops are about 15 minutes walk or there are buses.  There are many coffee shops, restaurants, hairdresser

fields.neighbourhood_overview: The Lane Cove/Northwood area is unique in that it is so close to the Sydney CBD yet has a quiet, leafy holiday feel about it.  The people are friendly, and there is lots to do - village style shopping, sailing, golf, tennis, bushwalking and lots of restaurants.
fields.transit: Northwood has a private ferry service to the Sydney CBD every weekday morning and evening.  There are also regular busses to the city and Lane Cove and the train station is only 5 minutes away.

Apartment characteristics:  - 1 double sofa-bed with proper mattress  - Charming ‘Parisian’ bathroom  - Cosy eat-in kitchen with electric hob and oven - Lovely airy and well-maintained communal laundry in building - Linen and towels provided  - Majestic panoramic views from top of the building and glimpses or harbour out the back door - from the sofa! - Sunny and very private balcony with expansive views over to Darling Point and glimpses of the yachts moored in Elizabeth Bay. Your balcony is set up with flower pots, a charming table and chair for breakfast, writing and/or contemplation.  Will best-suit a respectable, mature person. All! Contact name and number given During the last decade Potts Point has become recognised as one of the most desirabl
fields.neighbourhood_overview: During the last decade Potts Point has become recognised as one of the most desirable places to live in Sydney and it is certainly one of the most cosmopolitan neighbourhoods in Australia, uniquely desirable with its grand art deco buildings, and harbour side parks. Just a walk away to the city through the Domain/Botanic Gardens; you can grab a coffee just 5 minutes walk up the leafy street, and find a classy cocktail after dinner.  It is all about amenity. It is a vibrant, inner-urban community, and one of the best spots for the views of the world renowned Sydney NewYears Eve Fireworks displays.
fields.transit: - 2min Bus Stop with services to City and Kings Cross - 5min walk to Embarkment park with views of Harbour Bridge, Opera House, CBD  - 6min walk to Historic Elizabeth Bay House - 7min walk to Rushcutters Bay  - 10min walk to Woolloomooloo Wharf  - 10min walk to Kings Cross station  - 15min walk to Opera House, Botanical Gardens - 15 min walk to A.B.C. Olympic sized (50 metre) Pool  - 20min walk to the CBD  - 20 min taxi ride to Bondi Beach - Supermarket, drycleaners, food markets and shops 4 mins walk away

fields.neighbourhood_overview: Newport Beach is great for families and serious surfers alike having been the beach where world champion Tom Carroll honed his surfing skills. Sydney's most famous destination pub, the Newport Arms is minutes away with a courtesy shuttle to and from home on offer.
fields.transit: The bus stop within walking distance for buses direct to Sydney's CBD.

fields.description: Sunny, funky 2-bedroom apartment 20 minutes walk to the beach. WELCOME TO BONDI! - MINUTES FROM THE BEACH Beautiful, sunny quiet apartment with balcony in North Bondi. APARTMENT Fantastic 2 bedroom apartment all to yourself! The apartment is large and roomy, only 10 minutes walk to the beach, has undercover parking, a balcony, bath, shower, full kitchen, internet, washing machine and dryer.  Our home has a quiet, meditative feel.  Accommodates a couple very nicely. Can accommodate 2 couples. LOCATION Only minutes from the beach as well as Bondi's many restaurants, cafes, shops and bars. Wake up and go for a stroll along the beach, swim in the famous Iceberg's pool or grab a coffee and soak up some of the famous Bondi beach lifestyle or chill out on the balcony with a book. PUBLIC TRANSPORT Regular buses go into the city (take approximately 35 minutes) and to Bondi Junction (takes approximately 15 minutes). Bondi Junction has a large shopping centre, bus interchange and a train station.
