fields.summary: Fantastic beach house with pool - only 300 meters to Manly Beach.  You may choose Freshwater Beach, which is only about 400 meters away.  Its an easy walk to both.  We have a huge deck with beautiful views and comfy seating.  My place is perfect for families (with kids).
fields.description: Fantastic beach house with pool - only 300 meters to Manly Beach.  You may choose Freshwater Beach, which is only about 400 meters away.  Its an easy walk to both.  We have a huge deck with beautiful views and comfy seating.  My place is perfect for families (with kids). Enjoy sweeping views over Manly Lagoon from the huge entertainment deck, the living room, rumpus room and two of the bedrooms.  Just up the road from the Queenscliff end of the world famous Manly Beach with sweeping Lagoon Views that you can see throughout most of the house.  You can BBQ or just relax on your own entertaining deck and take in the view.  Stroll along the beach to Manly or the Wharf into the city or take the bus that stops right outside the house.  A 5 minute ride takes you straight into the heart of Manly, with all the restaurants and shops there or stay on the bus another minute until you get to the Ferry and you can go into central Sydney.  Freshwater beach, where surfing was first introduced to Austr
fields.title: House near beach with views and heated pool.

fields.description: Come and stay in wonderful Petersham! This amazing and large terrace house is located only minutes from the train and buses that will have you in the heart of the city in within 15 minutes.  The room is a cute and cosy double room, located at the back of the terrace overlooking the garden. You will have a private and relaxed stay. The room is perfect for one person but is a cosy space for a couple (note the bed has walls on three sides!) and is right next to the shared bathroom so its almost like an en suite!! We are very close to public transport (and even a pub next door) but it is quiet and relaxed so no need to worry about noisy trains waking you up at night!). We are a short walk away from Leichhardt which is Sydney's amazing Italian dinning and entertainment precinct. On the other side of the railway line is Petersham's famous Portuguese dining strip. Glebe, Balmain and Rozelle markets are a short bus trip away. This is a lovely and safe area to walk around at any time of day or
fields.title: Awesome Inner West Terrace Value +

fields.description: Located in the centre of Manly this split level one bedroom apartment is superbly placed on the top floor of the Manly National Building.  Boasting unrivalled views of Manly Beach, Shelly Beach and the Manly CBD you will be breath taken from the moment you arrive.  This luxury apartment has been recently renovated for your comfort. Relax on the balcony or sit back in the soft lounge, take in the views or enjoy the large screen wall mounted TV.  The apartment is conveniently located close to everything Manly has to offer, one minute from the famous Manly Beach, take a walk along the esplanade, take in a meal or a drink at one of the many Manly restaurants or bars Manly has to offer and enjoy. We are also only within 3 minutes walk of Manly Wharf and a 15 minute Fast Ferry ride to Sydney city.  Should you require it we can provide parking for one car in the secure residents car park.  We do require a minimum 4 night stay.
fields.notes: We do require a minimum 4 night stay.
fields.title: Manly Holiday Rentals

fields.summary: EXCELLENT BASE CAMP for Sydney Travel for the responsible & savvy  traveller! Clean, safe, secure, convenient, peaceful - fully self contained part house (your complete own space).  Close to Sydney cbd, has public transport at your doorstep, supermarket, cafes, banks, library - all within 400m radius. This is an 'honest to goodness' place. If you are expecting something 5stars, you will need to look at the Four Seasons or something pricier.  Maximum of 2 adults and is not suitable for kids.
fields.description: EXCELLENT BASE CAMP for Sydney Travel for the responsible & savvy  traveller! Clean, safe, secure, convenient, peaceful - fully self contained part house (your complete own space).  Close to Sydney cbd, has public transport at your doorstep, supermarket, cafes, banks, library - all within 400m radius. This is an 'honest to goodness' place. If you are expecting something 5stars, you will need to look at the Four Seasons or something pricier.  Maximum of 2 adults and is not suitable for kids. Thank you for viewing this site. What I am offering - - Very bright and clean, cute, spacious & self contained 1br part house. The space is not shared. It is very private and very peaceful. - The place is part of the main house, is self contained and has separate side access. - the bedroom has a real double sized timber bed (137 x 187mm) with a new firm mattress & electric blanket in winter, and has a huge wardrobe with lots of hanging space (hangers provided) - unlimited WIFI - ensuite bathroom; -
fields.notes: There is a night bottle for gentlemen's convenience if needed, but is required to be thoroughly disinfected/cleaned after use otherwise a A$20 cleaning fee applies. Parking is only available on the street. Some areas are free untimed parking, others have timed parking. If you're coming from Sydney International airport, it is about 30mins by Uber (1hr by public transport A$17pp- ok if travelling light or single person), otherwise I recommend Uber which is about A$30. It's just more direct, less hassle of dragging luggage up and down train platforms etc. While most guests are good with booking, some mistakenly book for only one person, but two arrive. Discounts are not available. There can be possible aeroplane noise - some days are better than others. Sound is not enough to pause a conversation and the place is not located next to any airport.  (airport to cbd is 7kms as the crow flies- as comparison with any other international city) Ultra noise sensitive folk might want to consider c
fields.neighbourhood_overview: - very quiet & safe neighbourhood - cafes, restaurants, public library of Little Italy at your doorstep in Norton Street - over other side of train line on Canterbury Road is Little Portugal with the famous cuisine - reflecting the multicultural-ness of Sydney, Norton Street eateries also include Thai, Chinese "Mr Q", Italian - of course, and modern Australian. - Coles supermarket also has prepared meals,  and that's all within a short stroll of about 300-500m.
fields.transit: Petersham train station is approx. 400m down the road to the left. Buses to the city is approx 50-100m to the right (several bus stops) and about 9 different bus routes (from Norton St which is more frequent) & (from Parramatta Rd - 50m closer but less frequent).
fields.title: Half House 5kms to Sydney City - 400m to citytrain

fields.summary: A private room with a queen size bed a large ceiling fan and heating, and a bathroom which may be shared if there are other guests in the house.  There is a second bathroom downstairs.  I like to communicate with you and know a little about you and the purpose of your trip before confirming a booking to make sure that I can offer you what you need. I do not accept reservations from people without a verified profile and usually request Government ID.  I look forward to welcoming you to my home.

We are very well positioned for access to the city, Bondi & Bronte Beach either by public transport, taxi or walk. fields.title: Bondi Junction near Beach + City.

fields.summary: This chilled, art-filled apartment Bondi apartment is a short walk to iconic Bondi Beach, plus in easy reach of Bondi junction station - i's a great spot from from which to explore Sydney's attractions. It’s a warm and colourful apartment, a perfect place to rest after a day of sightseeing. The private Queen-sized room overlooks a courtyard garden. Plus, there’s the bonus of Dash the dog, who loves all our visitors and makes our place your home away from home.
fields.description: This chilled, art-filled apartment Bondi apartment is a short walk to iconic Bondi Beach, plus in easy reach of Bondi junction station - i's a great spot from from which to explore Sydney's attractions. It’s a warm and colourful apartment, a perfect place to rest after a day of sightseeing. The private Queen-sized room overlooks a courtyard garden. Plus, there’s the bonus of Dash the dog, who loves all our visitors and makes our place your home away from home. As well as being near Bondi Beach, the apartment is close to several bus stops and only 10 minutes from Bondi Junction train station, so it's easy to reach the Sydney CBD or to explore the best of Sydney including the Blue Mountains. In a quiet and convenient spot, with all activities of Bondi within walking distance, it's a great spot to chill out in Sydney’s gorgeous eastern suburbs.  The room Guests have access to a private double room, with a queen sized bed and built in wardrobes.  Offering space and privacy, the room overlo
fields.notes: The dog Dash, the border collie-poodle, lives here.  He is very friendly and house trained.  He is also hypoallergenic and shed-less, so good for people with allergies.  He is not supposed to go into the guest bedroom.  General amenities A laundry with washer and dryer is available for use.  Free WiFi is also on premises. About me I work Monday to Friday in communications but interior design is my main passion.  I am a long time yogi so can give you tips if that is of interest - there are some of the world's best teachers in Sydney.  Otherwise, I like to chill out with a swim, hanging out or eating (I love food) so I can give you tips on where to eat or drink if that is an interest for you too.
fields.neighbourhood_overview: Bondi Beach, Australia's most famous beach, is a fantastic place to surf, dive, swim, snorkel, or simply take in breathtaking sea views. The apartment is a stone's throw from beautiful parks such as Cooper Park. Plus, food, wine, and massage.
fields.transit: The beach is a 10 minute walk away and public transport (bus, train) is also close by for getting to the Junction or city. A ricketty but roadworthy bicycle is also available for guest use.
fields.title: Arty and zen haven in Bondi

fields.summary: 2 minutes to the beach - Cafes, Sun, Surf  & Sand. Secure room in beautiful, quiet, 4 bedroom house. Suit business professionals, quiet students or tourists looking to relax. Wireless Internet, under cover parking, unlimited street parking.
fields.description: 2 minutes to the beach - Cafes, Sun, Surf  & Sand. Secure room in beautiful, quiet, 4 bedroom house. Suit business professionals, quiet students or tourists looking to relax. Wireless Internet, under cover parking, unlimited street parking. Twin beds or king sized double in Large Secure Private Room in my 4 bedroom home.  Share bathroom with one other room. The bathroom is just next door and has a bath and shower. The house is a beautiful 2 storey semi. It’s quiet, clean & tidy. There are no pets here. The room is light, airy and freshly painted with a fan. Tea, coffee, organic honey from our hive, jam etc is included. You can use the Kitchen, Dining Room and Lounge areas as well as the garden which opens on to a park. I'm a quiet professional who likes to read. I am available to you for any questions and happy to make suggestions for your stay. Escape the crowds at Bondi Beach or Coogee, discover Maroubra Beach’s great cafes, amazing ocean surf and breathtaking coastal views.  FOOD: E
fields.notes: There are 3 other rooms available if you are travelling with friends or family. Check my other listings.  (website hidden) Possible downside - There is no microwave or dishwasher. However there is a Radio / CD / Record player, plenty of cooking utensils & 2 sinks. :) There both Native Stingless bee & Honey hives the rear garden. fields.neighbourhood_overview: Escape the crowds at Bondi Beach or Coogee, discover Maroubra Beach’s great cafes, amazing ocean surf and breathtaking coastal views.  FOOD: Enjoy the beach kiosk takeaway, local BBQ's or a delicious meal with stunning views at the Pavilion Beachfront Restaurant on the Promenade.  ACTIVITIES. The beach is fantastic. Sun, surf and sand.  SURFING – Maroubra is a  1 kilometre long beach. FAMILY ACTIVITES - Swimming, relaxing, surfing, picnicking, BBQs, ball games, jogging, fishing and beach fossicking. There is a rock pool, an enclosed/shaded kids playground, a Skate Park,  picnic tables, large grassy areas, shops, showers and toilets.  COASTAL WALK - To the north, stunning ocean  views, connects Bondi, Bronte, Coogee and Gordons Bay with Maroubra Beach. To the south end of the beach, 70 hectares of bushland and sweeping headland views have been now dedicated to a new National Park to be located here.
fields.transit: (Website hidden by Airbnb)  2 minute walk to Maroubra beach, local shops and restaurants. 10 mins drive to Prince of Wales Hospital, NSW Univercity and Randwick racecourse. 20 mins drive from the airport. 30 mins drive to the city. Great public bus system. Bus to Airports, Sydney city, Bondi Junction, Central railway, the Quay or to other nearby beaches of Bondi, Bronte or Clovelly.
fields.title: Beach 2 mins Airport or City 10kms.

The Ferry Wharf (to Circular Quay, Opera House, Harbour Bridge) is also within easy walking distance!  The room has a queen size bed (and air bed if requested) , air conditioning and a fully-equipped kitchen with stove, fridge and microwave. Those who prefer not to cook will be able to choose from a large range of restaurants, bars and cafes all within easy walking distance. The bathroom has a bath and a shower over it. fields.summary: A home to enjoy by the beach. A summer paradise.
fields.description: A home to enjoy by the beach. A summer paradise. Ananda is an exclusive waterview home on the cliffs overlooking Sydney’s Middle Harbour. A stay here offers a luxurious Sydney harbourside escape. With a pool and spectacular views, you will enjoy your mornings on the terrace, afternoons by the pool or beach and evenings watching the spectacular sunset with 270 degree panoramic views of Sydney’s Middle Harbour. There is a flat screen TV with DVD player, stereo with iPod input, antique swing, kids toys and games, gourmet kitchen and 3 luxurious bathrooms. We are located at the beginning of the beautiful Spit to Manly walk - an amazing four-hour walk along the harbourside cliffs through national parks, secluded beaches all the way to Manly Wharf. Manly is a short bus ride away (15 minutes), with the bus stop an easy 3-minute stroll from the house. Manly has a vibrant cafe, restaurant, bar and nightlife scene and of course the world renowned Manly Beach. The local Seaforth shops are a sceni
fields.title: Sydney Luxury Home by the Beach

fields.summary: Best location! Stay in a 4 star hotel for less than half the cost! Apartment is double the size of normal hotel room with Kitchen, Balcony & laundry facilities.  The apartment is located in the heart of Sydney's CBD. Walking distance to everything! We offer FREE Wi-Fi service.

The apartment is located in the heart of Sydney's CBD. Walking distance to everything! We offer FREE Wi-Fi service. This self-contained one bedroom apartment located in the heart of Sydney's CBD. Great place to explore Sydney and live the lifestyle. The Apartment features a combined living and dining area (60 metre Square) with TV/ DVD and air-conditioning; kitchen, bathroom, internal laundry and balcony.  The Bedroom comprises of a comfortable King size bed which can be converted to 2 single beds. The sofa bed converts to a double bed. Airbed can be supplied to accommodate additional persons.  The kitchen is fully equipped with electric stove, fridge, and microwave with crockery, cutlery, utensils and cookware. Internal laundry includes a washing machine & dryer and ironing equipment. We offer FREE Wi-Fi service. Everything i

Everything is included right down to the towels, linen, shampoo, shower gel, soap and toiletries; all you need is your suitcase. Check-in is 2:00pm or later. Please advise the expecting time of arrival a week prior to your arrival date. The check in procedure will be confirmed a few days prior to your arrival. Where possible we will do our best to assist you in checking in. If you are expecting to arrive prior to 2pm, you can always arrange to leave your bags at the apartment while cleaning takes place. Professional cleaning takes about 4 hours after each stay. We will then notify you as soon as cleaning have been completed. Please keep in mind that checking in prior to 10am is not possible as the previous guests has not checked out.  The Bedroom comprises a King size bed and can be converted to 2 single beds. Walking distance to the Darling Harbour, shopping centres, Westfield CBD, Pitt St Mall and Queen Victoria building. fields.summary: Furnished double room with queen size bed, desk and wardrobe.  Eco House has 6 rooms, 2 bathrooms and huge kitchen. free laundry with washer.  Suit eco minded, vegetarians, and yogis.  Power is supplied by solar panels on the roof and we compost all of our food scraps to supply nutrients for the herb and vegetable garden.  Because of our garden and compost we often have crawling friends in the house, they are harmless but if you are scared of them you might prefer to stay in a sterile hotel :)
fields.description: Furnished double room with queen size bed, desk and wardrobe.  Eco House has 6 rooms, 2 bathrooms and huge kitchen. free laundry with washer.  Suit eco minded, vegetarians, and yogis.  Power is supplied by solar panels on the roof and we compost all of our food scraps to supply nutrients for the herb and vegetable garden.  Because of our garden and compost we often have crawling friends in the house, they are harmless but if you are scared of them you might prefer to stay in a sterile hotel :) I'm a yoga teacher so am passionate about the environment and have set up this 'eco' house to especially suit people who like to tread lightly.  We grow herbs and veges, compost and use recycled products as much as possible.  Yoco combines the love of 'yoga' with the living an 'eco' lifestyle so if you love communal living, yoga ashrams and living consciously this is the place for you.  The house is kept super clean with no shoes in the house and we have a new kitchen and two new bathrooms. The h
fields.notes: I'm a yoga teacher, so when I'm in town you are welcome to come and join my class.
fields.neighbourhood_overview: We are on the border of Surry Hills and Redfern.  This is the best place to stay in Sydney as it has a small community village feel with cafes, yoga schools etc but we are super close to all the fun stuff in the city.
fields.transit: We are 5-10 min walk from Central Station and the bus stop out the front takes you to Circular Quay through the city.
fields.title: Double Room near Central FREE WIFI

fields.summary: The perfect location for your visit to Sydney, this cute one bedroom apartment has a fun and retro vibe with everything you need to be comfortable during your stay as well as being close to great cafes, bars and more in cosmopolitan Potts Point.
fields.description: The perfect location for your visit to Sydney, this cute one bedroom apartment has a fun and retro vibe with everything you need to be comfortable during your stay as well as being close to great cafes, bars and more in cosmopolitan Potts Point. This apartment it the perfect base for your visit to Sydney. It is clean, comfortable and has a cute retro vibe. This one bedroom apartment is located within a security building on Ward Avenue in Potts Point right near the famous Kings Cross fountain. Easy 5 minute (400 metre) walk to Kings Cross train station. Easy location to get into the Sydney city CBD, to beaches and to all tourist locations.  This property is the perfect pad for visiting Sydney. You will feel very comfortable and will love the convenience of the location. Apartment has a retro vibe and is self contained with kitchen, living area, queen bed and bathroom. Communal laundry facilities available or laundromat located a few doors down. The apartment is set within a 1930s style
fields.notes: NO CHECK IN AVAILABLE CHRISTMAS DAY OR NEW YEARS DAY. DO NOT BOOK IF YOU WANT TO CHECK IN THOSE DAYS!
fields.neighbourhood_overview: The apartment is within metres to great cafes, boutiques and supermarkets/grocery stores. Please check out my guide book (link at top of the page) for locations of some of these. Short stroll down to beautiful Rushcutters Bay Park. Apartment is located a block from the Kings Cross entertainment precinct. Also located a few doors down from Kings Cross police station and Kings Cross Tourist Information Booth. This location has everything for every taste. Whether you want a crazy or quiet weekend. Everything from nightclubs and great bars to juice bars and yoga studios. Check out my Guidebook for suggestions on things to do in the area (top right of this page) and also visit Air BnB's Neighbourhood Guide: www.airbnb.com.au/locations/sydney/potts-point
fields.transit: The apartment is located on a public transport hub. Public transport including buses and trains within walking distance. Public transport links to Bondi, other beaches, city and further to Blue Mountains and out of Sydney day trip locations. Sydney site-seeing buses stop off a block away. Parking: there is no parking available with the apartment. The whole of the City of the Sydney is mostly time restricted or metred parking. There are a few all days spots near the apartment which I can point out but there is no guarantee you will get them. There is a parking station a few doors down from the apartment where you can pay to park. Please treat travelling to Sydney with a car the same as if you were staying in central London or New York.
fields.title: Fun Retro Potts Point Apartment

fields.description: This charming cottage (circa 1835) is in a prime location several minutes from Sydney's CBD and 15 minutes to the beautiful beaches of Bondi, Bronte & Tamarama.  The home boasts a modern kitchen and bathroom with miele appliances and one lovely double  bedroom.  The living room is equipped with flatscreen t.v, wifi, and cable/satellite connection.   There is a lovely small courtyard in which breakfast, lunch & dinner can be taken and prepared from the BBQ.   With the city just a 4-5 minute walk, oxford st a 7 minute walk and the cottage nestled amongst everything surry hills (23rd most stylish neighbourhood in the world) has to offer this location is really perfect for any person wishing to explore all of sydneys finest.   (website hidden)  This home is a heritage listed property and one of only a handful left in Sydney from the georgian area.  So if it's perfect square lines and minimalist interiors this not your place.  5 minute walk to central station.  2 minute walk to Crown st  7
fields.title: Charming cottage

fields.summary: Bondi Beach lifestyle at its best
fields.description: Bondi Beach lifestyle at its best Come stay in Bondi Beach in your very own private attic conversion.  With views over Bondi Beach and the city of Sydney it is 34 square metres with your own living room, bathroom, bedroom and balcony. Just 2 years young, so all is fresh and new, light and airy. Lots of white and lots of wood. The shared kitchen is downstairs as well as the dining area. The apartment is only 2 minutes to Bondi Beach perfect for an early morning swim.  Buses to Bondi Junction, The City and Watsons Bay come every 5 minutes.  The North Bondi Golf Course is directly opposite (public course) and you can also walk to iconic Icebergs Club, pool or restaurant. If you want spectacular views of the sunrise you can also walk to Ben Buckler lookout. Hastings Parade is right at the North Bondi shopping centre, which offers a Liquor Store, a Laundry, a Newsagent, Beauty parlour, cafes, fast food chicken shop, pizzeria, a Thai restaurant and take away, a fish restaurant and take away
fields.neighbourhood_overview: Bondi Beach is a busy place, but we are at the north end and there is still some village atmosphere left with locals frequenting the cafes and restaurants. The local shop is run by a Greek family with parents, children and cousins running it in harmony.  We have a local chemist who knows all his customers by name.  The fish restaurant makes the best fish&chips and the newsagent sells a variety of bus ticket options depending on your requirements.
fields.transit: Getting around is easy from North Bondi.  The buses are at the doorstep and go directly to Bondi Junction or to Watsons Bay from where you can take a ferry to Circular Quay. In Bondi Junction you can either take buses to the city or the train - all very easy.  The buses and trains run every 5 minutes.  In 20years of living there I have never once had to look at a timetable.  The buses just keep coming.
fields.title: Bondi Beach Attic

fields.summary: Fabulous 2-bed apt in Potts Point, Sydney's most desirable inner city suburb, with gorgeous city skyline views.  Steps to transport, restaurants, cafes and nightlife. CBD a 15-minute stroll away.  The ideal base from which to explore the city and the perfect place to watch Sydney's famous New Year's Eve fireworks!
fields.description: Fabulous 2-bed apt in Potts Point, Sydney's most desirable inner city suburb, with gorgeous city skyline views.  Steps to transport, restaurants, cafes and nightlife. CBD a 15-minute stroll away.  The ideal base from which to explore the city and the perfect place to watch Sydney's famous New Year's Eve fireworks! Fully-furnished 2-bedroom apartment on Victoria St, Potts Point. Unbeatable location - Potts Point is Sydney's most desirable inner city suburb - steps to Kings Cross train station + buses to the city and the beaches - fantastic range of restaurants, cafes and bars - three supermarkets within a five-minute stroll - 15-minute stroll to Sydney CBD - no need for a car - everything is walkable! - great views of the New Year's Eve fireworks from the balcony! Spacious accommodation - two double bedrooms (2nd bedroom setup as a study with a desk and a high quality sofa bed which can comfortably sleep two adults) - fully-fitted modern kitchen with induction hob - large lounge and din
fields.notes: The apartment doesn't have a TV. Feel free to rent one (I can help with that) or just enjoy the break!
fields.neighbourhood_overview: Potts Point is Sydney's most desirable inner city suburb with a wide range of supermarkets, cafes, bars and restaurants.
fields.transit: Steps to Kings Cross train station and buses to the city and the beaches. Alternatively, the city is a 15-minute stroll away.

fields.summary: Beautiful new apartment close to Sydney Harbour's best beach and many attractions. Easy parking with transport and great bars and restaurants nearby. Everything you need to feel at home, relax and of course maximise your time in this incredible city. Pets can stay on request and with approval

Take advantage of the central location, spend your day at the beach then go out in Mosman and Neutral bay area at night, there is a full range of clubs, restaurants and pubs to suit all budgets with the local community bus service at your door making it easy to get around and get home stress free. If you're new to Sydney and want to go out on the town options are easy for there and back or you can relax and enjoy all the local Mosman area has to offer. You are only a short b

fields.transit: There is a free bus that picks you up virtually out the front of the apartment and can take you everywhere from shopping centres to Taronga Zoo.

You have exclusive use of the whole apartment. Non-Smoking. Enjoy this luxury apartment in the very heart of Sydney, luxury furnishing, 65sqm large space, king size leather bed, high quality mattress for good night sleep,  air conditioner, TVs in both living and bedroom... one minute walk to darling harbour, Sydney CBD and 5 minutes to the Rocks, 10 minutes to Opera House. The building has gym and small outdoor heated pool. The pool and gym are open from 7:00 am to 9:00 pm 7 days a week. You have exclusive use of the whole apartment. The picture with the girl is taken on our balcony. All linen and end of rental cleaning fee included. Address: 355 Kent Street, Corner of King Street Security deposit of $350 is held by airbnb, which will be fully refunded the next day after your stay if keys are returned and there's no damage

Near CBD, good neighbourhood with many buses. High speed wireless internet is included. This spacious room is equipped with a door lock & it also has its own LCD 52" TV, cable/Foxtel IQ, and blue-ray player.There's a spare single bed when 3 people occupy the room. All of the beds are high quality mattresses, the queen bed is a posturepedic. However please note that the room will be less-spacious once the second bed is placed on the floor (in front of the TV). If you're a smoker, the room will be convenient as it has its own balcony. You will be sharing the house with 3 other people who lives there permanently and full kitchen facility is av

fields.title: Master room w/ own internal Bathroom near CBD

fields.summary: Divine, magical house so near the city though you wouldn't know as it is so peaceful and almost rural out in the garden! Sweet and full of character, Quirky Way is a true charmer. People always comment on how it's even better than the pics!
fields.description: Divine, magical house so near the city though you wouldn't know as it is so peaceful and almost rural out in the garden! Sweet and full of character, Quirky Way is a true charmer. People always comment on how it's even better than the pics! I have a gorgeous 'designy' but character-filled 2 bedroom weatherboard cottage in the inner city suburb of Rozelle, right near the city (5 mins by bus). I let the house periodically when I am away myself so it is often available but not always. Please email me with any queries. The individuality and light in the house is the main thing you will notice. Also that a fertile sub-tropical garden can be seen and enjoyed from every room. The romantic, generously proportioned bedroom just about sits in the garden, which wraps around two sides. It looks out to the very handsome St Josephs church from the window, which glows pink and gold at (Website hidden by Airbnb) unimpeded view from the bed should you be feeling so inclined!  Though the house is absolu
fields.notes: Hope you don't mind watering the garden during your stay:)
fields.neighbourhood_overview: Its so friendly and mostly very quiet! SHOPPING/GROCERIES  Folks tell me they do very well just at the IGA EXPRESS in Rozelle. (649 Darling st, Rozelle) It is a 10 min walk, up victoria Rd, turn right, a block or two down on your left,  amongst all the cafes etc.  Or there is the big WOOLIES in Balmain, if yr driving, or fancy a 20 min walk all along Evans st. Or: there is a sweet little grocery store that has a lot of things you may need the next  street down. There is also a nice oval down there for a jog if you need one! It’s called Easton Park Grocery Store  (Denison St, cnr Alfred) and is run by locals  and, it is, well, nice:) friendly, local.You can walk thru the creamy brick housing estate adjacently across the street to get there:) It’s a sweet little stroll! BELLE FLEUR - 658 Darling St, Rozelle Make world class chocolates. Truly delectable. Belgian cocoa...just divine! BREAD : 660 Darling St,  Rozelle, ‘Victoire’ up on Darling st OR there’s a little french Bakery  at the end
fields.transit: any bus above 501 will take you straight into town from Victoria rd THE LOWDOWN ON THE LOCAL STUFF/GETTING AROUND BUSES I get the buses with numbers over 501 straight into the city from VICTORIA RD,  which is the very big road you probably came in on. There are a few bus stops close by  but I use the one opposite the big BP Petrol station. I get there by walking thru the little park that is at the end of Quirk St, walking straight up towards Victoria Rd,  and crossing over at the lights. It’s about 20 metres from there. To catch the bus from here without a ticket may be a problem during peak hours, however.  You are best to hunt down a TRAVEL TEN or day pass from a newsagent or 7-11 store.  There is a tiny little shop right near the bus stop that is open somewhat sporadically.  TAXIS call 131 008 or 132 522 CAR There is a visitors permit on the fridge, please use if if you’re parking  your car in the street daily. PLEASE do not forget to return it:) It is GOLD!:)
fields.title: QUIRKY WAY ROZELLE  artist's house

fields.summary: Located in beautiful Double Bay this lovely apartment will make you feel very comfortable.
fields.description: Located in beautiful Double Bay this lovely apartment will make you feel very comfortable. Gorgeous apartment in the heart of stylish Double Bay, the Beverly Hills of Sydney! Located just metres from the water and a short stroll to the cafes and boutiques of Double Bay this apartment is the ideal location for your visit to Sydney. Also located close to New South Head Road where you can catch buses into the city or to Watsons Bay. Double Bay ferry wharf and Edgecliff Train Station close by too. This beautiful Art Deco apartment comes with a kitchen, bathroom with bath, living room with sofa and master bedroom with king size bed.  Street parking only. A lot of the street parking in the area is time restricted however I can direct you to areas with all day parking. You will have access to the whole apartment, with the exception of my child's bedroom which will be locked off, this leaves you with a 1 bedorom apartment. Double Bay is really having a resurgence with so many amazing new resta
fields.neighbourhood_overview: Double Bay is really having a resurgence with so many amazing new restaurants and shops ... you can have a holiday just in Double Bay. The new Intercontinental restaurants including Sake and The Stockroom.
fields.title: Beautiful Deco Double Bay Apartment

fields.summary: Stay in a funky part of Sydney in a traditional (renovated) Sydney terrace house! Comfortably fits one or two guests (a couple) with a double bed, shelves, small cupboard and a clothes hanger.
fields.description: Stay in a funky part of Sydney in a traditional (renovated) Sydney terrace house! Comfortably fits one or two guests (a couple) with a double bed, shelves, small cupboard and a clothes hanger. The Room: Your room is our converted lounge room (we have another loungeroom). A double bed with comfy mattress topper, shelves, clothes hanging rack, a small cupboard and lovely window that looks out on to the street. When we go to bed or are at work during the week you have the whole bottom floor to yourself. The kitchen, bathroom, laundry and backyard are all yours! Your room comes with a welcome book which tells you about the area and how to get to the closest train station and supermarket. Also there is an OPAL card that you can load up to use on trains, busses and ferries around Sydney. We have a fortnightly cleaner who does a wonderful job and we try our best to maintain a tidy home in between. About us: You will be staying with two girls who work full time and two Chihuahua puppies.   LGB
fields.notes: We have two small dogs so you should love animals.
fields.neighbourhood_overview: I love how close we are to so many yummy cafe's and two supermarkets! (Coles and ALDI), they are only a five minute walk down the road.
fields.transit: Busses to the city are a 3 minute walk and the train station is 15 minutes walk through beautiful Redfern.
fields.title: Lovely Terrace Room Close to City

The rooms are compact  offering a double bed in 1 room and a Double bed in the 2nd room . We share 1 bathroom and toilet. You are more than welcome to share the apartment as you would your own home. My aim is to make you feel welcome, comfortable  and at home.

There is a huge RSL club in the same street, 2 minute walk.   Share kitchen and bathroom, living area and laundry. Cable TV.  Walk around the corner get a freshly made coffee or fish and chips and walk to Botany Bay which is a few mins walk and have a s
fields.neighbourhood_overview: It is safe, friendly and only a few minutes walk to the Beach, Shops, Supermarket, Restaurants Cafes, Parks, RSL & Sailing Clubs, Schools, Hospital and only 7 klms to the Sydney International and Domestic  Airport. Only 16 KLMS to city Central No need for a car in Sans Souci.  Sans Souci is a French word that means "WITHOUT WORRY"

Bus out front of apartment 947 to Kogarah Train Station.. to   Circular Quay 400 bus from Rockdale (Near train station)  to Sydney airport and  400 bus from Sydney Airport to Rockdale Train Station. 478 bus from Rockdale to Ramsgate beach ( Ramsgate Rd) then 5 min walk to my place  478 bus ( Ramsgate Rd) to Rockdale Station .  Then trains run every 10 mins to the city which is only  20 minutes away. 303 bus takes you all the way to Circular Quay NOTE it is approx 1 hour trip.
fields.title: Beach/Airport. 1 or 2 bedrooms

fields.summary: Awesome double room for short term letting in Sydney's famous Bondi Beach. Short stroll to beach, transport, shops and cafes. I live here and you have the spare room
fields.description: Awesome double room for short term letting in Sydney's famous Bondi Beach. Short stroll to beach, transport, shops and cafes. I live here and you have the spare room A gorgeous double room in  an Art Deco apartment this room is ideal  for single or couple (for shorter stays). Level access from the road with on street untimed parking out the front in a quiet street, only 10 minutes easy walk to the beach.  The apartment is owner occupied with access to all amenities including kitchen, washing machine, bathroom and with a balcony showing district views.  An 8 minute walk to great public transport, shops, bars, restaurants and cafes on Bondi Road. Buses can take you around the eastern suburbs and beaches and from Bondi Junction you can also catch a train. From the airport it is about 15 minutes by Taxi. You will be sharing the home with a local girl - so happy to fill you in on the best places for coffee, breaki and dinner close by.  Includes All linens towels supplied Wifi available TV
fields.notes: We share the balcony with the wonderful neighbours, its very homey and we are all friends so its very relaxed :)
fields.neighbourhood_overview: Everything is 10 - 15 minutes walk, the beach, local cafes and shops, access to public transport. It's a quiet back street of south bondi so we don't get loads of traffic noise and parking on street is easy.
fields.transit: Yes- There's buses only a 10 min walk that can take you to Bondi junction station or into central sydney.
fields.title: Private Room # BeautifulBondibeach

fields.summary: This comfortable, modern studio is surrounded by cool cafe's, bars & stores in the stylish village-like suburb of Surry Hills. It's quiet for such a central location, only a short walk to local hotspots, downtown Sydney, & most tourist activities.
fields.description: This comfortable, modern studio is surrounded by cool cafe's, bars & stores in the stylish village-like suburb of Surry Hills. It's quiet for such a central location, only a short walk to local hotspots, downtown Sydney, & most tourist activities. This is a nice, clean and modern studio apartment with buzzer intercom access, on the popular Crown Street in central Surry Hills, suitable for a couple or singles at the cosy size of 17m2 (189 sq.ft)  BEDROOM: Includes a comfortable queen size bed, reverse cycle air conditioning, 22" digital television, lots of storage space and a whole wall of mirrors. There is also a bench with 2 chairs for a dining or work area, and lamp for mood lighting. BATHROOM: Large and modern bathroom includes toilet, shower, towels, body wash, toilet paper and hair dryer.  INTERNET: There is unlimited usage of broadband wireless internet included with speeds of 20-40 Mb per second. Browse or download as much as you like from your mobile devices or laptops. KITCHEN
fields.notes: Sydney is a very safe city and there are no security or safety concerns. However the studio  has double security doors downstairs and a secure elevator. This studio is a great location to enjoy some nightlife, which is safe even for a woman by herself at night.
fields.neighbourhood_overview: Located on the popular Crown Street, surrounded by loads of cafe's, bars and stores in the inner city village-like suburb of Surry Hills. This is very centrally located to most tourist activities and local hotspots, only a short walk to downtown. 3-5 minutes walk to Hyde Park. 5-10 minutes walk to Chinatown, Darling Harbour. 20-25 minutes walk to Circular Quay, Opera House, etc.   Located 1 block off the famous gay strip known as Oxford Street. It's fairly quiet inside the studio considering how close it is to nightlife options.
fields.transit: Very centrally located within walking distance to most tourist attractions. Lots of public transport options nearby including buses, trains, taxi, and trams: - Train = Closest station is Museum on the same line as the main city circle and airport lines. - Bus = Many bus routes nearby on Oxford Street.
fields.title: Modern 7th floor studio Surry Hills

fields.description: EXCELLENT LOCATION: Situated in a quiet cul-de-sac onto Balgowlah golf course, Jacaranda offers you relaxed, self-contained accommodation in a leafy garden setting. We are central to a host of popular attractions, in particular the beaches and water ways around Manly and Middle Harbour. THE BEDROOM: We have a kingsize bed that can be split to make two single beds - its up to you! Storage is provided by a large double, built in wardrobe and bedside cabinets. A column heater is available for those winter chills and a ceiling fan can be used in summer. Also you have a LCD HD TV, Blue Ray DVD player, electric blankets, hair dryer and use of the umbrellas and beach towels.  BATHROOM: Bathroom with shower, vanity, toilet, heated towel rail, ceiling fan and heater. LAUNDRY: Washing machine, dryer, ironing board and iron. KITCHENETTE:  Well equipped with crockery, cutlery, microwave, fridge, toaster and sandwich maker.  Basic breakfast - tea, coffee, milk and cereal Breakfast bar with 2 chairs
fields.notes: We have a kingsize bed that can be split to make two single beds - its up to you!
fields.title: Jacaranda self contained  accommodation  - Manly

fields.summary: A beautifully presented private studio with your own entrance to come & go as you please. Privacy, space & a peaceful leafy outlook, use of the pool, close to parks & public transport to the City, Ryde, Rhodes & Macquarie Park.
fields.description: A beautifully presented private studio with your own entrance to come & go as you please. Privacy, space & a peaceful leafy outlook, use of the pool, close to parks & public transport to the City, Ryde, Rhodes & Macquarie Park. The Accommodation The guest accommodation is a private space with ensuite, small fridge, lounge area, TV, microwave, kettle, toaster & Nespresso coffee machine. It has it's own entrance situated below a stunning heritage listed sandstone home in historic Hunters Hill. It is beautifully cool in summer & has underfloor heating so cosy & warm in winter. The bed is a comfortable Queen size & all linen & towels are supplied. We stock the fridge for your arrival with some basic breakfast supplies including cereal, juice, milk, bread etc & Nespresso capsules. The ensuite has a spacious shower but no bathtub. There is free wifi available. Please note that other than the microwave in your room there are no other cooking facilities available. There is also no kitchen sink
fields.notes: We can provide an extra trundle bed for a child or extra person at an additional fee of $25 per night
fields.neighbourhood_overview: Hunters Hill is a quiet, leafy, garden suburb with lots of historical buildings, waterfront parks & walking trails. There is a good variety of cafes, restaurants & pubs within a 15-20 min walk
fields.transit: Our accommodation is ideal if you have your own car as there is easy parking but plenty of our guests use public transport which is buses  or the ferry service
fields.title: Large Queen Studio in Heritage Home

fields.summary: I am ideally looking for long term. The minimum stay should be at least two weeks. We can negotiate but as a rule A$840 for 14 days. This does not include any catering or food provided.

This does not include any catering or food provided. Welcome to Neutral Bay Our home: I have one bedroom available in my 3 bedroom, 2 1/2 bathroom townhouse. The home has two balconies, internal laundry, kitchen, large dining/lounge and study.  The room: The room is fully furnished with queen size bed and built in robes and desk. There is a large modern bathroom with bath and shower. All linen and towels provided. Location: Only 2 kilometres from the Harbour Bridge. We are 50 metres from a bus stop which will take you to the City in 10 mins. We are a 10 min walk from Neutral Bay's shops and restaurants. Buses from Neutral Bay to Manly Beach take about 20 minutes. All day street parking available. Our home is in a very quiet area but is only 2 kilometres away from the Harbour Bridge and all the beauty of Sydney's magnificent harbour. I look forward to hear
fields.neighbourhood_overview: Very close to the City. Neutral Bay is a vibrant suburb 15 minutes from the City full of restaurants and comfortable nightspots. It is close to Sydney Harbour and Taronga Zoo.
fields.transit: 50 metres to a bus that will take you to the city or major transport links on Military Road.
fields.title: Room in Neutral Bay-10mins to city

fields.description: A brand new very private apartment with water and city views, 15 minutes drive from Sydney airports. The accomodation includes queen bedroom, second bedroom with double bed and 2 single beds, living room and kitchen, full bathroom with bath, 2 balconies and pool in an award winning  garden setting. The property is 300 metres from the bus to the city center with all its attractions. It is a 6 minute car trip to a large shopping mall and there is a small corner store on the street. It is only 400 metres walk  from several beaches and the beautiful Botany Bay National Park and within a kilometre of golf courses and tennis courts. There are many restaurants by the water just a 10 minutes walk away. The environment is very quiet and restful -ideal for a short restbreaks and equally suitable for extended stays. The owners are on site and are available to assist in making your stay memorable. Please note we are a TOTALLY SMOKE FREE accommodation and are in a quiet residential area where all n
fields.neighbourhood_overview: Very quiet and peaceful and a short walk to beautiful beaches yet just 35 minutes by bus or 25 minutes by car from the city.
fields.transit: The city bus runs from the corner of our street taking guests to all the attractions of Sydney.
fields.title: "By the Bay" ideal holiday location

fields.description: The Apartment- The 2 bedroom apartment is split over 3 levels, offering a good level of privacy with entry, private room and your own bathroom on one level. Your room features a quality queen sized bed, 2 seater sofa, flat screen TV/DVD player. While there is no TV channel reception in room, the room has a great range of dvds for your veiwing. The room is also equipped with a mini bar fridge and tea & coffee making facilities.  Unfortunately we do not offer use of the kitchen space, however, we are only a stones throw away from a wide selection of restaurants, you might opt to DIY and utilise the communal rooftop BBQ area which captures the ocean breeze and city views, including the iconic Center Point Tower.  Note: The apartment is in a secure building with swipe key access. Failure to return key and swipe will incur a replacement cost of $120 The Location- Conveniently located, Randwick is within easy reach of all that Sydney’s Eastern Suburbs offer. Our apartment is a short walk, bu
fields.title: Hotel Style Room with Own Bathroom

fields.summary: Redfern is a thriving and diverse community. Our home is close to great public transport and is walking distance to the CBD. It has gracious parks, restaurants, coffee shops, an Olympic swimming pool, tennis courts, gyms, yoga classes, bars, farmers markets, the University of Sydney, University of Technology Sydney, Sydney Technology Park, Carriage Works and all that Sydney's inner city has to offer. It is an easy bus or train ride to Sydney's eastern beaches.
fields.description: Redfern is a thriving and diverse community. Our home is close to great public transport and is walking distance to the CBD. It has gracious parks, restaurants, coffee shops, an Olympic swimming pool, tennis courts, gyms, yoga classes, bars, farmers markets, the University of Sydney, University of Technology Sydney, Sydney Technology Park, Carriage Works and all that Sydney's inner city has to offer. It is an easy bus or train ride to Sydney's eastern beaches. Concrete and recycled timber, feature in this ultra modern space.  Your room has a double bed. All linen provided.  Wi fi and coffee/tea included. You will have access to everything in the house. Please feel free to ask me anything. Redfern is one of Sydney's most exciting and dynamic neighbourhoods. It has grown from the city's most adjacent residential, working-class area to become a hub of innovative work spaces, media production, dining and entertainment within a friendly community. It is an important birthplace of the indige
fields.notes: Security is important. Guests must ensure the front door is always closed and locked.
fields.neighbourhood_overview: Redfern is one of Sydney's most exciting and dynamic neighbourhoods. It has grown from the city's most adjacent residential, working-class area to become a hub of innovative work spaces, media production, dining and entertainment within a friendly community. It is an important birthplace of the indigenous rights movement and reflects Australia's multicultural heritage in its many diverse residents.
fields.transit: Redfern railway station is a five minute walk away. The heart of the city is a 30 minute walk via Sydney's most historic parks.   The bus routes are comprehensive. Ours has a super central city and eastern suburbs accessibility.
fields.title: Modern, Industrial Redfern Terrace: Metro Room

fields.summary: BEAUTIFUL ROOM I have a sunny aspect double bedroom in a newly renovated inner city Sydney terrace house that I share with my cute little dog, Vinnie. The house has an open plan living area, with a new bathroom and modern kitchen with access to basic breakfast making facilities for tea and coffee and toaster. There is also a lovely secluded tropical garden right in the inner city!  CLOSE TO EVERYTHING.

I have a large sunny aspect double bedroom in a newly renovated inner city Sydney terrace house. The house has an open plan living area, new modern kitchen and new bathroom. A short walk away to popular restaurants, cafés, galleries, shopping and parks. It is also a stone throw from up coming creative hubs, such as Surry Hills, Waterloo and Redfer
fields.neighbourhood_overview: I love living in this neighbourhood as its very friendly and has so many creative aspects, from food to art. It also has a lot of open spaces which I thoroughly enjoy exploring.
fields.transit: There are plenty of local busses a short walk away. Major train stations near by and great bicycle and walking paths right on my doorstep!
fields.title: Sydney Inner City sunny aspect room

fields.summary: Nice and charming space close to the centre of Sydney.  Walking distance to water view, parklands, shops and public transport.  Sydney University, Sydney Fish Market, Glebe, Newtown and Leichhardt are just a few minutes away.  Cafes and restaurants are abundant in the area and the suburb is a quiet village that have easy access to other parts of Sydney. We enjoy hosting guests and have met hundreds of Sydney visitors and our aim is to make their stay just like home.  Come and share with us.
fields.description: Nice and charming space close to the centre of Sydney.  Walking distance to water view, parklands, shops and public transport.  Sydney University, Sydney Fish Market, Glebe, Newtown and Leichhardt are just a few minutes away.  Cafes and restaurants are abundant in the area and the suburb is a quiet village that have easy access to other parts of Sydney. We enjoy hosting guests and have met hundreds of Sydney visitors and our aim is to make their stay just like home.  Come and share with us. Welcome to Annandale! Please read through the entire listing carefully before booking this room as it will answer most of your questions and I'd like to share with you all aspects of the room, not just a pretty picture.  If you have any questions please ask before booking the place. Due to high demand for Christmas and New Year period, between Dec 20 to Jan 15, the minimum booking period is 4 nights. The house: Close to the city of Sydney CBD, located near the heart of Annandale village, walking dis
fields.notes: We recently adopted two kittens, so now we have a house with cats.  If you are allergic to animals and dislike pets in the house, this place isn't the right fit for you.  Please be very mindful with the kittens as they will want to get out the house at any given chance and / or making discoveries, trying to get into your room, under the bed to have a play, or they might follow you asking for a hug.  If you think any of the listed behaviour can cause some inconvenience to you and your stay, please do not book the place.  We just discovered that feeding two kittens is like taking two small babies, it involves work on our end, and understanding on the guests' end.  Please do not feed the cats as they follow a particular diet and don't let the cats run out as they are still small and can get lost, attacked by larger birds and/or hit by a passing vehicle.  If you think you can live with two tiny friend in the house who are generally clean and cute, we believe the kittens can also bring you
fields.neighbourhood_overview: Annandale is a charming area based in the Inner-West of Sydney, the village features some heritage listed architectures, cafes & restaurants, and is very close to the City, Glebe, Newtown and Sydney University.  10min walking distance you get to the bay at the foot of ANZAC Bridge or you can go explore areas like Leichhardt & Balmain which is all fairly close.
fields.transit: One minute walking distance to the closest bus stop, where you'll get two buses, 15min bus ride to central and the other bus takes you to Coogee Beach.  Bus comes around at 15min interval during peak hours and 25min interval off peak.  You can also walk 10min to Parramatta road where there's a selection of about 8 buses that goes into the City or western suburbs of Sydney.    There is a light rail station within 10min walking distance and you can take a light rail into the City on a 15min ride that goes through Fish Market, Darling Harbour and China Town eventually Central.   You can get here from the airport either by train then bus (45min) or Taxi (25min).  In terms of parking, you'll get plenty of street parking free of charge 7 days a week.
fields.title: Charming & Comfy in Annandale - 2

fields.description: This bright, clean and airy one bedroom apartment is the perfect place to stay when you visit Sydney's iconic Bondi Beach.  You will feel right at home in this older style apartment decorated with eclectic vintage treasures which will also accommodate all your modern needs. The apartment has a separate entrance, fully equipped eat-in kitchen, lounge/dining room, bathroom and double bedroom with a built-in wardrobe.  There is a flat screen TV and broadband wi-fi internet. All linen and towels provided.  The apartment is six minutes walk from the beach and just minutes from cafes, restaurants, wine bars and buses which will take you to Bondi Junction and the city. It is serviced by a private bathroom with fresh towels provided.  The apartment is located on the corner of Danks Street, known for it's trendy cafes and eateries, and just a short stroll for groceries, only minutes away. This natural beauty has coastal walks, natural pools and a variety of beaches all within walking distance. It is only 7 km to reach the city center from our location. We have accepted and hosted a lot of guests during our time as hosts and choose to host for the love of Airbnb and what it embodies. fields.notes: In our experience, we are in a great location for both tourists and for those visiting on business. Those who have benefit the most from staying with us include expats moving to Sydney for work. We have a few living within close proximity, and even catch up with them occasionally at a local pub or play in a football team together! We can definitely offer lots of tips for quickly finding work and accommodation for those staying with us. Our dog Bowie is an Australian Shepherd, born at the end of 2016, he is already well trained (for a pup!) and has his own space during the day whilst we are out. If you are a dog lover, let us know as he would be more than happy to interact with you. Our default is to keep him out of your way, and we ensure he does not access your room - even guests allergic to dogs have chosen to stay with us for a dose of puppy love - and we respect such guests by ensuring your room is as free from canine dander (allergent) as possible.

fields.neighbourhood_overview: This apartment is located in Sydney's flamboyant Potts Point district within walking distance to the city centre, restaurants, cafes, museums and the botanical garden. The nightlife and amazing restaurants of King's Cross, Darlinghurst Double Bay and Surry Hills are also all in easy walking distance. You are also near to the beautiful Sydney harbour foreshore. This is one of the most sought after locations in Sydney - and it is because it is close to everything!

The local shops are more than adequate, IGA supermarket, Gourmet supermarket, restaurants, French Patisserie, Pizza, Chicken, Thai, Italian, Pie/Cake shop, charming  gift shop, newsagent, Post Office, Petrol station, liquor shop, Pharmacy, Physiotherapist and Day Spa.  In fact, everything you need for a pleasant stay. We urge guests to go for walks along the River and use the ferry as much as possible, both into Sydney itself (downriver), or (upriver) to the Olympic site - towards Parramatta.
fields.transit: The Rivercat Ferry is less than a 10 minute walk away, this takes you to Circular Quay (and Circular Quay Station) in less than 1 hour, then a short train ride to the Airport.  A pleasant way to begin or finish your visit to Sydney.   There are bus stops within walking distance of our place and we suggest to guests that they log into the Sydney Transport system for detailed information on buses, trains and ferries. Opal Tickets may be purchased at the local Putney Newsagent.  From the Airport: A prebooked Shuttle is a very convenient and economical way rather than a taxi to arrive at our place, particularly if it is booked in advance - and there's nothing better after a long flight than to see a man standing at Arrivals with your name on a card - ready to help with your luggage and deliver you to our door! Catch the Skylink Train to Circular Key, have a snack at Circular Quay and stretch your legs, then hop on the Rivercat to Kissing Point and walk up the path to your home away from ho
fields.title: WATERFRONT APARTMENT AT PUTNEY, NSW

fields.summary: Unwind with a glass of Shiraz in this architect-designed, stylish loft. Appointed with modern luxuries, the space has an elegant light-filled interior. An exposed brick wall, originally part of a 19th-century farm, serves as a funky backdrop.
fields.description: Unwind with a glass of Shiraz in this architect-designed, stylish loft. Appointed with modern luxuries, the space has an elegant light-filled interior. An exposed brick wall, originally part of a 19th-century farm, serves as a funky backdrop.
fields.notes: We have recently finished a swimming pool which is next to the Loft. There may be some noise coming from the pool on warm weekends and after 3pm on week days, as our children love to swim.
fields.neighbourhood_overview: Take a bike ride over to Sydney Harbour, or check out the area's myriad fashion, food, sport, and design offerings—all within walking distance. Fashionable Surry Hills is buzzing with activity day and night, making it a fun area to live and visit.
fields.transit: The area is very well serviced by bus and trains. The nearest bus stop is 1 minute from the Loft and you can walk to central train station within 15 minutes. There are also numerous bike paths in the area.
fields.title: Elegant Loft in Converted Farmhouse

fields.summary: Our modern and comfy terrace sleeps up to four and is in cosmopolitan Leichhardt on the innercity fringe.  In a quiet, tree lined street you have only to walk 2 mins to access regular buses/trams and 10s of cafes, restaurants and shops.
fields.description: Our modern and comfy terrace sleeps up to four and is in cosmopolitan Leichhardt on the innercity fringe.  In a quiet, tree lined street you have only to walk 2 mins to access regular buses/trams and 10s of cafes, restaurants and shops. Moments to very regular buses our house enjoys rapid easy access to the Sydney City and surrounding suburbs. Leichhardt combines a vibrant retail and residential life, thanks largely to the Italian community that is the suburb’s soul.  There are countless Cafes and Restaurants to discover all within walking distance. Well proportioned and character filled throughout, this Federation (early 1900s) semi is peacefully placed in one of Leichhardt’s premier streets. Generous interiors are tastefully updated and offer light filled contemporary living within a stroll to Norton Street and Marketplace shops. - Free WiFi - All bills included, plus basic groceries so you can settle in - Generous interiors feature high ornate ceilings throughout - Spacious living w
fields.neighbourhood_overview: Heaps of local facilities within 2-5 mins walk.  4 Supermarkets, tens of cafes/restaurants.  Plenty of parks for kids including a fantastic 'sandpit' park.
fields.transit: We are about 7kms to the city.  There are several different bus routes that all pass within 2 minutes walk of our place.  They are very regular (every 5mins).   There is also a tram service which takes you into the city, that is about 5 minutes walk from our place, it runs at 10 minute intervals.
fields.title: Leichhardt Terrace 20mins to CBD

fields.description: Lilyfield Guest House This beautifully restored victorian home offers self-contained accomodation; a generous light-filled sitting room with leafy outlook, two double bedrooms (one with ensuite), main bathroom with huge Italian stone bath for two, and private verandah overlooking lush gardens. With lovely original features and period furnishings, Lilyfield Guest House is an elegant, restful home away from home.  Location:  Nestled between Balmain and Leichhardt in Sydney's inner west,  Lilyfield Guest House is surrounded by award-winning restaurants, pubs, shops, weekend markets, playgrounds and parks. Darling Street, Norton Street, Balmain Tigers' home ground, Le Montage function centre, Leichhardt Acquatic Centre and The Bay Run are all less than ten minute's walk away. Sydney city centre is less than five minutes by car, or 15 minutes by lightrail - the station a two minute walk away. Sydney's beaches and the airport are a 25 minute drive.  Bedrooms:  The ensuite room has a top of t
fields.notes: If you have booked under the special 2 ppl rate this is for the use of one room and one bathroom. I do not rent them out separately so there will be no one else to share with but if you require both rooms and bathrooms there is an additional charge on arrival of $40 for the cleaning. There is a steep sandstone staircase to access the house (please refer to photos). We live in the rear section of the property in a separate locked off section. There is no kitchen but there is a bar fridge, microwave, kettle, toaster, coffee pod machine and TV. Lilyfield Guest House is a lovely private space which is run like a modern B&B. I provide the breakfast and then come through once a day (just to the living room) to clean up and restock food.
fields.title: Lilyfield Guest House -incl. b/fast

fields.summary: A beautiful family home located in North Randwick. Located 200m from Centennial Park. Close to Bondi, Bronte and Coogee beaches.  Close to University of NSW and Randwick Hospital Campus. A 15 minute drive to the airport and the CBD, a bit longer in peak times. Good public transport access, both buses and trains. Unrestricted street parking with plenty of parking. As central as you could possibility need.
fields.description: A beautiful family home located in North Randwick. Located 200m from Centennial Park. Close to Bondi, Bronte and Coogee beaches.  Close to University of NSW and Randwick Hospital Campus. A 15 minute drive to the airport and the CBD, a bit longer in peak times. Good public transport access, both buses and trains. Unrestricted street parking with plenty of parking. As central as you could possibility need. This is our primary place of residence. You are welcome to use anything in the house, kitchen fridge etc… We travel a lot so may not always meet you during your stay. If we are away we have a few close friends who will stay and be able to answer any questions you may have. We are always available via text or a phone call.  Bedroom 1 (master) - King size bed and ensuite and walk in wardrobe. Bedroom 2 - Double bed, built in wardrobes. This room and the master room open onto a small private garden. Bedroom 3 - Double bed with built in wardrobe. Looks out onto main garden.  Loft - Two sin
fields.notes: Note - The house does not have air conditioning. The bedrooms all have ceiling fans. When the weather is at its hottest the house can get pretty hot. We have lived here for more than 20 years and coped without air conditioning.
fields.title: Randwick Spacious Loft, 2 single beds
