fields.summary: Our newly built (2013) self contained studio with loft bedroom is a great example of clever design in a small space. With everything you need, it will comfortably accommodate two adults, situated in Marrickville, 8km's from Sydney's centre.
fields.description: Our newly built (2013) self contained studio with loft bedroom is a great example of clever design in a small space. With everything you need, it will comfortably accommodate two adults, situated in Marrickville, 8km's from Sydney's centre. ***Christmas New Year 2017*** I am only taking bookings of 2 weeks or longer over this period at this stage. Quick Overview... Recently built Garden Studio (3mt x 6 mts) with queen sized loft bed situated in the rear veggie garden of my home in Marrickville. It’s an easy 15-20 minute Taxi ride to or from Sydney airport. Separate access at the side of the main house. Queens size bed in Loft Bedroom, accessed by ladder Good sized new Bathroom  Well equipped Kitchenette  Courtyard with BBQ. Cupboard and hanging space for clothes. Free Wifi available Includes breakfast hamper and a baked treat for your stay.  MP3 connectivity to portable speakers Board games and playing cards available. Some More Detail…. New garden studio situated at the rear of my hom
fields.title: The Garden Studio

fields.summary: Welcome to our spacious, top floor, Bondi apartment. Overlooking the iconic beach is it the perfect place to relax. It comfortably fits 4 people with room for an extra 2 if desired. With easy access to Bondi and the city it is ideal for a getaway.
fields.description: Welcome to our spacious, top floor, Bondi apartment. Overlooking the iconic beach is it the perfect place to relax. It comfortably fits 4 people with room for an extra 2 if desired. With easy access to Bondi and the city it is ideal for a getaway. This top floor apartment is one of Bondi's best. With a large, open plan living space that leads out onto a balcony overlooking Bondi Beach it really is the ultimate place to stay to enjoy the best Bondi has to offer.  The balcony comprises of a day bed and an outdoor dining table and chairs and on the back balcony is a BBQ. The kitchen is fitted out with all the necessary fixtures and fittings including a Nespresso coffee machine for the perfect start to your morning.  The living room has the worlds comfiest sofa and has doubled up as a bed in its lifetime. You can relax and enjoy the pleasures of paid TV. Our apartment is situated a 2 minute walk from Bondi Beach, a 1 minute walk to a local convenience store, one of North Bondi's best cafes
fields.notes: Our apartment is on the top floor which is up 3 flights of stairs and unfortunately does not have a lift. We may have some minor renovations taking place in the downstairs foyer during the Easter break. It will not impact your stay in the apartment.
fields.neighbourhood_overview: Our apartment is situated a 2 minute walk from Bondi Beach, a 1 minute walk to a local convenience store, one of North Bondi's best cafes (Depot), a pizza place for those lazy nights in (Dough Boy), a dry cleaners, newsagents and a well respected Yoga school.  During summer Bondi comes alive. Everyone is up early getting their morning coffee, there are an abundance of cafes serving delicious breakfast (including Bills on Hall Street, Drake on Gould Street, Depot on Campbell Parade and Porch and Parlour on Ramsgate Avenue). There are lots of other great places to eat for lunch and dinner both in Bondi and the rest of Sydney. Some of our favourites include Mercado (Spanish), Cho Cho San (Japanese), The Apollo (Greek), The Spice Room (Indian), Fonda (Mexican) and Da Orazio (Italian) however feel free to ask me for any other recommendations.
fields.transit: We are a 1 minute walk to the bus stop which takes you direct to Bondi Junction where you can either switch buses or use the underground system.
fields.title: Beautiful Ocean View Apartment

fields.summary: Female only.  Large private room available in sunny waterfront Mediterranean style apartment in the eastern suburbs with spectacular views, and direct beach access. Short walk to ferry, city buses and shops. Available from August - November, 2016 at $385 per week.
fields.description: Female only.  Large private room available in sunny waterfront Mediterranean style apartment in the eastern suburbs with spectacular views, and direct beach access. Short walk to ferry, city buses and shops. Available from August - November, 2016 at $385 per week. Large bedroom, high ceilings, double windows with painted shutters, expansive wardrobe with ample hanging space and shelves, chest of drawers, bedside tables, and lamps. Apartment decorated by Interiors Magazine stylist. Painted wood floors, large dining room overlooking the Harbour, separate shower and bath.  Guests have total privacy. Access to the whole apartment and waterfront terrace and garden. If possible I prefer to meet them first to show them around the apartment and answer any queries. The apartment is in a great location - surrounded by parks, with good selection of shops and local cafes, set in a village atmosphere on the shores of Sydney Harbour. Tennis courts, beaches and golf courses in the area. Very good bus
fields.notes: Great local shops and cafe's. Close to all amenities.
fields.neighbourhood_overview: The apartment is in a great location - surrounded by parks, with good selection of shops and local cafes, set in a village atmosphere on the shores of Sydney Harbour. Tennis courts, beaches and golf courses in the area.
fields.transit: Very good bus service to the whole of Sydney and to near by train station. Plus ferries to the city.
fields.title: Sydney Harbour waterfront apartment

fields.summary: We are sure you will feel very happy staying in our open plan, well equipped and comfortable house.  It is in a lovely spot - with great views through the treetops over Pittwater towards Kurigai National Park.
fields.description: We are sure you will feel very happy staying in our open plan, well equipped and comfortable house.  It is in a lovely spot - with great views through the treetops over Pittwater towards Kurigai National Park. Detatched house on Northern Beaches, approx 1 hour from Sydney.  Short drive to shops at Avalon, Newport  or Mona Vale.  Close to many good surfing beaches.  Great views over the treetops.  Modern open-plan living.  2 bedrooms, one upstairs with king bed and ensuite bathroom, one in the middle level with two single beds and it's own bathroom.  Two indoor sitting areas, the upstairs one has a single bed and is often used as a third bedroom. Downstairs kitchen/dining/sitting area opens onto deck and pool.  Upstairs has large deck area too.  Small but flat area of garden at back of house with washing line and wooden decking area. The whole house, apart from the 3rd bedroom which is locked. We may be away, but if we are around, we are always keen to help our visitors to have an enjoy
fields.notes: The Driveway and Parking.  The driveway is quite steep, so no problem if you have a 4 wheel drive.  My Toyota Corolla goes up fine, but it can be daunting if you are not used to a steep driveway and when it's been raining a lot it can be slippery, especially for heavily laden cars.  If you are not sure about driving up, it is possible to park in Yarrabee Place opposite and walk up the drive.  If we are here, we can ferry luggage up and down in our 4 wheel drive.  There is space to turn at the top, but if you have more than one car it is best to park extra cars in Yarrabee Place where there are no restrictions.  There are double white lines on Lower Plateau Road outside our house.
fields.neighbourhood_overview: We love the view over the treetops to Kuringai National Park in the distance with Pittwater in between.  There is a great choice of surfing beaches close by, also ferry trips on Pittwater and the Hawkesbury river available from Palm Beach, holiday home of many celebrities and location for Home and Away.  Walk up to Barrenjoey lighthouse and view the Hawkesbury estuary. Broken Bay and the coast to the north.  Take a trip to Avalon with its many and varied restaurants and shops.  We love the relaxed, beachy vibe on the Peninsula.
fields.transit: There is a bus to Avalon from the road below which runs hourly between 9 and 5 every day.  Also from Avalon the L90 goes into the city.  It is a pleasant 30 minute, walk to Avalon.   There are frequent B line double decker buses from Mona Vale to the City which connect with the 199  bus from Palm Beach to Manly
fields.title: Treetopz

fields.summary: Large  self-contained bedroom with en-suite bathroom and queen bed in a sunny, light filled, rooftop apartment. Conveniently located with easy access to public transport. A fantastic selection of affordable and tasty restaurants close by.
fields.description: Large  self-contained bedroom with en-suite bathroom and queen bed in a sunny, light filled, rooftop apartment. Conveniently located with easy access to public transport. A fantastic selection of affordable and tasty restaurants close by. The room is spacious and easily accommodates two adults. You will be sharing the apartment with myself and my partner Peter and our 11 year old daughter (Olivia). The room is reasonably self contained so if you are looking for privacy... its ideal. It has its own modern en-suite bathroom, a TV (including apple tv), a mini bar fridge, kettle and hairdryer. The apartment is conveniently located very close to buses and trains to the city. It is a short bus trip to Newtown, where you will find a huge selection of delicious and affordable restaurants, an interesting mix of boutiques and gift ware shops, cinemas, pubs and bars. If you arrive by car, you are welcome to use the underground car park, there is plenty of visitor parking available. The room conta
fields.notes: Superfast broadband.
fields.neighbourhood_overview: A fantastic range of food is available at many inexpensive restaurants. We are right next to Cook's River and the bike path that connects  Marrickville to Botany Bay and further out to Homebush. The path is very beautiful and flat all the way west right along the Cook's river.
fields.transit: There is a bus stop right outside the building which takes you to Newtown and then onto the city. Trains are a short walk (5-10 mins) and its only a short ride into the city, 5 stops from memory. I recommend taking the train over the bus it is much quicker and more efficient. We are very close to the airport, it takes about 10 mins and in a taxi costs less than $30.
fields.title: Large Room with Ensuite Bathroom

fields.summary: A lovely spacious and bright older-style 2 bedroom apartment with sunroom/baby room in beautiful Bronte, situated on a quiet street and a 5-7 minute walk to Bronte Beach and the Coastal Walk. The apartment is in a small block of four apartments, on the first floor. Ideal for up to 3 adults + 1 baby, or 2 adults and 2 children. Fully equipped kitchen with dining table, large lounge room, bathroom and common areas front and back shared with super friendly neighbours.
fields.description: A lovely spacious and bright older-style 2 bedroom apartment with sunroom/baby room in beautiful Bronte, situated on a quiet street and a 5-7 minute walk to Bronte Beach and the Coastal Walk. The apartment is in a small block of four apartments, on the first floor. Ideal for up to 3 adults + 1 baby, or 2 adults and 2 children. Fully equipped kitchen with dining table, large lounge room, bathroom and common areas front and back shared with super friendly neighbours. A comfortable and light-filled, spacious and clean apartment. The perfect place to stay when in Sydney if you want to be in a central location and close to gorgeous beaches.     Located in beautiful Bronte (two beaches south of Bondi beach).  The apartment has two bedrooms with mirrored built-in wardrobes. The main bedroom is equipped with a very comfortable queen bed while the 2nd bedroom has a king single sofa bed and desk space. There is also a sunroom off the main bedroom with is set up as both a baby room and office. Th
fields.title: Spacious & Peaceful 2 Bed Bronte Apartment

fields.summary: The Artist's Studio is larger than the Writer's Den with a dining table and room for a camp bed as well as the sofa bed. It is newly renovated and comfortably furnished.
fields.description: The Artist's Studio is larger than the Writer's Den with a dining table and room for a camp bed as well as the sofa bed. It is newly renovated and comfortably furnished. The Artist's Studio is 3km from the city, with buses every few minutes from the nearest intersection. Darling Harbour is 2km away. The airport is about 35 minutes drive away. The building that houses the Artist's studio was originally the Jones Family Hotel, built in 1884. Now it is a mix of residential and commercial premises. The apartment is in the back of the building, accessed through a side gate into a courtyard with a beautiful jacaranda tree.  The studio apartment is a generous 45sm. It has a king sized bed that can be configured as two singles, and a single sofa bed. It has a dining table, kitchen facilities and an en suite bathroom (shower only). It has easy level ground floor access.  I put in coffee and tea. You can make your own breakfast but otherwise there is a cafe on the corner that roasts their own co
fields.neighbourhood_overview: I love the village atmosphere and being greeted on the street. I like walking to food shops, cafes and restaurants. The good public transport into the city
fields.transit: Buses every few minutes 250 metres away that go to the city. Light rail 10 minutes away. Bus connections to the ferry.
fields.title: The Artist's Studio, Rozelle

fields.summary: Fully-furnished sun-filled studio with car space and balcony bar on quiet leafy street in heart of the city.  Surrounded by Sydney's best pubs, cafes, shops, parks and terraces. Walking distance to almost anywhere in the city, and public transport at your door. Conveniently located designated private parking space.
fields.description: Fully-furnished sun-filled studio with car space and balcony bar on quiet leafy street in heart of the city.  Surrounded by Sydney's best pubs, cafes, shops, parks and terraces. Walking distance to almost anywhere in the city, and public transport at your door. Conveniently located designated private parking space. Fully-furnished sun-filled studio with designer vibe and balcony bar on quiet leafy street in heart of the city. Surrounded by Sydney's best pubs, cafes, shops, parks and terraces. Private parking space. Balcony and interiors by Jonny Gloss with egg/swan chairs. Wireless Internet. 40 inch Samsung Smart TV with 3D DVD player & glasses. Dyson heater/cooler. Nespresso machine. Fast ceramic cooktop.  Clean linen & towels provided. Ideal space for one person, but fits two for short stays. Small desk and empty wardrobes.  Shared professional-standard laundry facilities on premises at $3 a wash/dry. A friend or I will meet you to let you give you the key & Internet password etc., t
fields.neighbourhood_overview: Located on a quiet and leafy street in the heart of the city. Surrounded by Sydney's best pubs, cafes, shops, terraces, parks; and a walkable distance to most places.
fields.transit: Buses and taxis 1-2 min walk from door.  Walk: 5 min to Five-Ways, less than 10 min to Oxford St, 15 min to trains (Edgecliff) and 20 min to harbour (Rushcutters Bay).
fields.title: Sunny Paddington studio w.balcony

fields.summary: This light-filled split level, contemporary and well appointed 1 bedroom plus study home in the inner city area of Sydney is centrally located and yet, offers tranquility and charm. Enjoy the sundeck with its district and city views!
fields.description: This light-filled split level, contemporary and well appointed 1 bedroom plus study home in the inner city area of Sydney is centrally located and yet, offers tranquility and charm. Enjoy the sundeck with its district and city views! As guests, you will have access to the entire house, including back patio, sundeck and lower deck. Off-street parking is easy and I lend guests a resident parking permit that allows them to park anywhere in the neighborhood without to worry about time restrictions. I will be meeting you upon arrival and will introduce you to the house and the neighbourhood. You can call me anytime during your stay to get my help with the house, or with the internet connection, or the keys! (some guests have locked themselves out and I had to rescue them from homelessness!!) Rozelle is a vibrant inner-city neighborhood. Although on the edge of everything, the street is quiet and you won't be disturbed by traffic noise. Public transport is almost at your doorstep, and it wil
fields.neighbourhood_overview: Rozelle is a vibrant inner-city neighborhood. Although on the edge of everything, the street is quiet and you won't be disturbed by traffic noise.
fields.transit: Public transport is almost at your doorstep, and it will take you only 5 minutes to get to Sydney Central Business District (CBD).
fields.title: A Split Level Inner City Cottage

fields.summary: The upstairs area is the domain of guests with TWO bedrooms and one bathroom. Each bedroom has one  queen sized bed, wardrobes, bedside tables lamps, magazines, books... One has a desk as well. If you require only one bedroom we do not AirBNB the other bedroom whilst you are staying with us! However we can easily accommodate four guests travelling (URL HIDDEN) two couples or two singles. We reside downstairs . We serve a light breakfast - outside on the deck  weather permitting   .
fields.description: The upstairs area is the domain of guests with TWO bedrooms and one bathroom. Each bedroom has one  queen sized bed, wardrobes, bedside tables lamps, magazines, books... One has a desk as well. If you require only one bedroom we do not AirBNB the other bedroom whilst you are staying with us! However we can easily accommodate four guests travelling (URL HIDDEN) two couples or two singles. We reside downstairs . We serve a light breakfast - outside on the deck  weather permitting   . The house has an upstairs area consisting of two bedrooms with a Queen size  bed in each and a  shared  bathroom. This area is the private space for our guests. We can accommodate one to four from the same party. We would not be taking guests from separate parties on the one evening. My wife Helen and I  live downstairs so it is important guests understand it is not whole of house rental however the kitchen is available for tea coffee, light snacks We are situated five minutes walk to the bus which takes ten
fields.notes: As we do not offer whole of house our guests tend to be busy , short term ones who are out most of the time...tourists or business or .visiting for weddings nearby.  We also need to advise that the cost of using both rooms will be $86 per room per night (whether it is one person or four persons) but this will include a light  breakfast per person.  Typical guests are out during the day, often returning to freshen up and rest before going out for dinner in the evening. As mentioned elsewhere there are many cafes, pubs, restaurants nearby.
fields.neighbourhood_overview: Proximity to City and beaches together with suburban tranquility. The local area has a picture theatre , restaurants and bars.  Taronga Zoo is nearby as are ferry services to the city…although the bus service to the city is much quicker. There is ample safe parking outside our house in our street.
fields.transit: Guests can walk to a beautiful harbour side beach . If travelling to the city we recommend the  bus which involves a five minute walk to bus stop and ten minute bus ride. You can also get the bus quite quickly to Manly Beach in the opposite direction.
fields.title: Cremorne , Sydney, New South Wales

fields.summary: This is a great 2 bedroom private apartment in Bondi. This is the same rental as  "PrivateRoom- #beautifulbondibeach" except I am away so you have full private use of the house except for my bedroom. So it's essentially a 1 bedroom private rental. Great for 2 people.  Beautiful  Home art deco apt with balcony.
fields.description: This is a great 2 bedroom private apartment in Bondi. This is the same rental as  "PrivateRoom- #beautifulbondibeach" except I am away so you have full private use of the house except for my bedroom. So it's essentially a 1 bedroom private rental. Great for 2 people.  Beautiful  Home art deco apt with balcony. 1 x  double rooms in an Art Deco apartment this room is suitable for single or couple. Level access from the road with on street  parking out the front in a quiet street, only 10 minutes easy walk to the beach. I have been living here for 10 years and it's a great spot.   enjoy being able to share our home with fellow airbnb  travellers.   Enjoy the privacy of a home away from home and local knowledge from the owner, who will leave you all the information you need to enjoy your stay in her apartment while she is away.   Access to all amenities including kitchen, washing machine, bathroom and  a balcony with  district views. 1 x  bedroom  -  one queen bed. All bedding and towels p
fields.notes: Everyone loves the warmth and comfortable nature of our apartment. It really feels homey and cozy with all the modern amenities you need for comfort. Please look after our house! We share a balcony with the 2 girls who live next door who we are friends with so we share the balcony space.
fields.neighbourhood_overview: Quiet, super close to public transport and the best that bondi has to offer with restaurants, pubs, cafes and of course the beach!  Occasionally we get noise from the street on a saturday night with people walking home but it's minimal and given its winter - it rarely happens!
fields.transit: Yes! Buses are an 8 minute walk that take you to the city or Bondi Junction Train Station.
fields.title: Bondi Beauty- Home away from Home

fields.description: Available from Monday 28th May. Would prefer longer term rentals but any shorter term queries are welcomed... You really can't get more convenient than this location... Kings Cross Train Station 5 mins away > Buses to beaches > 15 minute walk into the CityCentre > A great Eat Street (Victoria St) at your doorstep > Oxford Street, Potts Point, The Harbour, some beautiful parks and Surry Hills all walking distance.  The apartment is on the top floor of a small block of 6 with no shared walls. It's a quiet oasis in the busy inner city suburb of Darlinghurst.  There is a Queen sized bed in an ample sized bedroom with bay windows and built in wardrobes. Off the bedroom and the living area is a Sunroom... where I have a home office set up. The kitchen, dining and living areas are all combined in a very spacious and sunny open planned way. There is a small shared balcony off the Kitchen which leads to the stairs to the roof >(Smokers feel free to smoke out here). From the shared roof you can
fields.notes: Parking is an issue if you have a car > There is only on-street parking and it is only 1 hour parking 8am to Midnight. If your stay is short I can provide visitor parking permits at a certain fee per day (please ask).
fields.title: Sunny & Spacious Inner-City Darlinghurst, Sydney

fields.description: I have a vacant 2nd room available in my 2 bedroom, 2 bathroom modern large apartment with built in robes, foxtel, internet, Aircon and laundry. Everything you need and only meters from the beach. As well as all shops and restaurants.Life is great! in this location. Unfurnished. But can be arranged quickly.
fields.title: Lrge 2nd room vacant Cronulla Beach

fields.description: Come and stay in wonderful Petersham! This amazing and large terrace house is located only minutes from the train and buses that will have you in the heart of the city within 15 minutes.  The room is a large and sunny double room, located on the first floor of a renovated terrace overlooking the garden. You will have a private and relaxed stay. The room is perfect for a couple or single and is easily accessible to the shared bathroom. We are very close to public transport (and even a pub next door) but it is quiet and relaxed so no need to worry about noisy trains waking you up at night!). We are a short walk away from Leichhardt which is Sydney's amazing Italian dinning and entertainment precinct. On the other side of the railway line is Petersham's famous Portuguese dining strip. Glebe, Balmain and Rozelle markets are a short bus trip away. This is a lovely and safe area to walk around at any time of day or night. The streets are quintessentially Sydney with a real mix of architectur
fields.title: Bright Inner West Terrace Value+

fields.description: Birchgrove is a tranquil inner city suburb on the Balmain peninsula with amazing water views. Our modernised detached double fronted weatherboard cottage is situated in a very quiet street and a 10 min walk to Balmain’s shopping centre which has a unique village feel with lots of parks, cafes, restaurants, pubs, fashion-shops and a supermarket.  * BEDROOMS (1 queen, 1 double, 1 study) wardrobes & drawers in each, could put blow up in study * AMENITIES: Flat screen 50 inch TV with Netflix, Foxtel, fast WIFI (30mbs), gas and electric heaters, ceiling fans in all rooms * BATHROOM: large bath and walk in shower * LIVING / DINNING / KITCHEN: Light open plan, flowing to deck and garden. Kitchen has  micro, oven, gas hob, dishwasher, lots of glass wear, crookery and gadgets * LAUNDRY: washer & dryer * OUTSIDE: Small deck and grass garden * TRANSPORT: 2 min walk to bus and 10 min ride to CBD. 10 min walk to ferry (Thames St)  and 15 min trip to  Circular Quay / Opera house * PARKING: Street pa
fields.title: Birchgrove home

fields.summary: This larger than normal apartment boasts a separate study and is in a fantastic location, close to everything Sydney has to offer.  Great local restaurants, cafés and bars. It is an easy to walk to the city, or catch a bus on William St. directly to Town Hall.
fields.description: This larger than normal apartment boasts a separate study and is in a fantastic location, close to everything Sydney has to offer.  Great local restaurants, cafés and bars. It is an easy to walk to the city, or catch a bus on William St. directly to Town Hall. Darlinghurst is a vibrant area  that's close to the CBD, harbour and many of the attractions Sydney has to offer, yet it has its own village-like feel with plentiful local restaurants and bars. The spacious apartment has been totally renovated and the separate study makes it a great choice for business executives. City Gym is across the road which is very handy, but sadly you will have to pay to use their facilities. Mostly by email. Darlinghurst is a heritage area and many designers have their offices here, and this is reflected in the eclectic mix of cafes, wine bars, restaurants and art galleries, especially in Stanley St. Buses to the City run regularly from the bus stop round the corner in William St.  The express bus (333)
fields.neighbourhood_overview: Darlinghurst is a heritage area and many designers have their offices here, and this is reflected in the eclectic mix of cafes, wine bars, restaurants and art galleries, especially in Stanley St.
fields.transit: Buses to the City run regularly from the bus stop round the corner in William St.  The express bus (333) to Bondi Beach, Bondi Junction and Paddington is a short, uphill walk away in Oxford St. The airport is just 20 minutes away, so take a taxi or catch a direct train from the airport to Museum station, which is a 10 minute walk across Hyde Park. Budget and Hertz car hire offices are just round the corner. There is a supermarket (Metro) store close by in Crown St, across William St, plus a liquor store and gym over the road.     A 7 minute stroll across The Domain will take you to the Art Gallery of NSW or to Pitt St Mall, one of the main shopping areas of central Sydney.   The Museum of Sydney and a large, new public indoor swimming pool on William St. are 200m away, just in front of St Mary's Cathedral.  Bicycle hire from Spin/way outside the Boulevard Hotel in William Street - about 2 minutes away. Deposit $20 with the concierge, your card in the slot, grab a bike and explore.
fields.title: Chic, Designer’s City Appt

fields.summary: A well appointed, newly renovated fully self contained studio apartment. Close to cafes, restaurants, access to the city but quiet and private.
fields.description: A well appointed, newly renovated fully self contained studio apartment. Close to cafes, restaurants, access to the city but quiet and private. The Writer's Den has a queen sized bed and a single sofa bed. It has a kitchen/sitting area, a bedroom area, and an en suite bathroom with shower (no bath). The building that houses the two studio apartments was originally the Jones Family Hotel, built in 1884. Now it is a mix of residential and commercial premises. The apartment is one of two in the back of the building, accessed through a side gate into a courtyard with a beautiful jacaranda tree. The other apartment is listed as the Artist's Studio. Location The Darling Street Apartments, Rozelle, are between the vibrant, bohemian Balmain and the Italian area of Leichhardt.  On the Lilyfield side of Victoria Road, they are ideally situated for public transport. 4km from the city centre, 2km from Darling Harbour, and 30 minutes from the airport. The apartment is on the groundfloor and on one
fields.neighbourhood_overview: I love the village atmosphere and being greeted on the street. I like the shops, cafes and markets within walking distance, and the ease of accessing the city centre by bus or taxi. I love have breakfast with friends every Saturday morning, the health food store and the growers market down the road.  I like walking in the enormous park across the road where I can walk down to the harbour waterfront.
fields.transit: We are well placed for public transport. There is a main bus line 200 metres away. It takes about 15 minutes into the city centre. Light rail about 10 minutes walk away. The ferry can be reached by bus.. The cruise ship terminal is less than 3 km.
fields.title: Writer's Den apartment  in Rozelle

fields.summary: My lovely ,sunny Victorian apartment , furnished mostly with French antiques & lots of books is now available for long term stays of 3 months or more. In a row of 4 large terrace houses built in 1879 it has pleasant gardens & a salt water pool.
fields.description: My lovely ,sunny Victorian apartment , furnished mostly with French antiques & lots of books is now available for long term stays of 3 months or more. In a row of 4 large terrace houses built in 1879 it has pleasant gardens & a salt water pool.  Lovely sunny one bedroom apartment in an 1879 terrace house. I love my apartment which has loads of character with stained glass french doors that open onto a shared balcony overlooking the front garden & another pair opening onto the shared back deck leading down to the saltwater pool. A wide hallway contains 2 large bookcases, plenty of reading for visitors! The large bedroom is furnished  with french antiques and the room is also a study & sitting room. There is an equally large lounge/dining/entertainment room. High ceilings give a spacious feel & there are 2 fireplaces & gas for heating if you need it. A modest kitchen & bathroom has all the essentials including a claw-foot bath. I do not have air- conditioning of WiFi. I do not need them.
fields.notes: Old buildings with with wooden floorboards can be a bit noisy for my neighbours below. I have recently carpeted the 2 main rooms & just ask tenants to be a quiet as possible and take their shoes of inside.  Because I allow pets & also have sisal matting in the main rooms those who suffer with asthma or severe allergies may find my apartment unsuitable.
fields.neighbourhood_overview: Returning after travelling overseas I realised how much I love where I live. It is very cosmopolitan , clean & safe...great coffee & restaurants, vintage & book stores & movie theatres.
fields.transit: Close to both train & bus services. On street parking can be difficult in the evenings . I have never needed a car in the city.
fields.title: Sunny Victorian terrace nr city,uni

fields.summary: Stunning apartment near Kings Cross. Extremely quiet.  Leafy green tree outlook.  This apartment has everything you need.  Modern, clean, spacious.  It's a great base to have during your stay in Sydney
fields.description: Stunning apartment near Kings Cross. Extremely quiet.  Leafy green tree outlook.  This apartment has everything you need.  Modern, clean, spacious.  It's a great base to have during your stay in Sydney Stunning apartment near Kings Cross. Perfect quiet apartment.  Newly renovated.  Sleek, sexy and modern.  New photos coming soon. Stunning apartment in Elizabeth Bay, right next door to Kings Cross.  This quiet 1 bedroom modern apartment has everything you need. Swimming pool, gym, sauna. A fully contained kitchen overlooking the dining and lounge area flowing on to a sunny balcony.   Perfect for 2 people for short term holiday or business stay.  Walking distance to everything.  Train nearby.   A perfect base for your visit to Sydney  It's a perfect place for 1-2 people, however the office area can be used as another sleeping space for a 3rd or 4th person on an air mattress. Keep in mind if you are booking for more than 2 people, the entrance to the bathroom is through the bedroom.  Trai
fields.notes: Parking is available at the Parking Station across the road. Free parking is NOT available in the building.   It's perfect for a single or couple, however it can sleep a third person on the couch in the lounge room
fields.neighbourhood_overview: Kings Cross/Elizabeth Bay/Potts Point is the heart and soul of Sydney.  It is the most sought after area to live and visit.   Kings Cross is the red-light district,providing night life, entertainment, cafes and restaurants.  Every Saturday, the park just outside the door holds a neighbourhood farmer's market, and every Sunday an antique, wares market.   Potts Point and Elizabeth Bay has world class restaurants and cafes Whether you are looking for a high end 12 degustation menu, or a $10 steak at the local pub, you will find it here.   It's very easy to organise tours of Sydney and the outskirts of Sydney, from Kings Cross.  The "Hop on - Hop off" bus tours drive right passed the building, and explore all of Sydney from the city through to Bondi.   23 May - 9 June 2014 Vivid Light Festival in and around the city and harbour - amazing festival you cannot miss
fields.transit: Try our public transport system with buses nearby, and the train station a 5 minute walk away. The apartment is a short stroll to the harbour, and a 15 minute walk into the city and the Botanical Gardens.  Bondi Beach is 20 mins away by public transport From the airport you can catch a train to Kings Cross train Station and walk to the apartment.  If you are travelling alone, the train might be the option for you ($16 one way), however, if there are more than one, its about $40 in a cab.  There are also shuttle buses that come to Kings Cross.

fields.summary: Five Ways B and B's popularity is due to two features: our location in a charming village atmosphere yet close to the city and harbour, and the peaceful, attractive and well equipped guestroom in a 130 year-old terrace house.
fields.description: Five Ways B and B's popularity is due to two features: our location in a charming village atmosphere yet close to the city and harbour, and the peaceful, attractive and well equipped guestroom in a 130 year-old terrace house. For the past ten years we have been welcoming guests to our small B and B in our 1880s terrace house in Paddington, one of Sydney's oldest and most charming suburbs. We are located at the heart of Paddington village at Five Ways, within a 30 minute walk to the city, and close to local attractions such as Sydney Cricket Ground, the Football Stadium, Paddington markets, the Cruising Yacht Club, and Rushcutter's Bay and Centennial Park. There are frequent, regular buses to the city and to Bondi and neighbouring beaches. Paddington boasts a wealth of good cafes and restaurants, art galleries and boutiques in a safe and attractive environment.  We offer a spacious master bedroom on the first floor (up a flight of fairly steep stairs) with its own iron lace balcony over
fields.notes: Sydney's public transport system is accessed with an electronic card, known as an Opal card. Australian guests who are eligible for seniors discounts can apply for their Opal cards before they arrive. For overseas guests we keep two cards available on arrival which guests can top up during their stay and then leave behind for the next guests.
fields.neighbourhood_overview: Charming historical architecture, tree lined streets and many parks, walking distance to the harbour.
fields.transit: Great bus service from Five Ways every 10 minutes into the City and Circular Quay and Opera House, or in other direction to Bondi Beach.
fields.title: Five Ways B & B Paddington

fields.summary: Beautiful 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom, house with gardens and outdoor BBQ entertaining area, 10min walk to Whale Beach. We have Sydney's best surfing beaches and stunning Pittwater inlet for sailing, kayaking. Nearby Avalon has cafes, bookstore, shops, cinema. Regular bus to City and other beaches. WiFi and TV, DVD.
fields.description: Beautiful 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom, house with gardens and outdoor BBQ entertaining area, 10min walk to Whale Beach. We have Sydney's best surfing beaches and stunning Pittwater inlet for sailing, kayaking. Nearby Avalon has cafes, bookstore, shops, cinema. Regular bus to City and other beaches. WiFi and TV, DVD.  The detached house is light and airy and has polished wood floors and is great for entertaining, indoor or outdoor. All bedrooms have built in robes (one queen, one double and one single bed).  Shower has massage function.  In the mornings the only thing that will wake you are the amazing sounds of exotic Australian native birds including Kookaburra, Lorikeets, Cockatoos, Currawongs, etc. Great and safe for children too and friendly neighbours. Free parking in low crime area. Go boating, kayaking in Pittwater, lots of great walks; ferry to Kuringai National Park and Central Coast; great restaurants at Avalon, Whale and Palm beaches and boutique cinema and great bookshop in Avalo
fields.notes: Local weather in winter is usually sunny to 16C but can be cool at night to about 6C. No frost or snow. Hottest months are January February but usually with afternoon sea breezes.
fields.neighbourhood_overview: Traffic free, peaceful and friendly, surrounded by native gum trees, tree ferns and exotic flowers and other plants. Two minute walk to bus stop for City or other beaches. The region's best croissants and treats can be found at La Banette bakery in Avalon. Italian, Thai, French, Spanish, Indian, Chinese and Australian cuisine are all available locally. Good medical facilities, yoga and Pilates also available locally. If you like water try surfing, whale watching, boating and head to Sydney centre for theatres and sight seeing too. Walking/jogging is hard to beat around here and there is a links golf course at Palm Beach and a 9 hole one at Avalon and further courses at Mona Vale and beyond. Local tennis club. Great area for families with children and for anyone loving the outdoors.
fields.transit: Sydney Airport is about one hour away and there are shuttle buses such as North Shore Shuttle Express (tel (phone number hidden) or local call (phone number hidden) or email (email (Website hidden by Airbnb)  The local L90 bus runs about every 30 minutes to the City and Palm Beach (view time table online). The nearest bus stop is  4 minutes walk on the corner of Barrenjoey Road and Careel Head Road. There is also an early morning express bus E88 which requires prepaid tickets (L90 you can pay as you enter or buy prepaid tickets in newsagents  or local supermarket).

Wake to the sound of birds and marvel at the tranquility of our little piece of paradise not far from Sydney CBD. This private, spacious studio in our large, leafy garden is separate from the main house. It is a wonderfully peaceful spot on a sunny morning when you might be tempted to throw open the doors and enjoy an al fresco breakfast. Some basic breakfast supplies are provided and include bread, cereal, fruit, milk, loose-leaf tea and coffee. The studio has a queen-size bed and all linen and towels are pure cotton. Also provided are a small fridge, toaster, kettle, teapot, coffee maker, microwave, fan (or electric heater in the cooler seasons), TV, chest of drawers, hanging space, hairdryer and free wifi. fields.neighbourhood_overview: Gladesville is on Sydney's lower north shore, close to the historic garden suburb of Hunters Hill. Our house is on a quiet street in a safe area with some lovely walks pretty much on the doorstep – the Field of Mars wildlife refuge, Boronia Park, Lane Cove River and Great North Walk. We are equidistant from Sydney CBD and Macquarie University – both about 15-20 minutes by car, or 25-30 minutes by bus – and 40 minutes’ drive from Sydney Airport (about $70 by taxi). St Joseph’s College boys’ school is also nearby and we are about 15-20 minutes by car from Sydney Olympic Stadium.
fields.transit: There is plenty of free street parking and a regular bus service to the city from a bus stop just one minute's walk from our house. The bus journey into Sydney CBD takes about 20-25 minutes.

It's also equipped with block out curtains, so no matter what time you like to sleep, you're sure to get a good one.  Wi-fi is provided with high-speed cable at no charge. For any of the gay persuasion, Oxford st is a block away, featuring some of the best GLBT venues in Australia. Try the Shift, Stonewall, The Oxford and ARQ. There is something going on every night!

The space is our city getaway pad and we offer it to you as we like to enjoy it ourselves. When you choose to stay at our place, it is our place, we own it and you are dealing directly with either my partner (Goodie) or myself, just as Airbnb should be. fields.notes: Please view my photographs and written information - I have been as accurate as is humanly possible. If you don't think my offer is good value, please make the choice not to book.  Please review the location alongside your requirements in Sydney. If you do not believe this is the location for you, please choose not to book. No cleaning fee is charged but it will be taken from the bond should you make a horrible mess. Please use common sense, we love our place.
fields.neighbourhood_overview: Enmore Road and King Street together comprise 9.1 kilometres of over 600 shopfronts. It is often referred to as 'Eat Street' because of the number of cafés, pubs and restaurants of various cultures. Hungry? Prepare for a bout of indecision – there are over 140 restaurants and all kinds of cuisines.  Historically, it is the longest and most complete commercial precinct of the late Victorian and Federation period in Australia.  There's no need for me to try and sell Newtown to you :) As a location, it sells itself because it is a one off. Please look it up online to see if the location to broader Sydney suits your travel needs. Even if you do not stay here, it is a must visit spot if you want to see what the locals love. A popular weekend farmers' market is held at Carriageworks every Saturday 8am - 1pm and an artisans' market 1st Sunday of the Month 10am - 3pm (cash only, no ATM on site) 243 Wilson Street, Darlington (near Redfern Station). You can walk there in about 5 minutes.
fields.transit: 5 minutes walk from Sydney University, RPA, Macdonaldtown Station and Carriageworks - 2 train stops to Central or buses at the door to take you anywhere - city or beach. We are positioned right on King St, at the beginning of essentially the largest street shopping and eating area in Sydney. In the other direction, if walking, you are 16 mins from Broadway shopping Centre, 25 minutes from Central and George Street, the main street of Sydney City, 33 mins from the fish markets in Blackwattle Bay. But of course, there are buses (right downstairs) and trains (5 mins away) to take you wherever you wish to go if walking isn't your thing.  We have TWO foldable push bikes for you to use PLUS helmets PLUS visibility vests! In NSW, by law, you are expected to wear helmets when riding push bikes. They don't get used much so there's a pump in case the tyres need air or you can engage the services of the bike shop in Georgina Street, right next to the building.
fields.title: 1QBed •Newtown •Parking •City Views

fields.summary: Private 2 Bedroom apartment above private residence in quite suburb. Private Side Entry to upstairs apartment (Please note there is a flight of stairs) - a home away from home. About a 10/15 mins trip to the city by car or train from Arncliffe train station. (There is a commuter carpark at Arncliffe station - parking restrictions are enforced around the train stations). Close to Sydney Airport - International and Domestic terminals. A taxi is the easiest way to get to the apartment.
fields.description: Private 2 Bedroom apartment above private residence in quite suburb. Private Side Entry to upstairs apartment (Please note there is a flight of stairs) - a home away from home. About a 10/15 mins trip to the city by car or train from Arncliffe train station. (There is a commuter carpark at Arncliffe station - parking restrictions are enforced around the train stations). Close to Sydney Airport - International and Domestic terminals. A taxi is the easiest way to get to the apartment. Suitable for professionals, business people, couples, group of friends or any visitors to Sydney. Great for expats transitioning back into Sydney. Please Note: the apartment is not suitable for children (teenagers and above are ok), so please don't ask. Private 2 Bedroom apartment (Fully Furnished) above private residence in quiet suburb. Private side entry to upstairs. (there is a flight of stairs) Close to Sydney Airport - International and Domestic terminals. (Easiest way to the apartment is via taxi) Ab
fields.notes: We have a stack of restaurant menu's (Some do home delivery), there is a corner store about 10 meter from the apartment, a IGA supermarket at Arncliffe near the train station and a Woolworths Supermarket and Dan Murphy's at Wolli Creek. Arncliffe and Wolli Creek are fast growing suburb with lost of new restaurant opening, take away shops and residential apartment appearing by the dozen.
fields.neighbourhood_overview: The neighbourhood is quiet, suburban street with a little traffic in the mornings and afternoons when people are going to and from work.  Parking is generally not a problem. It's a short walk to the station. There are several parks in the immediate area. A short drive away is Botany Bay which has beautiful quiet beaches, train trip to Cronulla beach, a train and bus to Bondi Beach or catch a ferry to Manly.  We have a corner store a few building down and a Woolworths Supermarket with liquor store (Dan Murphy's) at Wolli Creek. Rochdale Plaza is also a short drive away.  There are a variety of Petrol/Service stations near by, we can provide directions. Lots of restaurants are also available in the local area and many do home delivery. (We have plenty of menu's in the apartment to choose from and many have home delivery services).
fields.transit: There is public transport. The closest railway (Train) station is Arncliffe Station. All public transport use Opal cards for payment. Arncliffe Paper shop/New Agency can provide Opal cards upon purchase of transport credit. One stop is a interchange station (Wolli Creek Station) which goes out to the airport (International & Domestic), the City and Bondi Junction, West towards Bankstown and South to Cronulla and Waterfall/Wollongong. The are also various buses from Arncliffe to places like Burwood, Earlwood, Rockdale to name a few. Happy to provide guidance.   If you have a car or hire one there is street parking available.  From the airport a taxi (Cab) or rental car are the easiest options.
fields.title: 2 Bedroom Apt - Close to the City

fields.description: Breakers Bay is a spacious 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom waterfront apartment and like its sister apartment Breakers Bay, enjoys uninterupted views of Homebush Bay with the use of a beach lagoon pool, heated pool, a fully equipped gym and sauna. Stylishly furnished and appointed, the features include combined living/dining and kitchen area offering tranquil water views across the bay, overlooking historic shipwrecks.  Features include 50 inch LCD TV, Foxtel, iPad docking station, DVD player, stereo-radio, reverse cycle air-conditioning in all rooms (x4), a secure parking space for 2 cars, extra storage space and internal laundry with dryer. The extra large private terrace, complete with an outdoor setting and BBQ is the perfect place to watch the sunset. Located approximately 20 minutes to Sydney CBD and Darling Harbour and only 10 minutes walk to Fast Cat ferry terminal. Located opposite the archery area of olympic Park and within walking distance (10 to 15 mins) to the main entrance of Olymp
fields.title: Breakers Bay, fantastic Bay view!

fields.summary: • Bright, peaceful and charming Art Deco top-floor apartment • 10-min walk to Clovelly and Coogee Beach, or the spectacular coastal walk to Bondi • 20-min bus to the city • Perfect for couples or single people who enjoy beach and/ or city life
fields.description: • Bright, peaceful and charming Art Deco top-floor apartment • 10-min walk to Clovelly and Coogee Beach, or the spectacular coastal walk to Bondi • 20-min bus to the city • Perfect for couples or single people who enjoy beach and/ or city life Art Deco, fully furnished top-floor apartment in a small and peaceful block with lots of character and charm. Just minutes away from great local cafes and a 10-minute walk to either Clovelly Beach, Coogee Beach, Gordon's Bay or the spectacular coastal walk to Bondi Beach. If you jump on the bus just up the road you can be in the city centre in 20 minutes. You'll find some of the best snorkelling in Sydney down at Clovelly Beach directly across from the Surf Club. WiFi and access to Hulu through Apple TV is also included. The apartment is all yours except for our bedroom. There's a 27" iMac for you to use, a 50" Panasonic plasma television with the new Apple TV and access to Hulu and other apps. The double bed is a new and firm pocket-spring mattr
fields.notes: Parking is available on both sides of our street. There is an oil-radiator heater in the room for winter and a fan for summer. It always cools down at night in the summer being near the sea.
fields.neighbourhood_overview: Clovelly is one of Sydney's best kept secrets. It's a wonderful beach-side suburb that lies between Bronte and Coogee Beach, yet it's close to the city centre too. You'll find fantastic cafes, great food and some of the best snorkelling in Sydney down at Clovelly Beach or Gordon's Bay.
fields.transit: There are two frequent buses you can take from bus stops one-minute up the road from our apartment on Clovelly Road -- one that goes into downtown Sydney in 20 min (338/339) and the other that goes to Bondi Junction in 10 min (353). To get to the airport from our place, the best deal is to book a shuttle bus with Eastern Suburbs Airport Shuttle. It's $20 each to the domestic or international terminal. Allow 30 minutes for the trip. They can pick you up about 10 past the hour from 5AM to 6PM, 7 days a week. (URL HIDDEN)
fields.title: Clovelly Beach Art Deco apartment

Decorated high spec in neutral minimalist style. 2 Large king bedrooms both with ensuite bathrooms. 1 minutes walk to shops, cafes, restaurants & buses to beaches & city. 15 min stroll to maroubra beach. Pool, gym, hot tub in complex. Super quiet at night.

Open Flowing Lounge and Kitchen area leading onto spaciou

fields.summary: This grand Georgian terrace juxtaposes original historical features with a 1970s neo classical makeover.  Offers charming and eclectic antique surroundings for a unique home away from home stay. Conveniently located near Paddington's finest restaurants + bars.  Driveway parking + backyard pool, a rarity. Minutes walk from buzzing Oxford St or Centennial Park. Bus rides to city + Bondi Beach. Available for Photo+Film Shoots, see The Paddington Estate on insta for portfolio. Longer stays welcome!!
fields.description: This grand Georgian terrace juxtaposes original historical features with a 1970s neo classical makeover.  Offers charming and eclectic antique surroundings for a unique home away from home stay. Conveniently located near Paddington's finest restaurants + bars.  Driveway parking + backyard pool, a rarity. Minutes walk from buzzing Oxford St or Centennial Park. Bus rides to city + Bondi Beach. Available for Photo+Film Shoots, see The Paddington Estate on insta for portfolio. Longer stays welcome!! This home features sandstone fireplaces, bar, gracious kitchen, swimming pool, high ceilings, marble bathroom (including bath) and spacious bedrooms. If you enjoy a vintage style, antiques and a creative environment, this place is for you. This home is special in that it is relatively larger than most Paddington terraces. It is a timeless old-world haven complete with outdoor pool, a rare feature in Paddington. The room comfortably fits two people.  The home is also available for a whole house
fields.notes: We have an 8 month year old baby and for some nights an 11 year old - both adorable!
fields.neighbourhood_overview: You will experience the essence of Paddington lifestyle - central to an abundance of cafes, restaurants, art galleries, pubs, parks, boutique shopping and Paddington markets. We are walking distance to Five Ways village, Centennial Park and Woollahra. By bus, we are minutes to Bondi Beach and the city centre. Paddington boasts a number of stylish pubs and wine bars including The London Tavern and The Grand National Hotel, both a stone throw away. Your stay could not get more central and special than this.
fields.transit: On Oxford street, a 5 minute walk from our home are buses that take you to the city or the beaches. When arriving, the destination is: William Street, Paddington Bus Stop / Paddington  Inn Hotel (then 5 minute walk) Buses on Oxford Street include:   380 (from city to Bondi Beach via Paddington)  333 (express service as above -limited stops) 352 (to Redfern, Newtown and Marrickville) M40 (from city to Bondi via Paddington) 440 (from Central station to Bronte Beach via Paddington and Bondi Junction) From airport: Catch taxi (between $40 -$50)  OR  Catch train to -   1. Central station, then  catch 440 bus to Paddington (see above information on 'destination') 2. Museum Station catch 380 or 440 to Paddington (William street stop) We are very well located!! Many of our guests walk into the city via Oxford Street.
fields.title: A unique stay in Paddington!

fields.summary: Surrounded by trees, this light, airy apartment in a heritage listed building set back from the road, has a charming holiday feel. A couple of minutes stroll to the beach, restaurants, bars, shops, coastal walks and public transport this compact apartment is perfect for your holiday needs. Combined lounge / dining room. The large, main bedroom is surrounded by trees. New kitchen and older style bathroom with bath. The apartment includes full kitchen, washing machine, dryer, wi-fi, HD TV, Foxtel, dvd player, Bosé iPod docking station.  This is a residential block so please be considerate of the neighbours. No parties etc. Please contact with any questions. It's Bondi!!! It's beaches, bars restaurants and all summer it's buzzing with people from all over the globe. Minutes to the beach, shops and restaurants or if you wish to explore elsewhere you're very close to busses to just about everywhere.

fields.description: We offer one bedroom with a queen size bed, wardrobe, and bathroom. Off the bedroom there is an extensive covered verandah. You have your own jug and toaster and we provide tea/coffee/bread/butter/jam/biscuits/fruit. These are situated on the balcony for you to have at your leisure. You also have your own small 50lt refridgerator on the balcony. I am very flexible with check in and check out times, you’ll have your own key for your own entrance and be able to come and go as you please.  You’ll share our home with my husband and myself. We have provided a TV in your room and radio. Smoking is not permitted in the house; we have a backyard downstairs. Wireless internet is provided free.  Washer is also available.  Please note we require a deposit of $50 for the key if lost during the stay and a payment of AUD $25 per stay for cleaning and AUD $15 per 5 days for linen change if requested. Stay in one of Sydney characteristics Victorian Terrace houses, in the heart of Balmain, one of Sydne

fields.summary: Sydney-central-location in fashionable Pyrmont with Australian host. Walk to city, Darling Harbour, Star Casino. Great pubs, cafes, restaurants. Water views from lounge room balcony of Anzac Bridge & bay.  Direct Bus to Bondi Beach. Bike shares from $1.99. Public transport door-to-door from Sydney Airport: Train + Light Rail.  I LOVE hosting FOREIGNERS, so feel free to book my room.  You can sample that strange Aussie food, Vegemite, but it's not compulsory. I have jam and peanut butter too!
fields.description: Sydney-central-location in fashionable Pyrmont with Australian host. Walk to city, Darling Harbour, Star Casino. Great pubs, cafes, restaurants. Water views from lounge room balcony of Anzac Bridge & bay.  Direct Bus to Bondi Beach. Bike shares from $1.99. Public transport door-to-door from Sydney Airport: Train + Light Rail.  I LOVE hosting FOREIGNERS, so feel free to book my room.  You can sample that strange Aussie food, Vegemite, but it's not compulsory. I have jam and peanut butter too! Large bedroom with double bed, built in wardrobe, fully-equipped kitchen & internal laundry. Desk available if required. Share bathroom (with occupant of other Airbnb room: 0, 1 or 2 people. On the days the other room isn't booked you will have the main bathroom to yourself). Building has indoor swimming pool, gym & sauna. Views of Sydney city and Anzac Bridge. Walk to Sydney Fish Markets, CBD, Casino & other attractions. 15 min walk to city. Located on 11th floor of a 12 story modern apartment blo
fields.notes: Please note, although there are fans and heaters in the apartment it is not air-conditioned. But there is a refreshing pool in the building open from 6am to 10pm each day where you can cool off on a hot summer's day. Access to Netflix subscription to watch on your laptop or tablet in your bedroom, but not available on TV.  Bathroom is shared so please be considerate of this and not spend excessive time in there. IF THE DATES YOU WANT AREN’T AVAILABLE ON THE CALENDAR, CHECK OUT MY OTHER LISTING: “Room With a View: Location+Pool+Gym”  which is in the same apartment. Everything is the same.
fields.neighbourhood_overview: Pyrmont is a safe and friendly neighbourhood; a great combination of restored historical buildings and modern apartments.  Right next to the water, Blackwattle Bay, near Jacksons Landing and just a short walk around the foreshore from there to see Sydney Harbour Bridge.  Pyrmont is a vibrant, fairly recently populated part of Sydney and just a 15-minute-walk to the city (CBD). The area is dotted with restored heritage buildings mixed with modern apartments and town houses. Historically when Pyrmont was settled by the English it was originally a working dockyard for the early wool trade, over 100 years ago, and only about 20 or so years ago did developers realise its potential for residential buildings with water views all around and close proximity to the city.
fields.transit: You can catch public transport all the way from Sydney Airport. Catch train to Central station then change to Light Rail (also referred to as the Tram) from Central to Wentworth Park stop, then just 2-3 minutes walk to my apartment.  Light Rail (tram) also goes to the Sydney Casino, Paddy's Markets, Sydney city in one direction and Glebe, Leichhardt and Dulwich Hill in opposite direction. Buses go all over Sydney. Walking distance to City, cinemas, stores etc. Catch 389 bus from Harris Street Pyrmont to North Bondi.

The neighbourhood is very clean, safe & quiet. We are surrounded by parks and beautif

We are surrounded by parks and beautiful walking tracks along the foreshore / Parramatta River. Sydney Olympic Park is only a 10 min drive. Cabarita Wharf: 3min drive Cafes, restaurants and shopping strip: 10 min walk, 2 min drive. fields.description: Our house is a 3 bedroom house. We live in our house so you will be sharing our home with us. It is a Federation style house with a lovely backyard, and the front of the house faces a park. We have one bedroom with a double bed available for you to stay in. You will share the bathroom with only your host ie there is only one double bedroom available for Airbnb guests.  I will be able to provide breakfast and  you will be able to use the kitchen for cooking your meals etc. We would also share the other parts of the house ie bathroom, toilet, dining area, lounge etc.  The neighbourhood is quiet, with lots of park area for walks, bike riding etc. Shops are close by, as are restaurants and cafe's.  We are about 8km from the centre of Sydney with good public transport nearby. Beaches are about half an hour away by car but it will take longer by public transport. We do have a small dog, Piet, a toy poodle. We don't allow smoking inside the house. You will be able to access your own bedroom w
fields.transit: We have the Light Rail a 2-4 minutes walk away which will take you to the Fish Markets, Darling Harbour and to Central Station. There is a bus stop about 300 metres away to take you into the city and Circular quay, and a railway station about 15 minutes walk which will also take you to the city and to Circular Quay, Opera House, Harbour Bridge etc.

fields.summary: This 1 bedroom apartment is located just 2km, a 5 min drive or a 20 minute walk from the iconic manly beach and has easy access to public transport that will take guests to Manly, the City or the northern beaches.
fields.description: This 1 bedroom apartment is located just 2km, a 5 min drive or a 20 minute walk from the iconic manly beach and has easy access to public transport that will take guests to Manly, the City or the northern beaches. This recently renovated 1 bedroom apartment enjoys all day sun, has a large open living space, on site parking and a great location for those wishing to enjoy all that the northern beaches have to offer. Guests will have access to undercover parking, a shared laundry and 2 bicycles to get around the local area.  Manly beach is a short 5 minute bicycle ride from the apartment. Guests will have the apartment all to themselves for the duration of their stay. Nestled in the beautiful northern beaches suburb of Balgowlah just a short walk from the famous Manly beach, great shopping and beautiful cafes.   Start the day with breakfast on the balcony followed by a walk or ride down to manly to enjoy the beach or why not catch the ferry across Sydney harbour to the city to soak up the
fields.notes: This apartment is in a great location to enjoy the famous Manly beach as well as the city centre.  The apartment is a short 5 minute bicycle ride from the Manly ferry terminal which operates Sydney ferry trips to circular quay and the opera house every day of the week.
fields.neighbourhood_overview: Nestled in the beautiful northern beaches suburb of Balgowlah just a short walk from the famous Manly beach, great shopping and beautiful cafes.   Start the day with breakfast on the balcony followed by a walk or ride down to manly to enjoy the beach or why not catch the ferry across Sydney harbour to the city to soak up the sites.
fields.transit: Close to public transport (100m walk to multiple bus stops) getting around town is a breeze from this great location.  Choose from numerous bus services or walk down to manly wharf and catch one of the famous sydney ferries to circular quay and the opera house.

fields.summary: Self-contained pleasant well equipped 2 level apartment with 3 bedrooms, 2 bath (one ensuite), kitchen, lounge and deck overlooking garden. The apartment is well maintained in a beautifully leafy street in Roseville some 20 min train to Sydney city.

The apartment is well maintained in a beautifully leafy street in Roseville some 20 min train to Sydney city. Self-contained, pleasant, well equipped two level house with 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms (one ensuite), self contained kitchen, lounge and deck overlooking garden. The apartment is well maintained and up-to-date but should not be regarded as luxury accommodation. While self contained with its own entrance, it is part of a dual-occupancy property so neighbours are next door. Would suit couple, friends or small family. Enquire about renting a single room and ensuite. Maximum 4 people. Situated in a quiet residential area of east Roseville in Sydney's north shore, with tree lined streets yet minutes to railway station and busy retail and entertainment suburb of Chatswood.  Sydney city only 25 minutes away by train or by car. Roseville is a pleasan
fields.neighbourhood_overview: Beautiful tree lined streets in quiet neighbourhood yet walking distance to bustling Chatswood with its huge range of shops & restaurants and only a 25 minutes trip to Sydney's central business district or nearby beaches/national parks. North Sydney 15 minutes; Manly 20 minutes; airport 30 minutes.
fields.transit: Very close to train station (5 minutes walk) and buses to many places. Street parking if car preferred.

No wifi, no air con, no dishwasher, no foxtel, no internal laundry. NOTE: OVER XMAS AND NEW YEARS 2015 I AM LOOKING FOR SOMEONE FOR TWO WEEKS MINIMUM - THANKS! On the fourth floor of a renowned Harry Seidler building, my apartment is a cozy, sundrenched space ideal for a loner or a couple. 1 recently re-carpeted bedroom with heaps of clothes storage and comfy double bed + reading lamp. Classic bathroom w bath. Basic kitchen w stovetop, convection oven + smeg fridge. Balcony. Car space. White walls, white wooden floors, rustic timber furniture. Chalkboards for you creatives. Amazing leather couch. Laundry in building (coin op). TV and DVDs. Books and magazines. Stylish crockery + pots + pans. Kettle, toaster, shampoo, soap, hand wash, toothpaste, coffee + tea. ARCHITECTURAL NOTE: Harry Seidler is Australia's most

fields.neighbourhood_overview: I wouldn't live any where else in Sydney. This is the suburb that real estate agents live in. Close to several bays, parks, tennis courts, shopping, delis, bakeries, butcheries, bars. And coffee shops everywhere. Its hard to remain loyal to one barista. Trendy restaurants and cafes galore. Great area for a foody. Very dog friendly neighborhood.
fields.transit: Bus and train 5 mins walk up the corner. Train from Kings Cross goes directly to Bondi in 10 mins. Potts point is a 2 min walk. 15 min walk Paddington, Surry Hills, Darlinghurst, CBD (museums, shopping etc), Woollomooloo wharf for Sydney's best fine dining, 20 min walk to NSW Art Gallery and the domain. The area is also swarming with cabs so you can always get around. You cannot beat this location.

fields.summary: The UrbanOasis Studio offers the best of all worlds: it is on the doorstep of the shops, bars, cafes, restaurants and institutions of the city, yet also has the home comfort of having your own fully equipped kitchen.
fields.description: The UrbanOasis Studio offers the best of all worlds: it is on the doorstep of the shops, bars, cafes, restaurants and institutions of the city, yet also has the home comfort of having your own fully equipped kitchen. It is a short stroll to Chinatown, the Capitol Theatre, Central Station, Paddy's Markets, ABC Studios, the Powerhouse Museum, University of Technology and Sydney University. Walk out and up George St all the way up to Circular Quay.  The studio has a double bed (towels and linen supplied), a fully equipped galley kitchen and bathroom with shower. The complex has laundry facilities, and a rooftop courtyard with 360 degree views of Sydney. It has everything that you could desire for an enjoyable stay as well as a retreat from the city. Ideal for 2 people. Maximum 3 people.  $140 per night for a minimum of 7 nights for up to 2 people.  $25 per night for a 3rd person.  The studio itself has a:  - a double bed  - fully equipped kitchen  - bathroom with shower  - leather sofa th
fields.title: UrbanOasis Studio in heart of city

fields.summary: Make yourself at home in my stylish, quiet, sunny flat, 2 minutes walk from beautiful Maroubra beach and local cafes. Amazing light-filled space with lots of detailed comforts. Buses at your door, elevator, intercom, and only 11km from the CBD, and 6km from Sydney Airport.
fields.description: Make yourself at home in my stylish, quiet, sunny flat, 2 minutes walk from beautiful Maroubra beach and local cafes. Amazing light-filled space with lots of detailed comforts. Buses at your door, elevator, intercom, and only 11km from the CBD, and 6km from Sydney Airport. You're going to love my apartment.  For a start, when you arrive you'll be thrilled with the location. Its literally two-minutes walk to the sand, and less to the corner cafe. You can hear the rolling surf when you're lying in bed! Maroubra itself is a fantastic, sleepy urban beach resort, known for its great beach, passionate surfing community and laid-back attitude.  My apartment has a spacious dining room with window-seat; comfortable lounge with large screen TV, DVD and Apple TV, kitchen with dishwasher, sunny bedroom with king-size bed and views into tree-tops, and bathroom. Small balcony with BBQ, loads of air, light and bird-song. Wi-fi available.  My city getaway pad reflects me as an individual. Relaxed, wel
fields.notes: This is my home, so please enjoy it! But please respect it, and leave it the way you found it. Thanks so much.
fields.neighbourhood_overview: Regardless of the time of year, Maroubra beach is the focus for locals: whatever the weather, or season, you'll find them walking along the promenade, or having a dip in the ocean. In the evenings, the great local pub and restaurants come alive.   Less that 5 minutes walk away is the spectacular Mahon's tidal pool, if you're keen on doing some laps.  You'll be spoiled for alternative beach options, if you're after a change of scenery: Malabar, la Perouse, Coogee and Clovelly Beaches are all close by.
fields.transit: The 396, 397 and 399 buses stop less than 3 minutes walk away, and whisk you to the City in less than 30 minutes.  Great when planning a visit to the Opera House, Domain, Darling Harbour or shopping district. Similarly the 317 and 353 buses take you to Bondi Junction, and access to the underground and train network - as well as being a stone's throw from the iconic Bondi Beach.
fields.title: Sunny Sydney Beach-side oasis

fields.summary: Light and airy one bedroom apartment in the heart of Manly, overlooking the harbour with great skyline views. This property is quiet and secluded with a peaceful top floor position, yet close to the hub making it the perfect escape.
fields.description: Light and airy one bedroom apartment in the heart of Manly, overlooking the harbour with great skyline views. This property is quiet and secluded with a peaceful top floor position, yet close to the hub making it the perfect escape.  Best features? Guests love that it's minutes away from the beach and harbour (literally at either end of the street) and close to cafes, restaurants and local markets. It's clean, fresh, private and secure. It's not for everyone though - there are lots of steps into the apartment to reach that great view! The apartment is well equipped and provides a homely stay for your holiday in Manly.  It has one bedroom with a queen-size bed, bathroom, fully equipped kitchen and separate living & dining areas both with water views. There is an internal laundry and TV and wifi are available.  Take the coastal walk from Manly to the Spit Bridge or to neighbouring Freshwater and Curl Curl beaches. Chill out and enjoy beach-side living. Surfing, kayaking, stand-up paddlin
fields.notes: **I am looking for guests to stay a minimum of 3 nights during the Christmas holidays**
fields.transit: Easy access to public transport is available. Ferries are located just 5 mins from the apartment. Catch a ferry to the city or across to Watson's Bay in East Sydney. Taxis and buses are also close by and hire cars including GoGet & PopCar are available in the residence street.
fields.title: Manly apartment with water views

fields.summary: Very modern & clean, perfectly located in an eclectic vibrant inner city neighbourhood with village charm.   On the main street just moments away, is lined with great cafes, bars, shops, restaurants and the bustling markets. With easy access to buses, trains & light rail. Making it easy to explore this exciting city and a great spot to be during your trip to Sydney!
fields.description: Very modern & clean, perfectly located in an eclectic vibrant inner city neighbourhood with village charm.   On the main street just moments away, is lined with great cafes, bars, shops, restaurants and the bustling markets. With easy access to buses, trains & light rail. Making it easy to explore this exciting city and a great spot to be during your trip to Sydney! This townhouse is a delight to live in, newly renovated and clean. The bedrooms are fully furnished with queen-sized beds, built-in wardrobes, one with own balcony which has a lovely outdoor table & chair setting to sit out and watch the world go by. The townhouse is fully furnished, toilet and shower/bath, a large courtyard (with outdoor furniture), internal laundry & security parking on request. There is also a kitchen with electric stove and appliances that is free for all guests to use. In the living/dining room there is a TV with DVD player and a bluetooth speaker. Non-smokers only. Whole house.  NOTE: You must confirm
fields.neighbourhood_overview: Perfect location! Experience the Sydney village lifestyle! Glebe is very well known for having great cafes and a fantastic laid back vibe.  Short walking distance to Sydney Uni, Broadway Shopping Centre (Hoyts Cinema), Glebe Point Road shops and restaurants and great markets on a Saturday, Newtown and Glebe Foreshore parks and Victoria Park outdoor pool. Also a nice stroll down to Blackwattle Bay & the well known Sydney Fish Markets.
fields.transit: Moments to bus stops & light rail station.  Direct bus service (5-20 minute bus ride) to: Sydney CBD, China Town, Darling Harbour, Sydney Opera House, The Rocks, Central Station, Newtown and Coogee Beach. Security lock up garage car space available at an additional cost, please ensure to mention your parking requirements at time of booking.
fields.title: Gorgeous 2 bed Townhouse in Glebe

A little about my palace...... Beach  Apartment - Only moments to water's edge and beach. A 6 minute walk! Situated in the best street in Cronulla offering a tranquil and leafy outlook, lots of trees, birds and a cool coastal breeze. .   Just a short stroll to central Cronulla, marina and beautiful beaches,Cafes and water front restaurants, Cinema Theatre, Boutiques, parks,nightclubs  and community living.
