fields.summary: My warm, comfortable two bedroom apartment lies in a small luxurious block of units,opposite Cronulla Beach.The spare bedroom has TV, Wi Fi & sole access to the main bathroom with shower and spa bath. Walk to restaurants, cafes, shops  train & buses.
fields.description: My warm, comfortable two bedroom apartment lies in a small luxurious block of units,opposite Cronulla Beach.The spare bedroom has TV, Wi Fi & sole access to the main bathroom with shower and spa bath. Walk to restaurants, cafes, shops  train & buses. My apartment is opposite the beach and 100 metres from the nearest cafes and restaurants. It is air-conditioned throughout and comfortably fits 2 (website hidden) is a quiet, security building and is not suitable for people wishing to party. Guests have access to the main bathroom, the balcony and the lounge , dining area. They also have shared access to the kitchen. I can help with your itinerary and will probably be present during your stay. Should you need any help during your stay, I will try to accommodate you. I love being so close to nature. Sometimes I see pods of dolphins playing in the ocean. I love being able to walk for miles along the beach, stopping occasionally to check  the fishermen's catch. It is wonderful to have the sho
fields.notes: There is a ferry to Bundeena which is on the edge of the Royal National Park.
fields.neighbourhood_overview: I love being so close to nature. Sometimes I see pods of dolphins playing in the ocean. I love being able to walk for miles along the beach, stopping occasionally to check  the fishermen's catch. It is wonderful to have the shops nearby. Hungry? Take your pick of restaurants within 5 minutes walk.
fields.transit: Trains are 15 minutes away. Buses are 5 minutes. Cycleways are abundant. Parking is either at the front or the back of the apartment. There are trains or taxis from the airport. Should you have a problem just phone me.
fields.title: LUXURY BEACHFRONT APARTMENT

fields.summary: A beautiful open plan semi detached house in gorgeous clovelly / randwick. Walk to heaps of great cafes and the beach. Bus at the end of the street straight to the city or down to centennial park. Perfect for a family or professionals.
fields.description: A beautiful open plan semi detached house in gorgeous clovelly / randwick. Walk to heaps of great cafes and the beach. Bus at the end of the street straight to the city or down to centennial park. Perfect for a family or professionals. Our beautiful light filled house is an ease to live in. Its location, space and indoor/outdoor living style are all beautifully designed and recently renovated.  Downstairs are two bedrooms, one currently with a single bed and baby crib the other with a queen size bed. Upstairs is a large open plan office space, a large freshly renovated bathroom and master bedroom with queen bed.  We have amazing cable internet from telstra as well as apple TV on our 3D television. There's a front and backyard which are perfect for indoor/outdoor living and dining. The street is beautifully quiet but just a couple of blocks to the bus to the city and cafes. Clovelly Beach is 15 mins walk away from where you can do a walk along the coast to all the other beaches ( Coogee
fields.neighbourhood_overview: On a very family oriented street we are close to the beach, and an easy bike ride or bus to the city and surry hills. Local cafes in every direction as well as parks.
fields.transit: Very accessible with bus 1 block away straight to the beach or city or bondi junction for trains or to any of the other beaches along the coast.
fields.title: Gorgeous Clovelly house

fields.summary: A beautiful quiet , contemporary studio set at the back of a private leafy garden with a wide verandah and great city views.Comfortable, artist inspired,  one room space with a separate bathroom,  less than 30 minutes from the  city, eastern beaches, parks and 10 min. walk to UNSW. Please  be aware that this is not a one bedroom flat. It is a studio space.
fields.description: A beautiful quiet , contemporary studio set at the back of a private leafy garden with a wide verandah and great city views.Comfortable, artist inspired,  one room space with a separate bathroom,  less than 30 minutes from the  city, eastern beaches, parks and 10 min. walk to UNSW. Please  be aware that this is not a one bedroom flat. It is a studio space. Built as an artist's studio, it has good light, high ceilings, sliding doors to a long wide verandah which looks out to a private lush garden and views of the district and city. There is a modern bathroom, as well as a food preparation area including a micro wave,toaster and bar fridge.( light meals only.) Tea, coffee and milk as well as a European breakfast including seasonal fruits, yogurt, cereals, jam and toast are provided.There is a comfortable queen bed  as well as a comfortable fold out single bed, dining table and four chairs. Ideal for two. Can sleep 3. This studio is almost in the heart of the city and so close to beaches
fields.notes: There is a secure  entrance gate which must be locked at all times and a sensor light which is activated by waving, then four steps as soon as the gate opens, take care at night or after heavy rain as the side passage can be slippery.
fields.neighbourhood_overview: Our neighbourhood Kensington is peaceful yet almost in the city centre, close to universities, beaches, Centennial Park and even the airport and you can get to almost any part of Sydney and out of Sydney easily. We are also walking distance to excellent restaurants in Surry Hills and walking distance to Fox Studio precinct for farmer's markets, movies and restaurants. Central to everything.
fields.transit: There are a multitude of buses down the street going to all parts of Sydney and its a 20 minutes walk to Greens Square rail station. You can park in the drive way if if there is no other parking available.
fields.title: Inner city, self- contained oasis.

fields.summary: Modern house with all mod cons less than 10 minutes to the city by bus and a short walk to cafes, restaurants and pubs plus shopping. We are located in a quiet friendly back street.
fields.description: Modern house with all mod cons less than 10 minutes to the city by bus and a short walk to cafes, restaurants and pubs plus shopping. We are located in a quiet friendly back street.  New to the market. A private room with a double bed in my newly renovated and completely refitted house, just 10 minutes by bus from the center of Sydney. Located in a quiet corner of the Balmain/Rozelle area, the house is just a short distance from the heart of Balmain and its famous cafes, markets, pubs, shops and restaurants. You are welcome to use the kitchen and living room facilities and the wireless internet connection. Victoria Road is also just a 3 minute walk away with frequent bus services to the city, Circular Quay and also west to adjoining suburbs.  This is a non smoking house however there is a small courtyard at the front for those who like to sneak one or two. As my house is always kept clean and tidy as we have a weekly cleaner (Sylvia) I would appreciate it if my guests followed suit, an
fields.neighbourhood_overview: Village type area with many restaurants, cafes and pubs although we are off the main street so it is a quiet house. Less than 10 mins by bus to Sydney city.
fields.transit: 2 minutes walk to buses and a 10 minute walk to ferries.
fields.title: ROOM IN  INNER  CITY MOD HOUSE, INC WEEKLY CLEANER

fields.summary: Coogee Beach House is a recently renovated contemporary residence in a very quiet, tree lined no through street. It is an 8 min walk to Coogee Beach or Gordon's Bay. Clovelly Beach is about a 15 min walk away and Bronte about 15 mins further. The location of this property is ideal for reaching all of these beaches as well as Bondi via the beautiful coastal walk.
fields.description: Coogee Beach House is a recently renovated contemporary residence in a very quiet, tree lined no through street. It is an 8 min walk to Coogee Beach or Gordon's Bay. Clovelly Beach is about a 15 min walk away and Bronte about 15 mins further. The location of this property is ideal for reaching all of these beaches as well as Bondi via the beautiful coastal walk. Coogee Beach House is a contemporary beach house in a tree lined cul de sac. A 5 minute walk to Coogee Beach, with Clovelly (15min walk), Bronte and Bondi beaches all wothin easy reach by car or bus.  The house has 3 bedrooms, 2 with queen beds and one with a double. An extra single mattress is available if required. There are 2 modern bathrooms and an extra toilet off the laundry. A deck off the kitchen dining area at the rear overlooks trees and the garden. The front courtyard captures the afternoon sun. The house is cool in Summer months due to canopy of trees surrounding it, and the Louvre windows provide sea breezes. In ad
fields.notes: Please be aware a $ 500 security deposit is required to be transferred into my bank account 5 days prior to arrival. This will be transferred back into your account within 7 days of departure.
fields.neighbourhood_overview: Coogee Beach house is in a quiet residential area with great access to both the beaches from Bondi to Coogee as well as the great restaurants, cafes and coastal walks all those suburbs have. In addition, Coogee is only 15 minutes from Surry Hills, Paddington and other great Eastern suburbs
fields.transit: If you have a car there is ample street parking and Coogee has great access to roads to most suburbs. There are bus routes both up the hill on Clovelly Rd and down the hill at Coogee Bay.
fields.title: Coogee Beach House

fields.summary: 84 Queen St has an eclectic countryside feel and features neutral sisal carpets, ceramic tiles, a stainless steel kitchen, warm walls throughout and an Italian marble bathroom. There is natural light throughout, including a skylight in the kitchen
fields.description: 84 Queen St has an eclectic countryside feel and features neutral sisal carpets, ceramic tiles, a stainless steel kitchen, warm walls throughout and an Italian marble bathroom. There is natural light throughout, including a skylight in the kitchen No84 is an executive serviced apartment with a fully equipped kitchen and laundry services. Located in the heart of Woollahra we are central to many cafes and some of Sydney's best known restaurants.   Should you tire of eating out the apartment is equipped with everything you need.   Relax and enjoy your meal on the full sized deck overlooking a leafy courtyard.   And if its BBQ you prefer feel free to cook away on the deck.     A sunroom can convert into a 2nd bedroom for those guests that just don't want to leave.      A full sized bath tub and separate shower are located in the nearly renovated marble bathroom.    Relax and enjoy the bath products supplied. A rare secured parking space is also included. For those that like their privacy N
fields.notes: Cenntenial park is walking distance away for your serenity moment - bike riding and horse rides available if you don't wish to sit at the cafe or take your own - and Bondi Junction for your shopping fix is a walk away.   Paddington Markets on the weekend is amazing. Cafe's abound.  Sydney Cricket Ground is a walk away.
fields.neighbourhood_overview: A village atmosphere with great cafés, restaurants and bars.  Galleries and beauty salons all in walking distance.  A fantastic book shop and lots of clothing boutiques.
fields.transit: Buses along the street to various locations. Close to CBD and lots of shopping in local area and westfields bondi junction close by.  Sydney's largest park a 5 minute walk.
fields.title: Executive Luxury design Apartment

fields.summary: Fantastic sun filled studio apartment in the heart of Bondi, 2 minutes to everything, plunge into the bondi lifestyle then come back and relax in the sunshine on the daybed.
fields.description: Fantastic sun filled studio apartment in the heart of Bondi, 2 minutes to everything, plunge into the bondi lifestyle then come back and relax in the sunshine on the daybed. Large and very light luxury studio apartment in the heart of bondi, 1 minute to main street (Hall st) and 4 minutes to beach.  Surrounded by great cafes, bars and restaurants.  The perfect location in which to experience the Bondi LIfestyle.  Walk the coastal path, take a swim and sauna at Icebergs pool, have a cold beer with fish and chips by the Beach at The Bucket List. Apartment is modern and incredibly light year round as on top floor with large North West facing balcony. In security building with elevator.  Great coffee shop downstairs. THIS IS A NON SMOKING APARTMENT, NO SMOKING INSIDE OR ON THE DECK. Relax on the daybed on the huge deck surrounded by mature fruit trees and greenery.  Or meditate in the spooky serenity of the egg chair.... Apartment comes with free wifi, TV, internal washing machine & dryer,
fields.notes: Check in is 2pm, Check out is 10am (late checkout by arrangement if no guests coming in that day) Keys will be in a key safe, code provided on accepted booking. If you are also travelling up to Byron Bay area, please check out our other listing, our beautiful country cottage in the Byron Hinterland near Mullumbimby... PARKING - there is no off street parking at apartment.  Outside is timed and paid, a few blocks away (anywhere north of Blair st) is untimed parking.  I advise parking in untimed areas. For Christmas and New Year I only take seven day bookings,  please contact for dates.
fields.neighbourhood_overview: Bondi has everything for a great holiday, world famous beach, great cafe's and restaurants on your doorstep and easy access to explore the rest of Sydney.  Go crazy or just chill out.
fields.transit: The 389 bus to Bondi Junction (for trains) stops outside and its a short walk (3 minutes) to Campbell Parade for buses to the city (333).
fields.title: Chic sun filled Bondi Penthouse

fields.summary: Thank you for looking at my listing! You probably liked the images and I am sure you will love the place as soon as you see it! The apartment is very sunny, lots of natural light during the day. I have two rooms for rent.  - 5 min away from the beach  - close proximity to public transport with the easy access to Sydney SBD, UNSW, Prince of Wales Hospital - Close proximity to supermarket, cinema and gym  - internal laundry - WiFi connection

Enjoy: - Carpet floors throughout the flat - Free Wi-Fi - Fully-stocked kitchen, including dishwasher and modern full bathroom with a bathtub - 48" HDTV and Blue Ray - Double bedroom: firm bed + anti allergic duvet and pillows (luxury!) - Walk Coogee Beach and Randwick: so many shops, restaurants, cinema, gym and a beautiful Coogee Beach! - Minutes to public transportation (buses to City, Circular Quay, Central Station, UNSW, Bondi Ju
fields.title: Fantastic Coogee Beach Location

fields.summary: Renovated, light and stylish self-contained studio, perfect for that out-of-town break. Just 1-2 minutes walk to pristine beaches, close to Royal National Park bush walks. Location is Neil St, very close to Gunyah beach (see photo for accurate indication).  Spacious and comfortable bed-living room (4x6m), kitchen and bathroom, shady deck with lush garden outlook.  Around one hour drive from Sydney, can also take ferry from Cronulla. 10% discount for stays of 4 nights or over.
fields.description: Renovated, light and stylish self-contained studio, perfect for that out-of-town break. Just 1-2 minutes walk to pristine beaches, close to Royal National Park bush walks. Location is Neil St, very close to Gunyah beach (see photo for accurate indication).  Spacious and comfortable bed-living room (4x6m), kitchen and bathroom, shady deck with lush garden outlook.  Around one hour drive from Sydney, can also take ferry from Cronulla. 10% discount for stays of 4 nights or over. Private and completely self-contained space, with queen bed, kitchen and shower room, ideal for a self-catering couple. Sorry - because of unfenced areas and wildlife it is not suitable for children or pets. Please note that there is a 2 night minimum stay, 3 night minimum on long weekends. Check costs by entering your intended dates, as seasonal rates apply. Guests have their own access through the garden. Studio facilities include TV/DVD, ipod dock, CD player/radio and basic wireless internet. There are books, C
fields.notes: Minimal kitchen supplies (eg tea/coffee/milk/sugar/condiments) are provided, please bring other supplies. The local IGA is a few minutes walk away (near the ferry wharf) and is open 8am to 8pm every day for groceries, fruit and veg and liquor.
fields.neighbourhood_overview: Bundeena is a unique village completely enclosed by national park and four beautiful beaches, yet still within the Sydney metropolitan area and only an hour away from city restaurants, galleries and concerts. In Bundeena you will find: - Unspoilt beaches, with the opportunity to swim, kayak, snorkel or go fishing. - Walking access to the famous Coast Walk (Wedding Cake Rock, Marley Beach, Wattamolla) and short drive to other Royal National Park bushwalks. - Cafes, restaurants: there are a few cafe options on most days, but not many options to eat out at night. At 'The Bowlo' there is a bistro with Asian/Australian meals. Driftwood Cafe also has evening dining on Wed-Sat evenings. The IGA is great for picnic/self-catering provisions, with fresh bread, hot chooks and a good selection of beer and wine in addition to all of the basics. (Note - RSL club currently closed for redevelopment) - Talented artists who open their studios to visitors for the Art Trail held on the first Sunday of eve
fields.transit: The drive to/from the city of Sydney is around 60-80 minutes depending on traffic. There is a ferry to/from Cronulla ever hour until 7pm in the summer, until 6pm in the winter. From Cronulla you can get a train to the city - total trip around 90-120 minutes depending on connections. If arriving from the airport, take the train to Cronulla and then ferry to Bundeena, but car is easier and quicker. Bundeena is easy to walk around, everything is within walking distance. Note - there is no bus service or taxi service. You can also do tours of Port Hacking by ferry. Search on 'cronulla ferries' for Ferry information.
fields.title: Bundeena Garden Studio near beaches

fields.description: My apartment is the entire floor of a corner building in the heart of Surry Hills referred to as the French Quarter, it has 4 mt high ceilings and windows on all sides giving it a light airy feel.  The open plan living space has a new architectually designed kitchen, dining, lounge and office space of gracious proportions with a Juliet balcony that overlooks a delicious community garden. The bedroom is spacious and opens onto a private roof terrace garden. The bathroom is generous and has a luxuriously deep bath. There is a separate fully equipped laundry. My apartment is decorated with an eclectic mix of designer furnishings and collected treasures to create a tranquil, luxurious sanctuary. The famous Bourke St bakery and Bill's Cafe are in the immediate vicinity as are Toko, Pizza Birra, Messina gelato and the delicious Crown St Organic Cafe.  It is a short walk to Oxford St , the city ,Paddington ,Centennial Park and Central Station. You won't find a better location in Surry Hills.
fields.neighbourhood_overview: Surry Hills has so many great restaurants , bars and cafes we are spoilt for choice. A few of my favourites are The Organic Bread Bar on South Dowling, the Dolphin on Crown St , Vacancia Pizza on Bourke, Toko Japanese on my corner and Messina Gelato is a must!  The' Hills ' has many parks and Centennial Park and Hyde Park are both 10 mins walk. Prince Alfred Park Pool is at the bottom of Devonshire St.
fields.transit: Central train station is a short walk down Devonshire St, and buses run along Crown St to the city and Bondi or from Taylor Square which is a short walk up Bourke St.  Surry Hills is very central to everything and easy for parking on the street.
fields.title: unique sanctuary surry hills

fields.summary: Family friendly, light filled, Victorian townhouse in the heart of Glebe, very close to light rail stop. Freshly renovated with a large sit-in kitchen and an outdoor bath, it will be the perfect base for your family to explore Sydney.
fields.description: Family friendly, light filled, Victorian townhouse in the heart of Glebe, very close to light rail stop. Freshly renovated with a large sit-in kitchen and an outdoor bath, it will be the perfect base for your family to explore Sydney. Our 1860s town house is located in the heart of Glebe. When we are not travelling we live here with our two boys aged 4 and 7.  It would be an ideal base for any family with kids who wants to live next to a playground and Glebe light rail stop. We have recently renovated and extended our house. We put in a brand new kitchen, built a deck for you to chill on and added two bedrooms plus a bathroom with a glass roof - we love it. There are now three bedrooms, one with a bunk bed.  The kitchen is equipped with everything you do or don't need to cook up the perfect dinner (don't forget to eat out, though - there is so much around). It opens up to the courtyard and it has an extendable dining table that seats 8 and a breakfast bar that seats 4. There is a 6 sea
fields.notes: We have two cats who love kids.  They will be around during your stay and need to be fed dry food. The house has all hardwood floors and there is definitely no cat hair or cat smell around - we don’t like that in other people’s houses either. They mostly stay outside and are not allowed on the beds.  We strongly prefer family bookings and we hope to make Sydney accessible for you by offering our private house while we are away. Please respect our house as you would your own.
fields.neighbourhood_overview: We are in the heart of Glebe, a stone throw to Glebe Point Road cafes and dining, and walking distance to Darling Harbour.  Glebe Foreshore and Sydney Fish Markets are just down the road. Glebe is a lovely, vibrant, multicultural suburb that is close to everything and don't know where else we'd rather live.
fields.transit: 100 m to the light rail (Pyrmont/Darling Harbour) and 150 m to bus lines that take you to the City and to Newtown/Inner South/Coogee Beach.
fields.title: Family-Friendly Victorian Townhouse

fields.summary: This one bedroom apartment is bright and airy with unique views of the Sydney Harbour Bridge, Sydney Harbour and surrounding North Sydney and Kirribilli. One Queen Bed + Sofa Bed, wifi, balcony, undercover parking, 5 minutes to Ferry wharf, 7 minutes to Milsons Point train station, 2 minutes to bus.
fields.description: This one bedroom apartment is bright and airy with unique views of the Sydney Harbour Bridge, Sydney Harbour and surrounding North Sydney and Kirribilli. One Queen Bed + Sofa Bed, wifi, balcony, undercover parking, 5 minutes to Ferry wharf, 7 minutes to Milsons Point train station, 2 minutes to bus. This apartment is quiet, neat and compact, with a newly renovated kitchen and bathroom and a great balcony for entertaining or just taking in the view. There is also a common grassed area just beneath the apartment with views of the Harbour Bridge as well which is excellent for picnics.  The apartment has a Queen Bed in the bedroom but also a Double Sofa Bed which would be fine for occasional guests or perhaps a child, though the apartment is ideal for 1-2 adults. There is a flat screen TV, DVD player, fully equipped kitchen, table and chairs (in the main room, plus an outdoor table and chairs on the balcony) ceiling fans, heaters and wireless internet access, as well as a common coin opera
fields.notes: There will be breakfast provisions in the apartment for you upon your arrival, as well as instructions for the apartment and a guide of things to do/places to eat nearby/in Sydney. Obviously all linen, kitchen items, iron/ironing board and whatever else you need for your stay are provided - just make sure to let us know if you will require the sofa bed so we have all the linen ready. There are a number of unique artworks decorating the apartment of harbour scenes from the surrounding area by a local artist which are for sale - if you’re interested, let us know!
fields.neighbourhood_overview: This is unique part of Sydney to stay in - quiet and safe but with plenty to do, right by the Harbour and within minutes of the CBD. I lived in the apartment for four years, and I absolutely loved waking up to a beautiful Sydney sunrise and the Harbour Bridge, and then watching the sparkling harbour from the comfort of the couch.  There are a number of beautiful harbourside parks nearby with excellent views, and Kirribilli Village is just a 7 minute walk away. Here you will find a number of excellent restaurants, cafes, bars and shops (including an excellent boutique Choclatier), as well as the wonderful Kirribilli Markets (on every second weekend), Luna Park, and award winning restaurants such as Garfish (excellent seafood), The Botanist (great cocktails), Batch (fantastic burgers), Street Market (great Asian Tapas style restaurant) Cool Mac (great Japanese fusion cafe) and Ripples Milsons Point - perfect for a casual meal under the Harbour Bridge. There are a number of great cafes wi
fields.transit: You can get to the city by ferry, bus or train: North Sydney Ferry Wharf - 400 metres Milsons Point Train Station - 650 metres Bus to CBD (direct to York St, no stops) - 280 metres The Ferry Trip to Circular Quay from North Sydney Wharf is stunning - a 15 minute trip over and a 10 minute trip back. From Milsons Point Train Station (7 minute walk), you are one station (a 4 minute train ride across the bridge) from Wynyard Station, Town Hall (8 minutes) or Central (12 minutes).  From Kirribilli/Milsons Point you can also access the public stairs to walk across the Harbour Bridge to The Rocks. The trip to and from Sydney Airport by Train takes 30 minutes, or a Taxi is roughly 15 minutes.
fields.title: Harbourside Apartment - Water Views

fields.neighbourhood_overview: Potts point  is an inner city gem.  Neighbours are friendly, cafes are awesome, filled with helpful smiley staff. Stroll thru potts point down to Elizabeth bay to lovey Bear Park, or thru past the tennis courts to Rushcutters bay park and the marina.  Weekend markets full of organic produce, quirky street shopping & did I mention how great the coffee is?! A five min stroll to the Kings cross station can see you in the CBD in 5 min (one stop) or two stops to Bondi Junction.

Local cafes for coffee or restaurants for a meal start 10 minutes walk away.

fields.summary: Brilliant, huge, sunny apartment at the beach!  Balcony for outdoor dining with a table that seats 8 people and a Weber gas bbq out there as well.  Easy living! Two big bedrooms with built ins and a vast living/dining area plus a nice workspace. Plenty of heating, great big living areas and well equipped kitchen, huge TVs, quality fittings and fixtures, built in wardrobes, overhead fans and gorgeous bedlinen.   All the delights of Sydney beckon. This is an apartment as big as a small house!
fields.description: Brilliant, huge, sunny apartment at the beach!  Balcony for outdoor dining with a table that seats 8 people and a Weber gas bbq out there as well.  Easy living! Two big bedrooms with built ins and a vast living/dining area plus a nice workspace. Plenty of heating, great big living areas and well equipped kitchen, huge TVs, quality fittings and fixtures, built in wardrobes, overhead fans and gorgeous bedlinen.   All the delights of Sydney beckon. This is an apartment as big as a small house! More like half a house, this huge apartment occupies the entire second floor of my two storey beach house.  It is completely self contained with own laundry, balcony with views overlooking the ocean, an outdoor dining table that seats 8, a barbecue, all mod cons including wireless internet.    It's particularly suitable for visiting doctors or academics as the university and hospital are only a short distance away. The apartment has plenty of desk space.  There are two double bedrooms, each with bui
fields.neighbourhood_overview: The neighbourhood is a typical Sydney beach suburb, all big sky and blue water.  There is a relaxed vibe everywhere.  Great coastal walks, brilliant swimming spots and plenty of restaurants and bars within walking distance.  At the bottom of the hill is the very popular Coogee Pavillion: (URL HIDDEN) You can hang out there in your swimming gear all day, or dress up and go for the rooftop cocktail bar at night.  It's fantastic. We also have the Coogee Ladies Swimming Pool just up the road.  It is exactly as it says, being one of the few remaining gender segregated public facilities left in Australia.  It's been operating  since the 1920's and is an ocean pool surrounded by natural rock and only women are allowed to go there.  It's very popular with nuns, Muslim women and lesbians!  Entry is by gold coin donation, so cheap as chips for a brilliant, unique holiday attraction.
fields.transit: There is a convenient bus service that will get you lots of places.  Sydney transport is easily organised by using the State Transport Authority Trip Planner website which co ordinates, bus train and ferry timetables and routes for you.  I use it a lot and find it 100% reliable. Cycling around Sydney however is a bit of a nightmare from Coogee as there is a huge hill between the coast and the city.  But once you are over the hill, there are lots of bike paths around the inner city. I use a battery assisted bike for local kind of trips and a car for everything else.  The traffic in town is pretty bad. Buses are relaxing!  If you need a car for odd days, I'm happy to rent you my old station wagon very cheaply.  It's affectionately known as the 'farm car' as it mostly carries horticultural supplies and smells accordingly.  It's 1993 Toyota station wagon with automatic transmission and not many frills, but totally reliable with a pack rack and a tow bar should you be planning any heavy lif
fields.title: SYDNEY LUXE at COOGEE BEACH! Views!

fields.description: Perfect for a couple or single, looking for a comfortable, well equipped and SECURE apartment , with the privacy that comes without having a room mate. Great 1 bedroom apartment on the top floor (7th floor) in security building with intercom. Balcony in the tree top, with views through to the Sydney City and Harbour Bridge, as well as district views over Paddington and Fox entertainment Quarter and Sydney Cricket Ground (SCG) Morning sun streams in the North facing kitchen and lounge-room, and afternoon sun through the west facing bedroom. Geographically located between CBD and Bondi Beach. Fully equipped kitchen, bathroom with washing machine, crockery, bed linen, towels,TV, & wireless Internet access.  Located at 69-75 Cook Road, Centennial Park, Sydney bordering Paddington. 7 mins walk to Oxford St with regular express bus service to city CBD and Bondi Beach taking around 12-15 mins either direction. 5 mins walk to Centennial Park (largest Park in Sydney) , Fox Entertainment Quarter

Completed in 2013, this garden apartment is elegant and simple, reflecting the natural context of it's location so close to world famous Bondi Beach.  We offer everything for you to enjoy your stay: - WiFi - Air conditioning and under floor heating - Large screen TV & DVD with computer connectivity - Fully alarmed premises - Keyless entry - All modern appliances (washer/dryer, dishwasher, large stove & oven, iron, vacuum etc) - All linen and bedding The Garden apartment spans two levels and sleeps 4 people. Both bedrooms open to balconies capturing the views of (website hidden)-fold doors seamlessly open on to the rear garden with a BBQ and large umbrella for lazy afternoons. Bedroom 1:   Queen Bed with ensuite (inc full bath tub) Built in wardrobe TV, Wifi and ADSL connection Bedroom 2: Two single beds but can be set up as a Queen TV, Wifi and ADSL connection Bathroom just 1 metre away Simply arrive and unpack, we have
fields.notes: 3 night minimum stay
fields.neighbourhood_overview: Bondi Beach is Australia's most iconic destination. Swim in clear blue waters, shop at the local boutiques, enjoy a coffee, or go out at night to discover world class dining and cute local bars. Coastal walks, snorkelling, swimming, surfing and golf are a just a few of the activities available right at your doorstep.
fields.transit: Our apartment is situated right on a bus route. If you have a car:  There is street parking out the front on the street with unlimited all day parking.

fields.summary: The space is peaceful, light and bright, private and also offers easy access to the bus stop and the city. The bedroom is small but comfortable and there is lots of room for 2 people in the rest of the apartment space and the deck.

The bedroom is small but comfortable and there is lots of room for 2 people in the rest of the apartment space and the deck. Newly renovated one bedroom apartment with deck overlooking beautiful bush.It is the top floor of a house on street level. The other bedroom will be locked up. It has all other amenities that one would want: a well stocked kitchen with a dishwasher, gas cooktop and an electric oven.  I will be away, but my sister lives downstairs and looks after the property in my absence. A peaceful experience with shops and cafes in a particularly lively outdoor mall within walking distance. It is close to a bus stop and is 15 minutes away from the city centre. It is close to the main road but quiet and peaceful. There is free parking all along the street outside.  The view over and at the dense bush with indigenous trees close to a busy city is a real bonus. Guests will b

fields.neighbourhood_overview: The neighbourhood is quiet even though it is close to Epping Road which is a major transport route in and out of the city. The Lane Cove shopping centre and mall is particularly pleasant, offering all kinds of food and restaurants and everything a visitor could need. There is even a marvellous library to vist.
fields.transit: There is a bus stop at the top of Tantallon Road on Epping Road which takes one directly to the city. There is a bus stop on the opposite side of the road for return trips from the city. Tantallon Road  runs from the house on Johnston Crescent up to Epping Road and is a 5 minute walk at most.

Within walking distance to Annandale village, Glebe, Newtown, The University of Sydney, RPA Hospital. 15 minutes by bus to the CBD, or 10 minutes by car, or 40 minutes by foot. Very quiet.

Well presented, It has two large bedrooms, with two bathrooms, laundry and back yard. Vast living space with soaring ceilings, tastefully furnished with lots of artworks, decorations and living plants. Buses to the city are 200 metres from your door and village shops/cafes are an easy stroll away. A 15 minute walk to the nearest train station. Other features inclu
fields.notes: Please note, our house is not to be used for functions or photo shoots.  Please ensure you lock all windows and close velux in second bedroom before leaving the house. Please switch the exhaust fan on in bathrooms when using the shower or dryer. All instructions for appliances have been left at the house including a house manual. Please ensure the alarm is on when leaving the house.

Including lots of boutique pubs and a brewery close by. Walking distance to Bicentennial park/Glebe foreshore and Sydney fish markets.
fields.transit: We can supply 1 visitors parking card. Their is also all day parking options available on our street and near by streets. Bus is the best public transport option from our house, the nearest locations are on Parramatta Road or Booth Street. The nearest train station is Stanmore which is a 15 minute walk or 6 min drive.

Ask me for more pics as I prefer to share them if you are serious about the rental- as it is my home and I will be leaving special items behind I want you to treat it as a home away from home and with the respect you give your own belongings-  There are 3 bedrooms with double beds and a que

We are tucked away in a quitter part with plenty to see nearby if you like people watching yet a stones throw away from the noise and excitement of King St...

fields.summary: A fantastic spot for a holiday or working in the city. A spacious, bright and quiet one bedroom flat sitting on the top floor of an Art Deco building. There are views of the ocean and national park. 5 minutes walk to surf beaches, Sydney Harbour beaches and Manly ferry, shops and restaurants.  A home-from-home for you as this is my home when I don't have guests. Park in driveway at front. Unlimited wifi. Full verification and reviews required. For longer stays I provide new linen and cleaning.

There are views of the ocean and national park. 5 minutes walk to surf beaches, Sydney Harbour beaches and Manly ferry, shops and restaurants.  A home-from-home for you as this is my home when I don't have guests. Park in driveway at front. Unlimited wifi. Full verification and reviews required. For longer stays I provide new linen and cleaning. This is a perfect space for a couple.  The bedroom has a queen sized bed, ceiling fan and built in wardrobes. Linen provided. The bright and comfortable lounge has TV, DVD player, ceiling fan, sofas, wooden floors, table fan, table for two, a good book selection and heaters.  There is unlimited wi-fi. The modern kitchen is very well equipped with large fridge freezer, dishwasher, gas cooker, microwave and stone bench tops. The modern bathroom has a glass screened shower and hairdryer. Towels and
fields.notes: There are lots of steps. Flights of stone steps lead up from the surf and harbour beaches and town up to the flat. The building also has steps as I am on the third floor.
fields.neighbourhood_overview: Manly is unique in Sydney as, being a peninsular, we have beaches on all sides. The harbour is tranquil and romantic and the surf beach on the ocean side can be dramatic and action-packed. Brimming with shops, restaurants and bars; Manly is the perfect spot to enjoy a holiday. Bush walks, tranquil coves and the busy world-famous surfing beach - all just a few minutes walk away.
fields.transit: 5 minutes to the Manly Ferry to Circular Quay (Sydney CBD and Opera House) and buses to almost everywhere. No need for transport to get around Manly - it is only a short walk away. The car space in front of the building may be available on request.
fields.title: Sunny Manly home with views & car space

fields.summary: YOU WON'T FIND A CHEAPER PLACE IN SYDNEY WITH A VIEW LIKE THIS!
fields.description: YOU WON'T FIND A CHEAPER PLACE IN SYDNEY WITH A VIEW LIKE THIS! Prepare for your jaw to hit the floor when you step into our modern apartment and take a look at our incredible world class view of beautiful Sydney Harbour.  Right on the water's edge, the apartment and your room have uninterrupted close-up views of Sydney Harbour Bridge, the iconic Sydney Opera House and the amazing city skyline – an ever-changing view that captures the beauty and magic of Sydney from sunrise, to golden sunsets over the bridge and the amazing city lights of the night that bring Sydney to life.  You'll be staying in the centre of all the best things Sydney has to see, do and taste, and we've got all the best recommendations for you! As one of the world's biggest party cities, there are fireworks over Sydney Harbour almost every weekend, and staying right on the harbour front means you'll have front seat views every night! It truly is a magical and amazing experience.  You can see the water of Sydney Harbo
fields.notes: Absolutely no early check-in or baggage storage. Our apartment is very small and we have back-to-back guests so we can not under any circumstances accommodate check-in prior to 4pm or store your bags if your flight arrives early morning, so please make appropriate arrangements for this prior to your stay.  All guests must send a text message to the number provided after booking a minimum 1 hour prior to arrival to ensure we are home as we both work full-time hours and lead busy lives, so if you show up unannounced you may be left waiting for a long time.  Cost covers the room and basic use of apartment. If you're looking for somewhere to spend all your time cooking, washing, working and hanging out, this probably isn't for you. We are a very small home and lead busy working lives so need our space and use of our kitchen, living area and washer during the week. (Though we're all for shaking up cocktails and showing you a great time on weekends when we have down time!)  We are best suite
fields.neighbourhood_overview: As one of the world's biggest party cities, there are fireworks over Sydney Harbour almost every weekend, and living right on the harbour front means we have front seat views every night! It truly is a magical and amazing experience we never tire of. You can see the water of Sydney Harbour, the beautiful Sydney Harbour Bridge and the Sydney Opera House from everywhere you look in our town, you will feel like you have stepped inside a postcard, so whatever you do, don't forget to bring your camera! At your fingertips, you will be walking distance from Sydney's best cafes, bars, nightclubs, shopping, museums, amusement parks, tourist walks and more. Your only problem will be trying to fit it all in!
fields.transit: Our apartment is just five minutes walk to the train station, which is only one stop and a two-minute ride into the centre of the city and we're also just metres from the ferry wharf where you can fish into Sydney Harbour or board an iconic Sydney ferry for a memorable boat ride across the water of Sydney Harbour. The harbour foreshore is also right outside our door, you can practically jump in from the living room window! We're just a: -1 min walk to harbour foreshore -5 min walk to Luna Park -5 min walk to train station, ferry & buses -15 min walk to Sydney CBD
fields.title: BREATHTAKING Sydney Harbour Views!

Central location close to the water, this charming Art Deco apartment is a stones throw from Sydney's coolest cafes, restaurants & parks. 20 mins walk from CBD. Quiet leafy "mini Paris" area, everything on your doorstep! Art Deco features, beautiful original wooden floors throughout, glimpses of the Opera House & the Sydney Harbour Bridge. Filled with old charm!  Charming cafes, lots of families, parks, amazing views onto the water, 15 walk to Sydney Botanical Gardens & a 20 min walk to the Opera House. Kings Cross train station is 10 to 15 mins walk. The 311 bus goes from outside the apartment to the city. There is no car park space included with the apartment but there is limited free street parking, which can be found with patience! The whol
fields.notes: There is no car park space with the apartment but there is a car share (rented by the hour) system called Goget ((website hidden)) if here for a few weeks and you need a car.
fields.neighbourhood_overview: A friendly interesting neighbourhood with charming cafes and restaurants, book shops, lots of families, parks (Botanical Gardens are 15 minute walk & the Sydney Opera House about 20 minute walk), lovely views onto the water. Beautiful Art Deco buildings surround this area, which gives it a unique European feel, different from other areas of Sydney.  My favourite local places to eat and drink are Marcelle for breakfast, Pan Handle Bar for lunch and Wilbur's Place for dinner. For something a bit more fine dining Apollo, Cho Cho San or Billy Kwong's are all fantastic for food and wine.
fields.transit: Kings Cross train station is 10 to 15 mins walk. The 311 bus goes from outside the apartment to the city and takes about 15 mins. A cab to the city is about $10 to $15 or it takes about 20 mins on foot across the Botanical Gardens

The train station is 3 minutes' walk away, the city in one direction (10 minutes) or Bondi Beach in the other (20 minutes). The comfortable 1 bedroom apartment has all you need for  relaxing. Modern kitchen and bathroom, double bedroom and a living room ready for relaxation or entertaining. The Art Gallery Of NSW is a 10 minute walk away, or the city is 20 minutes of easy walking through parkland. If you need to travel further afield the train station is 3 minutes walk away. I will be nearby most times  should you need help in any way, and will meet yo
fields.neighbourhood_overview: Potts Point is a restaurant focal point of Sydney. The other vibrant suburbs of Surry Hills, Darlinghurst and Paddington surround me. The suburb is mostly DINKS and empty-nesters, many catching the train or walking to their city jobs. After work they can afford to drop by the hundreds of wonderful restaurants and bars of the city before a pleasurable walk home.  I enjoy the fact that I can walk almost anywhere I need. Even the movies are within a 10 minute walk, and my favorite bookshops too.
fields.transit: While it is only 3 minutes to the train station,  the bus services in all directions, including the north shore and the northwest commercial parks, are also only two blocks away.

Kitchen to prepare light breakfast - other use by negotiation. Supermarkets and public transport just 200m away. A lovely large, light and airy room ideal for long or short stays. Extremely convenient for all that Sydney has to offer. You are welcome to relax in your room, the lounge or our spacious outdoor all weather patio. You are welcome to use the kitchen to prepare your breakfast and light meals by arrangement. We will interact with you as much or little as you like. We'd love to get to know you and hear your experiences but totally respect your privacy. Redfern is a large suburb with a colourful history and reputation. Today it has developed into a fairly trendy area with a very diverse population. As one of our neighbours likes to say - "this is the Paris end of Redfern" - wide, tree lined streets, numerous cafes,  coffee bars and restaurants wit
fields.neighbourhood_overview: Redfern is a large suburb with a colourful history and reputation. Today it has developed into a fairly trendy area with a very diverse population. As one of our neighbours likes to say - "this is the Paris end of Redfern" - wide, tree lined streets, numerous cafes,  coffee bars and restaurants within easy walking distance. Excellent city access. Easy, pleasant walk through Moore Park to Sydney Cricket Ground / Football Stadium and the Fox Studios entertainment centre. The magnificent Centennial Park is about a 15 to 20 minute stroll away. There is a very large Coles Supermarket (open 7am to midnight 7 days) and an Aldi store open till 8pm just 200 metres away
fields.transit: Several bus routes to the city and beyond are but 200 metres away. It is usually best to buy an Opal Card or pre-paid tickets (some buses are only pre-pay services). The Opal Card can be purchased at the Airport or just across the road - there are often long queues at the Airport.

And then stroll down to the fantastic cafes towards Campbell Parade or the hipster shops on Gould Street. The apartment has big sliding doors that can separate the living from the sleeping area or you can just leave it all open to let the first rays of sun in and wake up to golden light. The apartment is fitted with everything you need to feel like you're in your home away from home. It has 2 bedroom, the master bedroom has a new ultra comfortable queen bed and the smaller room a new also ultra comfortable double bed all with professionally laundered crisp white linen A modern bathroom with a large and powerful shower. A quick stroll in any direction and you will find a list of things to do. It is a suburb known for its variety of quality restaurants and home-style foods, and the location of our home is no exception we have many great places to dine and relax that is just moments away. From the station, you're only 1 stop away from Central station where you can catch direct trains to the airport and 2 stops away from the heart of the city. Commuting to the city is quick and convenient either by train or bus. The nearest bus stop is 200m from the apartment and there are regular buses to the city.  The bus ride should only take 10-15 minutes. A taxi ride from the airport takes about 15 minutes and costs less than AUD30 with Uber. The neighbourhood has a great selection of trendy cafes, ba
fields.neighbourhood_overview: Proximity to public transport and lots of cafes and bars. There's also a small supermarket (IGA) across the road.
fields.transit: The nearest bus stop is an easy 3 min walk (buses go to the city from here) and the Redfern train station is 5 mins from the apartment on foot. If you prefer to walk to the city, it should only take you 30 mins.
fields.title: Affordable and close to the city!

fields.summary: Light sunny self contained apartment  sleeps up to 4, queen bed  plus sofa bed. Own deck and secret garden .Secluded location yet only two minutes walk from village shops,park,restaurants cafes and bus stop. Waterviews. .Central Sydney 10 minutes away by bus or ferry.Parking permit.
fields.description: Light sunny self contained apartment  sleeps up to 4, queen bed  plus sofa bed. Own deck and secret garden .Secluded location yet only two minutes walk from village shops,park,restaurants cafes and bus stop. Waterviews. .Central Sydney 10 minutes away by bus or ferry.Parking permit. This space is ideal for a single or a couple on holiday or short term business contract. The living room has a sofa bed that sleeps an extra two. We charge $50 a night for each extra person, and we charge a one off fee of $50 if a couple prefer to sleep separately and make use of the sofa to sleep on. Self contained facilities include fully equipped kitchen-living room with gas hob and oven,dishwasher,microwave, washing machine/dryer,fridge /freezer and  bathroom with walk in shower. Equipment includes flat screen TV ,portable radio/CD player with ipod port, iron and ironing board,hairdryer and free wifi. All linen is supplied, and porta -cot available on request for an extra $50. Our guests love the privat
fields.notes: Only two rules: no smoking indoors and no pets.
fields.neighbourhood_overview: Balmain is a village and  is one of Sydney's oldest suburbs, very pretty old houses and cottages and parks and water views everywhere. There are tons of restaurants , pubs, cafes and delicatessens, as well as stylish clothes shops and gift shops. Balmain also has a harbour swimming pool.    Our street fronts on to Gladstone Park with it's barefoot bowling club and bistro . Our house looks back across the harbour to the city.
fields.transit: You  can walk everywhere,no need for a car, but a visitor parking permit is available  should you need one. A bus goes direct to the city every 10 minutes in peak hour and every 20 minutes the rest of the day. The joy of Balmain is the regular ferry service, just a 10 minute ride to the centre of the city.Ferries to the city  leave regularly from two terminals, both walkable. For beach lovers without own transport there is even a direct ferry service right across the harbour from Balmain to Watsons Bay.  From the airport a taxi is the best bet,approx A$50/60 . It takes about 30 minutes.Alternatively- a train to Town Hall, then 442 bus to Gladstone park Balmain
fields.title: One bedroom tranquil hideaway  Balmain

fields.summary: Double bed. Own bathroom and toilet in adjoining room. Nice courtyard. Kitchen and living area with all mod cons. Free wi-fi. Close to beach, cafes and transport. Experience everything Bondi and Sydney has to offer.
fields.description: Double bed. Own bathroom and toilet in adjoining room. Nice courtyard. Kitchen and living area with all mod cons. Free wi-fi. Close to beach, cafes and transport. Experience everything Bondi and Sydney has to offer. Own bedroom and bathroom in large 2 story house. 10 minute walk to beach. Cafes and restaurants in every direction. Close to transport. Nice backyard and courtyard with Weber BBQ. We are a family of 4 with 2 boys aged 8 & 6. The guest area is self contained downstairs and at the front of the house. There is a large living room, dining area and kitchen that would be shared with us. We sleep upstairs and have own bathroom upstairs. The bedroom has a double bed, loads of books and DVDs (but no TV), a piano and a nice window view, There is also a front porch to enjoy a cuppa on. There is a toilet and shower that would be exclusively yours which also has a washing machine and dryer. You can close off the hallway door for more privacy. We will supply continental breakfast (bread
fields.neighbourhood_overview: Bondi is a great mix of inner city living next to the world famous Bondi Beach. There are also some other great beaches within a few minutes. Some good jogging routes and loads of great cafes and restaurants. Bondi markets on the weekend is also good. Easy to get to the city via bus, train or ferry.
fields.transit: Take your pick. Bondi road is a 10 minute walk that has a continuous stream of buses taking you to Bondi junction from where you can jump on a train to anywhere. Closes bus stop is a 5 minute walk away. Taxis are prevalent. You can also catch a ferry to the city from Rosebay.  Or you can just walk down to the beach which is an easy 10 - 15 minute stroll.
fields.title: Bondi self contained bed n bathroom

fields.summary: A modern, comfortable apartment (2 bed/2 bath). Located in quiet part of Balmain with a convenient store across the road, an easy 7 min walk to the Highstreet and only 10 min to the city on the bus . Also enjoy a swimming pool spa, sauna and gym.
fields.description: A modern, comfortable apartment (2 bed/2 bath). Located in quiet part of Balmain with a convenient store across the road, an easy 7 min walk to the Highstreet and only 10 min to the city on the bus . Also enjoy a swimming pool spa, sauna and gym.  The main bedroom has an en-suite bathroom, which creates additional privacy from the second bedroom.  The apartment comfortably fits 4 people. Note that the configuration is one queen bed and a bunk bed.  The apartment has a TV, DVD player, Wifi, off-street parking spot, a well-equipped kitchen and linen & towels are all provided.  You also have access to a wonderful pool complex, which features a 25m lap pool, 2 spas, a gym and a sauna.  Swimming pool, spa, sauna, gym, TV It's likely you won't meet me at all. I tend to leave the key out for my guests so that you can time your own arrival. Balmain is one of Sydney's great inner city suburbs. It has a lot of old houses with lots of character, and a stroll over the Balmain peninsula is always a
fields.notes: Things you need to know about the house; A LIVED IN SPACE You are about to rent my house. This is not a hotel or usually an empty space. You will find my things in the house, my clothes in the cupboards, and my daughters toys in her room. I do everything possible to hide these items from view. If you anticipate to need cupboard space please advise me prior to your stay, as it’s a city apartment with little storage, but I can certainly make sure one or two shelves are empty for your clothes.  NOT BABY-PROOF The house is not suitable for very small children. It’s not baby proofed any more as my daughter is 8. Child proofing the house will be a stressful event for you. I suggest to look for a more suitable place in that case.  NOISE - CONSTRUCTION There is construction going on next door, which is outside of my control  The master bedroom will hear some of the noise (depends on the day) the back room will be nice and quiet still.  WELCOMING COMMITTEE  You will likely not meet me on arriva
fields.neighbourhood_overview: Balmain is one of Sydney's great inner city suburbs. It has a lot of old houses with lots of character, and a stroll over the Balmain peninsula is always a pleasure. We have several great parks and vantage points from where you can see the city. The ferry is always the nicest way to travel into the city, but we are also an easy bus ride away (10 min).  Balmain is well known for being full of pubs and restaurants, and becomes a destination in the evenings for entertainment. Whilst the back streets always remain quiet, the highstreet always has a great vibe to it. Plenty of coffee shops for during the day, and great places to eat in the evening.
fields.transit: From Balmain there are several places you can catch a ferry. The apartment itself is a 5 min walk from a bus stop, from which you can either go into the city or to a ferry wharf.
fields.title: Great, modern Sydney Apartment

fields.summary: The Beachside Bliss is the newest holiday home next to the beach! Literally a minutes walk to the sand and surf, the location doesn't get better than this. Heart of Bondi with shops , cafes, and restaurants all downstairs.  Clean and crisp, this top floor apartment is filled with natural light and the ocean breeze.
fields.description: The Beachside Bliss is the newest holiday home next to the beach! Literally a minutes walk to the sand and surf, the location doesn't get better than this. Heart of Bondi with shops , cafes, and restaurants all downstairs.  Clean and crisp, this top floor apartment is filled with natural light and the ocean breeze. Heart of Bondi with shops , cafes, and restaurants all downstairs.  Clean and crisp , this top floor apartment is filled with natural light and the ocean breeze.  BONDI BEACH. World renowned beach, this security accessed apartment is two minutes walk to the sand and footsteps to public transport to Bondi Junction, the City of Sydney and beyond.  The apartment is within minutes walking distance to trendy cafes, restaurants, supermarket and bars. Easy transport to see the sights of Sydney or just kick back and enjoy the eas
fields.notes: Please note: this apartment is located on the 3rd floor with stair access only. No lift (elevator). There is metered street parking only directly outside of the apartment. The closest free and unrestricted street parking is located a 10-15 minute walk away. A temporary parking permit can be obtained for $43/month from Waverley Council Office (8.30am - 5pm Mon-Fri) at 55 Spring St, Bondi Junction, NSW 2022. Requires a photo or copy of the registration to be shown to prove vehicle identity. Submit a Temporary Parking Permit Application with vehicle make, model and registration number. A vacation rental lease document proving that you are staying at the address, and an ID. For rental cars getting a permit can only be done after the car is collected. More information and application form can be found at : (URL HIDDEN)
fields.title: Beachside Bliss 1 min walk to beach ideal location

fields.summary: A 'traditional' style B&B run as a lifestyle, not as a business. Centrally located in a tranquil bush setting within walking distance to everything Palm Beach has to offer All 4 rooms have queen or king beds, ensuites and ocean or Pittwater view balconies. Tastefully decorated, not overdone.
fields.description: A 'traditional' style B&B run as a lifestyle, not as a business. Centrally located in a tranquil bush setting within walking distance to everything Palm Beach has to offer All 4 rooms have queen or king beds, ensuites and ocean or Pittwater view balconies. Tastefully decorated, not overdone. This is the Riviera room.  Room rate shown is for one bedroom (one couple) Discounts are available for off peak seasons and multiple night stays. doesn't hurt to ask !!! (There are 3 other bedrooms in all accommodating 8 people.) Choice of two guest lounge/sitting room areas, one upstairs and one downstairs.  Tea/coffee making facilities available at all times in downstairs dining room.  Fridge available in downstairs kitchen. As well as individual water view balconies to all rooms there is a  tropical garden area with several seats/tables overlooking McKay reserve and Pittwater to the west. Off street parking for most guests The rooms are individual and private.  There is a common lounge room with
fields.notes: The house is located at the top of the hill at Palm Beach with Pacific Ocean water views through a canopy of trees at the front, and Pittwater views over McKay Reserve at the rear.
fields.neighbourhood_overview: Palm Beach has a resident population of just 20% with 80% being holiday houses. Other than xmas holidays in the peak of summer and a few of the long weekends the location at the top of the hill is unbelievably quiet and serene
fields.transit: Pretty much everywhere in Palm Beach is within walking distance but it does require a walk up the hill via a very quiet road or via two sets of steps (known as The Stairway to Heaven) ... but it's worth it. It takes about 10 minutes either way to get down to the water. Nearby Whale Beach and Avalon Beach are within 5 to 8 minutes drive
fields.title: Palm Beach Bed & Breakfast RIVIERA

fields.summary: Our bright and peaceful studio is perfect for short to medium stays in Sydney.  Situated in the city's funkiest suburb, only a few blocks from Sydney uni, Carriageworks Performance Space, RPA hospital and public transport. Can even walk to the city!
fields.description: Our bright and peaceful studio is perfect for short to medium stays in Sydney.  Situated in the city's funkiest suburb, only a few blocks from Sydney uni, Carriageworks Performance Space, RPA hospital and public transport. Can even walk to the city! We have recently renovated our self Contained Studio Apartment at the back of our property.  It is bright and spacious with everything you could need for your stay.  There is separate access from the side lane so you can be as private as you like but we are available for advice should you need it.  The studio is set up for two adults however we are happy to accomodate families with a vast amount of kids paraphernalia around that you are welcome to borrow.   Location: The studio is adjacent to Carriageworks with its multiple performance spaces, saturday farmers market and monthly artisan market. The local streetscape is quiet with beautiful mature english plane trees lining both sides.   We are very centrally located in Sydney with the CBD o
fields.notes: We are close to the railway (approximately 100m, obscured by trees) so trains can be heard from the studio however I have improved the sound insulation of the window towards the railway.  The sounds is fairly muffled and earplugs are available if the noise bothers you.
fields.neighbourhood_overview: Newtown is very funky and ecclectic. The suburb has gentrified a lot in the last 20 years so it has a suaver edge to the grittiness.  King St is the main street with up and coming designer shops and every kind of restaurant you could dream of.  Over the last few years there has been a bit of a baby boom in the area which has made it very child friendly.
fields.transit: We are very close to Macdonaldtown train station (2 minutes walk) and redfern station (15 minutes walk).  There are many buses that run along king street which is 5 minutes walk away.  If you prefer to walk, the city is only about 30 minutes walk away.
fields.title: Great studio next to Carriageworks

fields.summary: We are not taking bookings for the Xmas New Year period yet unless the stay is 18-21 days or over, this applies for the majority of our places  regards Vince

The Ian Thorpe Aquatic Centre and Powerhouse Museum are close by providing you with a first class swimming and entertainment facilities. Just a 10 minute walk into the CBD, only 1400 Meters to Townhall and 1100 Meters to Central Station. Pyrmont village which is located a further five minutes walk down Harris Street is a melting pot of media, tv studios and radio stations. Star City Casino and the Sydney Fish Markets are also
fields.title: 3ULT625HAR  1 bedroom Ultimo Unit

fields.description: We just lovingly rennovated our 2-bedroom Victorian terraced house in Waterloo/Redfern, just outside Sydney's city centre. It's a clean, contemporary, light and art-filled house with a veggie patch, very comfy beds, BBQ and close to trains (Redfern), buses, a 25 minute walk or 10 minute taxi to the beating heart of Sydney.  We love the area: a 5 minute walk from the galleries and cafes of Dank St and Redfern High Street, it's near 3 beautiful parks (Sydney, Redfern and Alexandria Parks), 2 major supermarkets and is on the airport route: a 10-15 minute cab ride away [but thankfully not on the flightpath!]. It is 10 mins walk from Redfern Train Station, 18 min walk from Central Train Station, and on the 343 bus route, direct to the City.  It's a cultural hub with tonnes of small bars and excellent cafes, and stunning parks and we have a big TV, wifi, generous sofa and book collection... Come stay! Suggested local coffee shops: Coffee, Tea & Me, The Wah Wah Lounge, Baffi and Mo, All Press
fields.title: NEW RENO: DESIGNER REDFERN TERRACE

fields.summary: Come and enjoy a home away from home in your own sunny cozy one bedroom apartment in the funky area of Glebe. Located just a 15 minute bus ride from the city, you'll have everything at your fingertips. Suitable for a couple or single traveler.
fields.description: Come and enjoy a home away from home in your own sunny cozy one bedroom apartment in the funky area of Glebe. Located just a 15 minute bus ride from the city, you'll have everything at your fingertips. Suitable for a couple or single traveler. Come and enjoy a home away from home in your own sunny cozy apartment in the funky area of Glebe. Located just a 15 minute bus ride from the city, you'll have everything at your fingertips. Suitable for a couple or single traveler. The Apartment -Cute, cozy and light-filled one bedroom apartment located on the second floor of a 70s building. -lovely leafy outlook with a small balcony at the quiet rear of the apartment block -furnished with a vintage vibe -self contained kitchen -ensuite bathroom -queen sized bed -digital tv and dvd player -wifi available -shared washing machine and dryer located on the same level as the apartment -undercover car space available if you're traveling with a vehicle. You will have access to the entire apartment and t
fields.neighbourhood_overview: The Location - Just walk out the door and there are a couple of cafes, restaurants, pubs,  hair salon and convenience store.  - For more options, the funky street of Glebe Point Rd is just a 5 minute walk away. There you will find a huge variety of restaurants from Thai to Turkish, plenty of cute retro cafes to lounge in.  - On Saturdays people flock to Glebe Point Rd to visit the popular Glebe Markets which sell new and vintage clothes, goods, arts and crafts. - Broadway Shopping Centre is about a 10 minute walk from the apartment for anything you may need. There are plenty of retail shops, large grocery stores like Coles and Harris Farm and the Hoyts Cinemas. - The beautiful old grounds of Sydney University is located just a 5 minute walk from the apartment and there are some parks and Victoria Park Swimming Pool close by.  - There is also an Officeworks store two blocks away on Parramatta Rd for all work, printing and stationary requirements.
fields.transit: Transport - To get into the city only takes 15 minutes by bus. 470 Bus to and from the city runs directly outside the apartment.  - There are also numerous regular buses to the city which stop two blocks away on Parramatta Rd. - There is a light rail stop about 10 mins walk from the apartment which takes you around Darling Harbour and the Sydney Fish Markets.
fields.title: Cute sunny apartment in Glebe

fields.summary: Experience Sydney at its best like a local and stay in our beautiful studio in the heart of popular Potts Point. Enjoy awarded cafe/restaurants, charming Farmers Market, cute shops and parks by the water! Walking distance to: CBD, Opera House, outdoor pool, Surry Hills/cool areas. Convenient public transport hub on our street. We love to host and will be at your service as your "digital concierge" around the clock, always ready to point you in the right direction! Welcome to book a stay with us!
fields.description: Experience Sydney at its best like a local and stay in our beautiful studio in the heart of popular Potts Point. Enjoy awarded cafe/restaurants, charming Farmers Market, cute shops and parks by the water! Walking distance to: CBD, Opera House, outdoor pool, Surry Hills/cool areas. Convenient public transport hub on our street. We love to host and will be at your service as your "digital concierge" around the clock, always ready to point you in the right direction! Welcome to book a stay with us! Don’t miss out on the best way to experience the life as a true Sydneysider! Our beautiful studio is carefully designed and equipped for Airbnb visitors. It is the perfect place if you are looking for premium accommodation in the best location but wish to spend your money on good food (there is plenty!) and exploring rather than on a small dated hotel room. Previous guests consistently review the apartment as well-equipped, perfectly situated, serene, homely and very clean.  Staying with us tic
fields.notes: The area, Potts Point, is very safe and a fantastic neighbourhood.
fields.neighbourhood_overview: Potts Point is one of Sydneys most popular and cosmopolitan neighborhoods. Just outside the front door is walking streets, cafes, markets, bars, restaurants, deli’s, supermarkets, local shops, Saturday organic markets and a so much more. Our area is friendly, close, hip and safe. Walking distance to everything you want, the city and all sights is just a 20 min stroll away. On one hand the Botanic gardens, Opera house and ABC pool, on the other hand cafes, train station, restaurants and shopping. Two train stations from Bondi and the scenic buses and airport buses leave no more then 50 meters from our door! Welcome to book and stay with us!
fields.transit: Plenty of great transport is outside the door, but walking to the city is even easier than one or two stops on the train. Hub for public transport 5 min away.
fields.title: Cosy modern top standard - breakfast included!

fields.description: The apartment is back on the market after being renovated throughout. Enjoy your stay in one of Sydney's great heritage buildings, with original hardwood floors and exposed beams throughout the apartment you'll be staying in a piece of history. The apartment has 1 bedroom with a queen size bed plus a fold out sofa bed that can accommodate extra guests if required. It has one bathroom and a full kitchen with induction cooking. All linens will be supplied. The building has all the amenities including a gym, spa, pool and sauna to make your stay more enjoyable. The apartment has a leafy outlook and is located on a quiet street so you shouldn't be disturbed during your stay. It is located just a few minutes walk to iconic Darling Harbour where you will find a variety of great restaurants as well as other attractions. It is just a minutes walk to the light rail station and the conference centre. There is also a supermarket nearby for your convenience. The Apartment is equipped with unlimite
fields.title: Darling Harbour City Apartment

fields.description: LARGE LIVING AREA--BEST VIEW IN BUILDING FROM HARBOUR BRIDGE TO HEADS 1 LARGE BEDROOM-ENSUITE 1 MOD BEDROOM--2ND BATHROOM LARGE SEPARATE KITCHEN SWIMMING POOL/GYM/TENNIS COURT/UNDERGROUND 2 CAR PARKING WIFI HOTEL TYPE SERVICE--24HR RECEPTION-3 STAFF DURING DAY 5 MINUTES TO KINGS CROSS SHOPS,RESTAURANTS ETC 15 MINUTE WALK TO CITY--15 MINUTE DRIVE TO BONDI BCH 10 MINUTE TO BOTANICAL GARDENS CAFE& SHOPS AT DOOR BUSES 2 MINUTES TRAINS 6 MINUTES SWEEPING VIEWS OF HARBOUR INCL HARBOUR BRIDGE,OPERA HOUSE AND HEADS
fields.title: LUXURY APARTMENT--BEST VIEW SYDNEY

fields.description: Enjoy your holiday in our stylish Bondi apartment. The apartment contains many lovely pieces of furniture both new and old, wooden floors and high art deco ceilings. It is on the ground floor in a small block of 4. It is a quiet place and parties are not possible because of the neighbours who are mainly young families.  The apartment sleeps 2 people. It has 1 large master bedroom with a queen size bed, an eat-in kitchen, a lounge and a study/second bedroom. Plus a very handy laundry/storage room! All bedding and towels are provided, so is internet and most necessary condiments. We have Foxtel/cable TV and Apple TV so you can choose to watch basically any movie or series. We are really close only 3 blocks ( 8 minutes walk ) away from the north end of Bondi Beach, you'll find many nice bars and cafes within a minutes walk in either direction. We have a little convenience store and a lovely cafe just around the corner. Buses take you into the other good parts of Sydney such as Surry Hills
fields.title: Stylish beach apartment

fields.summary: Modern & comfortable room in Paddington. Location is very central and convenient for public transportation (7 min walk to Edgecliff Train Station). The house locals are 3 friendly people and 2 cats.

fields.neighbourhood_overview: You will be located right between famous Bondi Beach and exclusive Tamarama Beach. Only a 2 minute walk straight onto the famous "Bondi to Bronte Coastal Walk".  Situated in a quieter Bondi street but still an easy 3 minutes walk to the main Bondi Beach strip with all the cafes, restaurants, bars and beach scene. Bondi Openair Cinema;  late January to early March. Sydney Mardi Gras; Early March. Whale Watching, Northern Migration; April to Mid August. Bondi Winter Magic festival; June, July & August Ice Skating Rink; around June to mid July. Vivid Sydney;  end May to mid June. City to Surf fun-run; 2nd Sunday August Festival of Winds; 2nd Sunday September Whale Watching, Southern Migration; Mid August to Mid December. Sculptures by the Sea; mid October to mid November Summer in Bondi; It's always summer in Bondi! The Coastal Walk from Bondi to Bronte beach is always popular with the locals; now tourists are increasingly taking to one of Australia’s great coastal walks. We suggest start
fields.transit: Regular bus services to the City and Bondi Junction train station.  Bus 333 - Express City to/from Bondi Beach (~35 minutes) Bus 380 - City to/from Bondi (~45 minutes) Bus 381 - Bondi Junction to/from Beach (~15 minutes) We have some Opal (prepaid) transport passes available for loan just ask Nick or Ivana. Much appreciated if you return with some credit for the next guest! Taxis - Hail one from Bondi Road or book via phoning 133 300 or 133 100 Uber - Many Uber taxis base themselves in around Bondi OBike/ReddyGo/Ofo bike sharing located near by! Walking - We are so close to all the cafes, restaurants, bars, pubs, walking trails, surfing spots, shops, markets, swimming pools, parks, playgrounds and more! Supermarkets/shopping There is a convenience store, post office, laundromat and two coffee shops 2 minutes away in Fletcher Street. Up Wilga Street and turn left. The also is a well stocked IGA & Harris Farm Supermarkets and Liquor Stores at Bondi Beach just 5 minute walk down to the be

fields.summary: In one of the best suburbs of Sydney (Balmain) I have a spare room available (max 2 people) with a bunk bed and your own private bathroom in a modern apartment, with use of gym, spa, sauna and swimming pool. A 10 min bus ride from Sydney CBD.
fields.description: In one of the best suburbs of Sydney (Balmain) I have a spare room available (max 2 people) with a bunk bed and your own private bathroom in a modern apartment, with use of gym, spa, sauna and swimming pool. A 10 min bus ride from Sydney CBD. You will have use of the bunk room which is normally a girls room. It has its own bathroom, so no need to share one with me. You can opt in or out of my company of course :)  The other facilities in the house are a TV, DVD player, Wifi, well equipped kitchen and living room. You can also use the amenities of the building; lap pool, spa, gym and sauna.  The room is NOT suitable for more than 2 people. Please don't bring additional friends :) Unit and amenities Please assume you will be renting the apartment when I am home. You can interact with me as much or as little as you want. I am happy to provide you with local info and travel tips, should you want any.  Balmain is one of Sydney's great suburbs. It's a peninsula, and therefore relatively quie
fields.neighbourhood_overview: Balmain is one of Sydney's great suburbs. It's a peninsula, and therefore relatively quiet. My apartment is a 10 min bus ride from the city, has great vantage points to enjoy night time views of the CBD, and is only a 7 min walk from the high street, which is full or pubs and restaurants. Balmain is approx 25 min from the famous Sydney beaches by car.
fields.transit: Balmain has buses and ferries to take you into different parts of the city. Nearest bus stop from the apartment is a 5 min walk, and ferry terminals can be reached in 15 or 20 minutes on foot too.
fields.title: Private Room  10 min from the City

fields.summary: Gay couple with a modern apartment close to the CBD, Sydney University and UNSW.   Modern facilities and your own private bathroom.  Perfect for anyone who is going to study, work in the CBD or spend a week or so in Sydney.
fields.description: Gay couple with a modern apartment close to the CBD, Sydney University and UNSW.   Modern facilities and your own private bathroom.  Perfect for anyone who is going to study, work in the CBD or spend a week or so in Sydney. My parter Stephen and I have a private room available in a modern complex located in Alexandria/Erskineville right in front of Sydney Park.  Close to the Airport and CBD, approximately $35 by taxi.  The neighbourhood is funky and vibrant with hundreds of well priced restaurants just a walk away.  We are close to Sydney university, university of NSW and 25 minutes from the CBD by either bus or train.  Two bus routes stop right in front of the complex. The house has been renovated recently.  There are floorboards throughout.  There is air conditioning in the lounge room area incase it gets very warm.  The apartment has a lift and has security systems and fire alarms for your safety.  There is a pool and spa open during daylight hours and a small gym is at your disposa
fields.notes: No smoking inside.  No pets unfortunately.  We prefer long stays.  We have found over the years that we prefer this to short quick stays.
fields.neighbourhood_overview: The neighbourhood is vibrant.  There are 4 restaurants now just a short walk away including the Grounds of Alexandria..  The apartment faces on to the gigantic Sydney park.  Great if you want to keep fit. Close to the city and also the airport.  Newtown is a 15 minute walk away.  Loads of cheap restaurants to go and try, shops to visit and movies/theatre.  The CBD is only 35 minutes on public transport.
fields.transit: The following bus routes stop right in front of the complex: 308 - redfern & city 370 - universities and coggee beach These routes take you towards the city centre and the beaches.  Guests complain that the 370 runs very late often. We recommend you download the trip view application to your phone so you can see your bus on GPS as Sydney has a problem with traffic during peak hours. There is a train station about 5 minutes walk away called St. Peters.  It has trains every 10 minutes in peak times to the city.  The trains are very reliable in comparison to the bus. You can ride a bike, however this is quite dangerous if you do not normally ride on the road with cars.  I dont recommend this option as its dangerous for my guests.
fields.title: Near CBD,Newtown,Airport. Drop in
